Francais: Mais Amasias ne l'écouta pas. Et Joas, roi d'Israël, monta, et ils se virent en face, lui et Amasias, roi de Juda, à Bethsamès, qui est à Juda.
Anglais: But Amaziah would not hear. Therefore Jehoash king of Israel went up; and he and Amaziah king of Judah looked one another in the face at Beth–shemesh, which belongeth to Judah.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: May Amatsiya min humumɗi. Nala Yowas mulla vi Israyel kali vun duura; namu hiɗi Amatsiya mulla vi Yuda tupa dig tuwsiya hay Bet-Semes ta ka hay Yuda.
Bulu: Ve Amatsia a nji ke wôʼô nye. Ane Yôas, njô bôte ya Israél a nga bet; be nga tômetan, nye a Amatsia, e Bétsemék ya Yuda.
Guiziga: Amma Amasiya a ngum cine mi ngi Zoˀas miɓaŋ di na ta. Vurˀe, Zoˀas, buy Israyele, a bam ati soje naŋhaya, ara zliram kiɗa vu ati Amasiya, buy Zuda, a Bet-Semes, hirwuy Zuda.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ammaa Amasiya faalaaki bolle ɗe'e. Nden Yo'as, laamiiɗo Isra'iila wari, fotti bee Amasiya, laamiiɗo Yahuuda, ɓe kaɓi haa Bayti-Semes nder maral Yahuuda.
Fulfulde_DC: Ammaa Amasiya faalaaki bolle ɗe'e. Nden Yo'as, laamiiɗo Isra'iila wari, fotti bee Amasiya, laamiiɗo Yahuuda, ɓe kaɓi haa Bayti-Semes nder maral Yahuuda.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Amasia zii wen nú-a na; hegɔ Jɔas wannu *Israɛl daŋa, ɓɛɛ wa ba zu dúk nɛ̀ ŋmaa sɛn Bɛt-Sɛmɛs nú Juda.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Amasia zii wen nú-a na; hegɔ Jɔas wannu *Israɛl daŋa, ɓɛɛ wa ba zu dúk nɛ̀ ŋmaa sɛn Bɛt-Sɛmɛs nú Juda.
Kapsiki_DC: Ama kese Amasiya kafe ghena shɛ we. Ca pa Zhowas meghea ka Israyɛl tsenete ka sewajɛa ŋkɛ. Begeme ka sewajɛa ŋkɛ le ŋa Amasiya kwa Bɛt-Shɛmɛsh te hɛɗia Zhəwda.
Tupurri: Ama, Amatsiya laa dayge laa waçaçre äen gaè. Do kay nono, Jowas wañ Israyel kal ëiigi wo. AÀ kal wo yiñ kaçaçra, se lay Amatsiya wañ Juda lay, kal wo yiñ kaçaçra Bet-Semes maga ti äañ Juda mono.

Francais: Juda fut battu devant Israël, et chacun s'enfuit dans sa tente.
Anglais: And Judah was put to the worse before Israel; and they fled every man to their tents.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sum sa Israyella kol kay sum sa Yudana, gigekaw pir vo hay guɗukŋa valamu valamu.
Bulu: Ane Israél a nga dañe Yuda, a môt ase a nga tup e nda éndelé jé.
Guiziga: Soje Israyeley a kiɗaka soje Zudahaya ngurof ngurof, hã mbur gar na, a ja kil ngi hay naŋ, a hay naŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Isra'iila jaali Yahuuda, yimɓe Yahuuda ndoggi, koo moy haa saare mum.
Fulfulde_DC: Isra'iila jaali Yahuuda, yimɓe Yahuuda ndoggi, koo moy haa saare mum.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: *Israɛl gana zu o be Juda tɛ biro, ɓɛɛ wa pɛsi si ɗoŋ tɛ kɔ-wa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: *Israɛl gana zu o be Juda tɛ biro, ɓɛɛ wa pɛsi si ɗoŋ tɛ kɔ-wa.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa ka sewajɛa ka Israyɛl mpəakawa ŋa ka Zhəwda, pɛtɛ nyi ketene ka sewajɛa ka Zhəwda hwɛnji kalə sha ghɛa nci.
Tupurri: Jar Israyel kal wo äum jar Juda wo, wosela kal dañge de ëee äi mburyug äe.

Francais: Joas, roi d'Israël, prit à Bethsamès Amasias, roi de Juda, fils de Joas, fils d'Ochozias. Il vint à Jérusalem et fit une brèche de quatre cents coudées dans la muraille de Jérusalem, depuis la porte d'Ephraïm jusqu'à la porte de l'angle.
Anglais: And Jehoash king of Israel took Amaziah king of Judah, the son of Jehoash the son of Ahaziah, at Beth–shemesh, and came to Jerusalem, and brake down the wall of Jerusalem from the gate of Ephraim unto the corner gate, four hundred cubits.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay Bet-Semes, Yowas vi Amatsiya mulla vi Yuda, goora vi Yowas, goora vi Akasiya. Nam co hay Yerusalem, nam co baŋana ir goldoŋ kis-fiɗi hay gulmunna vi Yerusalem, tun caw hay vun-galana vi Efrayim pa ta-ta tam vun-galan ma hay gefna.
Bulu: Yôas njô bôte ya Israél a nga bi Amatsia njô bôte ya Yuda, e mone Yôaz, e mone Akazia mbôk e Bétsemék. A nga zu Yérusalém a sale mfine ya Yérusalém; nsalane te ô mbe menyiʼi me mo mintete minyin, ataté mbé yʼEfrayim a kui mbé ya abuʼu nda .
Guiziga: Akẽh na, Zoˀas, buy Israyele, a ja Amasiya, buy Zuda, i dangay a Bet-Semese, Amasiya, mangal ngi Zoˀas, dideˀ mukutur ti kutur ngi Ahaziya. A dirba nah, Zoˀas a so nga Zeruzalem, a slin mifiliw firndiw avu mohol ngi walahay Zeruzaleme, gwat ngi metir skat skat cuw, zle avu mizlingre ngi Efrayim, sesẽŋ avu mizlingre ngi zlirɗi.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yo'as laamiiɗo Isra'iila naŋngi Amasiya ɓii Yo'as ɓii Ahaziya haa Bayti-Semes. Nden o yahri mo haa Urusaliima. O sumpiti mahol Urusaliima, diga Dammugal Efrayim haa Dammugal Toldu , baakin meetir teemeɗɗe ɗiɗi.
Fulfulde_DC: Yo'as laamiiɗo Isra'iila naŋngi Amasiya ɓii Yo'as ɓii Ahaziya haa Bayti-Semes. Nden o yahri mo haa Urusaliima. O sumpiti mahol Urusaliima, diga Dammugal Efrayim haa Dammugal Toldu , baakin meetir teemeɗɗe ɗiɗi.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Jɔas wannu *Israɛl baa Amasia wannu Juda, bem ko Jɔas, be-koo Akazias nɛ̀ bara-biro sɛn Bɛt-Sɛmɛs, ɓɛɛ tɛ pii Jerusalɛm, gbin garo-biro a nù, nyɛi̧a ɗoŋ-aa nɛ́ mɛtrɛ gɔmŋmaa-yiitoo, ku̧u̧-naŋ-a nɛ̀ nú garo ko Efraim hɔ nɛnɛ nú garo mɛ mgbii-aa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Jɔas wannu *Israɛl baa Amasia wannu Juda, bem ko Jɔas, be-koo Akazias nɛ̀ bara-biro sɛn Bɛt-Sɛmɛs, ɓɛɛ tɛ pii Jerusalɛm, gbin garo-biro a nù, nyɛi̧a ɗoŋ-aa nɛ́ mɛtrɛ gɔmŋmaa-yiitoo, ku̧u̧-naŋ-a nɛ̀ nú garo ko Efraim hɔ nɛnɛ nú garo mɛ mgbii-aa.
Kapsiki_DC: Kwa Bɛt-Shɛmɛsh, Zhowas meghea ka Israyɛl kesehwe Amasiya meghea ka Zhəwda kaveyi kwa daŋgayɛ, wəzege ta Zhowas ba'a shia Ahaziya. Pa slə tagha kadzeme Zhɛrəzalɛm kaŋzlamte zlia meleme takwa yitea mɛtre gwəmsə bake, kwelɛ tepe ta mɛ degha ta Ɛfrayim le ŋkwa nya gwekwe zli.
Tupurri: Jowas wañ Israyel kal baa Amatsiya wañ Juda je ni Jowas no, je ni Ahasiyan dañgay Bet-Semese. AÀ kal nduugi Jerusalem, kal plaw kor glig ma ti Jerusalemn go nen meder kiskis äoge, le jag tiñ ma Efrayim ka' haçaç nduu go kañge jag tiñ ngeel ma de hee coçoç no.

Francais: Il prit tout l'or et l'argent et tous les ustensiles qui se trouvaient dans la maison de Yahweh et dans les trésors de la maison du roi; il prit aussi des otages, et retourna à Samarie.
Anglais: And he took all the gold and silver, and all the vessels that were found in the house of the  Lord , and in the treasures of the king's house, and hostages, and returned to Samaria.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam yaw ora hiɗi doorota kaf, hiɗi doway ma ka hay ziyna vi Ma-Vatɗina, hiɗi ma hay timgil ma hay ziyna vi mulla; nam yaw sumun gorvo'o kaw, nam hotay hay Samariya may.
Bulu: A nga nyoñe or, argent, a biôm bise bi nga too e nda Nti a akume ya nda njô bôt; a nga bi fe bôt, mvus éte a nga bulan e Samari.
Guiziga: Zoˀas a hila ɓiri tapasl tapaslay ati ɓiri barahay waɗ gwat mupuɗaw puɗaway misi angi hay ngi Bumbulvuŋ gar, yo gwat mupuɗaw puɗaway misi a hay buyo gar. Waɗ a hila mizli mijikahay ti jike, a mi nga Zeruzalem a muŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O hooci kaŋŋeeri e cardi e kuuje marɗe saman gonɗe nder haykaliiru Jawmiraawo e gonɗe nder ndesaaje saare laamu fuu. O hooci boo naŋngaaɓe, o lorti haa Samariya.
Fulfulde_DC: O hooci kaŋŋeeri e cardi e kuuje marɗe saman gonɗe nder haykaliiru Jawmiraawo e gonɗe nder ndesaaje saare laamu fuu. O hooci boo naŋngaaɓe, o lorti haa Samariya.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: A̧ kaia o lɔr in bu-mbɔi, o mɔɔ-de-tom n'aa kpaa kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN lɛŋ, in o ŋma dɔka mɔ mgbara mbɔi, kɔ̧ tua ko wannu, a̧ kaia o bara-biro mbɛt, ɓɛɛ a̧ si ɗoŋ sɛn Samarii.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: A̧ kaia o lɔr in bu-mbɔi, o mɔɔ-de-tom n'aa kpaa kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN lɛŋ, in o ŋma dɔka mɔ mgbara mbɔi, kɔ̧ tua ko wannu, a̧ kaia o bara-biro mbɛt, ɓɛɛ a̧ si ɗoŋ sɛn Samarii.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa hɛ fəhwe mze kwa tere tere, mze kwa tɛawetɛa ba'a pɛtɛa wəshi nyi nza zləvə te hɛ nyi mbe ghɛa Mahwətə ba'a nyi ki ghɛa meghe. Pa hɛ keseve mbeli perə, pa hɛ zhɛneghe geva kadzembe Samari.
Tupurri: AÀ kal hoo boo biñni maga hay äi tiñ mani Manwur ni mo äuy, de maga hay wo ti ngeel lag horog mani wañn mo äuy. AÀ kal hoor jar ti dañgay do äe ni lay, kal ferge Samari.

Francais: Le reste des actes de Joas, ce qu'il a fait, et comment il combattit avec Amasias, roi de Juda, cela n'est-il pas écrit dans le livre des Chroniques des rois d'Israël?
Anglais: Now the rest of the acts of Jehoash which he did, and his might, and how he fought with Amaziah king of Judah, are they not written in the book of the chronicles of the kings of Israel?
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Caw lopna vi Yowas ma hinina, sle ma nam lum kafna, lop ŋulo ma nam lumna, duur ma nam lum hiɗi Amatsiya mulla vi Yudana, kayni ka ɗoy hay ɗerwelda vi Labar-Ma-Liyna vi muliyana vi Israyel.
Bulu: Mimboone mivoʼo Yôas, mam mese a nga bo, éwôlô jé, bita ba Amatsia njô bôte ya Yuda be nga bo mam mete me ne ntilan e kalate minkañete bejô bôte ya Israél.
Guiziga: Zoˀasa, ɓi naŋ mekelemey mindirama, slra naŋ miga taŋ gar ati vurumoy naŋ miga ati Amasiya, buy Zuda gar na, i mutoho taŋ le angi ɗerewol mazilaka Ɗerewol ngi ɓi ngi slra ngi buy Israyeley.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Luttuɗum haala Yo'as e kuuɗe mum e baawɗe mum, no o haɓri bee Amasiya, laamiiɗo Yahuuda boo, ɗum winndaama nder deftere Habaruuji Nyalaaɗe nde Laamiiɓe Isra'iila.
Fulfulde_DC: Luttuɗum haala Yo'as e kuuɗe mum e baawɗe mum, no o haɓri bee Amasiya, laamiiɗo Yahuuda boo, ɗum winndaama nder deftere Habaruuji Nyalaaɗe nde Laamiiɓe Isra'iila.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Oi o tom ko Jɔas, mɔ n'aa dea, o ŋgaŋamɔ kɔ̧-a̧, in o biro kɔ̧-a̧ in Amasia wannu Juda yɔra zaŋ Kalata Nyɛrɛ ko o wannu *Israɛl.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Oi o tom ko Jɔas, mɔ n'aa dea, o ŋgaŋamɔ kɔ̧-a̧, in o biro kɔ̧-a̧ in Amasia wannu Juda yɔra zaŋ Kalata Nyɛrɛ ko o wannu *Israɛl.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma nyi ketene ghena ta Zhowas ne, nahe hɛ kenza kerafe rafe mbe palepa ta wəshi nyi menete ka meghea ka Israyɛl. Mbe gezete wəshi nyi menete ŋkɛ, le hwepe ghə nya menete ŋkɛ le mpa nya mpate hɛ Amasiya meghea ka Zhəwda.
Tupurri: Te joñre Jowasn wo, fen maga aà joñn mo äuy, waçaçre blum äe no, waçaçre durgi maga aà dur de Amatsiya wañ Juda mono, sen wo de yerge äil kefder Kronig wañre ma Israyeln wo no.

Francais: Joas se coucha avec ses pères, et il fut enterré à Samarie, avec les rois d'Israël. Jéroboam, son fils, régna à sa place.
Anglais: And Jehoash slept with his fathers, and was buried in Samaria with the kings of Israel; and Jeroboam his son reigned in his stead.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Yowas miti kuɗ sumiyamu, nisi pum hay Samariya kat muliyana vi Israyel. Goora valamu Yerobowam ti mulda hay baŋalamu may.
Bulu: Ane Yôas baa bʼésaa be nga bômbô vôme wua, a nga jambe e Samari baa be bejô bôte ya Israél. E mone wé Yérôbôam a nga jôô éjiane jé.
Guiziga: Zoˀas a mucu, a dikaka a Samari a ciki dideˀ naŋ, buy Israyeley. Mangal naŋ Zeroboˀam a zuɓa li naŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yo'as maayi. Ɓe uwi mo haa Samariya, baŋnge genaale laamiiɓe Isra'iila. Ɓiyiiko Yerobo'am laami haa pellel maako.
Fulfulde_DC: Yo'as maayi. Ɓe uwi mo haa Samariya, baŋnge genaale laamiiɓe Isra'iila. Ɓiyiiko Yerobo'am laami haa pellel maako.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Jɔas fea si ɗoŋ o dáà kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ wa gun a̧ sɛn Samarii in o wannu *Israɛl. Bem kɔ̧-a̧ Jeroboam ɔɔ wan oi-aa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Jɔas fea si ɗoŋ o dáà kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ wa gun a̧ sɛn Samarii in o wannu *Israɛl. Bem kɔ̧-a̧ Jeroboam ɔɔ wan oi-aa.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kwa mte Zhowas ne, pa mbeli lamte ŋkɛ kwa kwele ta ka meghea ka Israyɛl. Zhɛrobowam wəzege ta ŋkɛ nde kelete meghe kwa sebe ta ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: Jowas kal sugi go äiñ paçaçre äe wo, aè kal teege äe Samari äiñ wañre ma Israyeln wo no. Je ni äe Jerobowam kal joñ wañ ti ngeel äe.

Francais: Amasias, fils de Joas, roi de Juda, vécut quinze ans après la mort de Joas, fils de Joachaz, roi d'Israël.
Anglais: And Amaziah the son of Joash king of Judah lived after the death of Jehoash son of Jehoahaz king of Israel fifteen years.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Amatsiya goora vi Yowas, mulla vi Yuda, li busat doogo yam vasl bugol mitta vi Yowas goora vi Yowahaz mulla vi Israyel.
Bulu: Amatsia, e mone Yôas, njô bôte ya Yuda, a nga nyiñ mimbu awôm a mitan e mvus awu Yôas e mone Yôakaz, njô bôte ya Israél.
Guiziga: Amasiya, mangal ngi Zoˀas, buy Zuda, a dirba muc ngi Zoˀas, mangal ngi Zoˀakas na, a gi vi kuruˀ nga zlum ava ma.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ammaa ɓaawo maayde Yo'as ɓii Yo'ahas, laamiiɗo Isra'iila, Amasiya ɓii Yo'as, laamiiɗo Yahuuda tokki yeeɗugo duuɓi sappo e jowi.
Fulfulde_DC: Ammaa ɓaawo maayde Yo'as ɓii Yo'ahas, laamiiɗo Isra'iila, Amasiya ɓii Yo'as, laamiiɗo Yahuuda tokki yeeɗugo duuɓi sappo e jowi.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Amasia bem ko Jɔas, wannu Juda duka zu nù pɛ ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ ɗoŋ fio ko Jɔas, bem ko Jɔakaz, wannu *Israɛl.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Amasia bem ko Jɔas, wannu Juda duka zu nù pɛ ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ ɗoŋ fio ko Jɔas, bem ko Jɔakaz, wannu *Israɛl.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kwa sebe ta mte ta Zhowas meghea ka Israyɛl, meŋe mcɛfeghəmbe menete va ta Amasiya meghea ka Zhəwda kwa sebe ta ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: Amatsiya je ni Jowas wañ ma Judan joñ kiñgi hwal ti dwee blam huli Jowas je ni Yowahas wañ Israyele.

Francais: Le reste des actes d'Amasias n'est-il pas écrit dans le livre des Chroniques des rois de Juda?
Anglais: And the rest of the acts of Amaziah, are they not written in the book of the chronicles of the kings of Judah?
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Caw lopna vi Amatsiya ma hinina, kayni ka ɗoy hay ɗerwelda vi Labar-Ma-Liyna vi muliyana vi Yuda.
Bulu: Mimboon mivoʼo Amatsia, a nga bo, mi ne ntilan e kalate minkañete bejô bôte ya Yuda.
Guiziga: Ɓi ngi slra ngi Amasiya mekelemey mindiram na, i mutoho taŋ le angi ɗerewol mazilaka Ɗerewol ngi ɓi ngi slra ngi buy zudahay.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Luttuɗum haala Amasiya winndaama nder Deftere Habaruuji Nyalaaɗe nde Laamiiɓe Yahuuda.
Fulfulde_DC: Luttuɗum haala Amasiya winndaama nder Deftere Habaruuji Nyalaaɗe nde Laamiiɓe Yahuuda.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Oi o dɔka tom ko Amasia yɔra zaŋ Kalata Nyɛrɛ ko o wannu Juda.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Oi o dɔka tom ko Amasia yɔra zaŋ Kalata Nyɛrɛ ko o wannu Juda.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma nyi ketene ghena ta Amasiya ne nahe hɛ kenza kerafe rafe mbe palepa nya nza slene ta ka meghea ka Zhəwda mbe hɛ.
Tupurri: Te joñre Amatsiyan de yerge äil kefder Kronig wañre ma Judan wo no.

Francais: On ourdit contre lui une conspiration à Jérusalem, et il s'enfuit à Lachis; mais on envoya après lui des hommes à Lachis, et on l'y mit à mort.
Anglais: Now they made a conspiracy against him in Jerusalem: and he fled to Lachish; but they sent after him to Lachish, and slew him there.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi fok kulo kalamu hay Yerusalem, nam pir goy hay Lakis, ɗawni nisi cum goyo.
Bulu: Be nga kômesane wôé nye e Yérusalém, ane a nga tup e Lakis; ve be nga tôñe nye e Lakis wé, a vôm ate nye be nga wôé nye.
Guiziga: Mizli a gam gidiɓi ar Amasiya a Zeruzaleme, a kil nga Lakis. Amma a slinam mizli, a sipakaŋ nga Lakise, a kiɗaka a diga vagay.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe tuurtani mo haa Urusaliima. O doggi haa Lakis. Ammaa ɓe neli ɗaɓɓitoygo mo haa Lakis, ɓe tawi mo, ɓe mbari mo ton.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe tuurtani mo haa Urusaliima. O doggi haa Lakis. Ammaa ɓe neli ɗaɓɓitoygo mo haa Lakis, ɓe tawi mo, ɓe mbari mo ton.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa baa ɗaŋ keta zu a̧ sɛn Jerusalɛm, ɓɛɛ a̧ yu mɔ yak si Lakis. Wa toma o bíí ndak ɗoŋ-aa nɛ́ɛ̀ gbɛ a̧ hi̧i̧.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa baa ɗaŋ keta zu a̧ sɛn Jerusalɛm, ɓɛɛ a̧ yu mɔ yak si Lakis. Wa toma o bíí ndak ɗoŋ-aa nɛ́ɛ̀ gbɛ a̧ hi̧i̧.
Kapsiki_DC: Kwa Zhɛrəzalɛm ne, pa mbeli tsate ghena yitea Amasiya. Pa ŋkɛ hwɛnyɛ kadzembe Lakish. Pa mbeli kekave ŋkɛ ba'a peslekɛ ŋkɛ te ŋkwa shɛ.
Tupurri: AÀ kal mañ äaale äe Jerusalem, se kal dañge wo go de ëee Lakis ti ngeel maga aè 'warn wo go ni mono.

Francais: On le transporta sur des chevaux, et il fut enterré à Jérusalem avec ses pères, dans la cité de David.
Anglais: And they brought him on horses: and he was buried at Jerusalem with his fathers in the city of David.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi ziyim kulo kay kulumna, hotomay hay Yerusalem, nisi pum kat sumiyamu hay hoyok-ziyna vi David.
Bulu: Be nga beʼe nye e bikabela yôp a be nga jame nye e Yérusalém baa bʼésaa e tisone David.
Guiziga: Akẽh na, a zuɓaka vagay naŋ ti pilisey, ara dikaka a Zeruzalem, a ciki zivi ngi dideˀ naŋhay.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe njahri ɓanndu maako bee pucci haa Urusaliima, ɓe uwi mo baŋnge genaale kaakiraaɓe maako nder Berniwol Daawuda.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe njahri ɓanndu maako bee pucci haa Urusaliima, ɓe uwi mo baŋnge genaale kaakiraaɓe maako nder Berniwol Daawuda.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa baa wɔr-aa nɛ̀ nyaŋa sinɛ Jerusalɛm, ɓɛɛ wa gun a̧ in o dáà kɔ̧-a̧, sɛn *Ye ko David.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa baa wɔr-aa nɛ̀ nyaŋa sinɛ Jerusalɛm, ɓɛɛ wa gun a̧ in o dáà kɔ̧-a̧, sɛn *Ye ko David.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa mbeli keleke wəndə kemte mtea ŋkɛ kase kadzembe Zhɛrəzalɛm kwa wəmata, kwele kwele gədəwə yite kantsehe, pa mbeli lamte ŋkɛ kwa kwele ta mbelia nci te meleme ta David.
Tupurri: AÀ kal mañge äe le ti piiri wo, aè kal nduugi teege äe Jerusalem äiñ paçaçre äe wo äi leege mani Dafid no.

Francais: Et tout le peuple de Juda prit Azarias, qui était âgé de seize ans; et on l'établit roi à la place de son père Amasias.
Anglais: And all the people of Judah took Azariah, which was sixteen years old, and made him king instead of his father Amaziah.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sum sa Israyel kaf vi Azariya, busata valam asay doogo yam karkiya, nisi tunum mulu hay baŋal bulum Amatsiya.
Bulu: Nde bôte bese ya Yuda be nga nyoñ Azaria a too mimbu awôm a misaman, a telé nye njô bôt éjian ésaa wé Amatsia.
Guiziga: Mizli Zudahay gar a zuɓaka mangal naŋ Azariya, a cakaŋ buy ar li ngi cine naŋ Amasiya. Naɓa naŋ ti vi kuruˀ nga merkeɗe.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yahuudu'en fuu koo'i Azariya mo duuɓi mum sappo e joweego, ɓe laamini haa pellel baaba maako Amasiya.
Fulfulde_DC: Yahuudu'en fuu koo'i Azariya mo duuɓi mum sappo e joweego, ɓe laamini haa pellel baaba maako Amasiya.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Azaria  dee pɛ ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk, ɓɛɛ o be Juda lɛŋ hok a̧ mɛ ɔ wan oi dáà kɔ̧-a̧ Amasia.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Azaria  dee pɛ ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk, ɓɛɛ o be Juda lɛŋ hok a̧ mɛ ɔ wan oi dáà kɔ̧-a̧ Amasia.
Kapsiki_DC: Nahe Azariya, wəzege ta Amasiya kemenete va meŋe ŋkwaŋeghəmbe nda veyi ŋkɛ ka Zhəwda kameghe te ŋkwa yitenyɛ.
Tupurri: Ngaäa jar ma Judan äuy kal wo baa Asariya maga kiñgi äe hay hwal ti hiira'a, kal kañge äe wañ ti ngeel pan äe Amatsiya.

Francais: Azarias rebâtit Elath et la ramena à Juda, après que le roi fut couché avec ses pères. --Jéroboam II d'Israël.--
Anglais: He built Elath, and restored it to Judah, after that the king slept with his fathers.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Azariya hot in Elat, nam hota' gaa kuɗ gaŋeraŋa vi Yuda, bugol mitta vi mulla.
Bulu: Nye a nga lôñ Elat a bulane nye éjôé Yuda si a koé na njô bôt a wuya.
Guiziga: Mindira hiri ngi walahay Elat i naŋ, a vula da hirwuy Zuda a muŋ. Hana a gi na a dirba muc ngi cine naŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Kaŋko o nyiɓti Elat, o wartiri ngol nder maral Yahuuda ɓaawo maayde baaba maako.
Fulfulde_DC: Kaŋko o nyiɓti Elat, o wartiri ngol nder maral Yahuuda ɓaawo maayde baaba maako.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Nɛ́ a̧ a̧ ɗafa ye Elat woyo, ɓɛɛ ha̧ siɗoŋ ha̧ Juda, ɗoŋ fio ko dáà kɔ̧-a̧ Amasia.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Nɛ́ a̧ a̧ ɗafa ye Elat woyo, ɓɛɛ ha̧ siɗoŋ ha̧ Juda, ɗoŋ fio ko dáà kɔ̧-a̧ Amasia.
Kapsiki_DC: Gheŋkɛ nde zehwe meleme ta ka Ɛlat, pa zhɛne kaŋate kazhɛnave nda ke meghea ka Zhəwda kwa sebe ta mte ta yitenyɛ.
Tupurri: Hay boo Eliyad diñ se, day fern le nen do Juda blam maga wañ joñ nen da' suli go äiñ paçaçre äe wo mono.

Francais: La quinzième année d'Amasias, fils de Joas, roi de Juda, Jéroboam, fils de Joas roi d'Israël, régna à Samarie; son règne fut de quarante et un ans.
Anglais: In the fifteenth year of Amaziah the son of Joash king of Judah Jeroboam the son of Joash king of Israel began to reign in Samaria, and reigned forty and one years.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay busata doogo yam vaslta vi Amatsiya goora vi Yowas, mulla vi Yuda kayni, Yerobowam goora vi Yowas mulla vi Israyel, ti mulda hay Samariya. Nam ti mulda ir busat dok-fiɗi yam kep.
Bulu: Mbu awôm a tane Amatsia e mone Yôaz, njô bôte ya Yuda a nga jôô, ñwô Yérôbôam, e mone Yôas, a nga tebe njô bôte ya Israél e Samari. A nga jôô nté mimbu mewôm menyin a wua.
Guiziga: Zeroboˀam, mangal ngi Zoˀas, buy Israyel micifi buy madiɗa a Samari na, naɓa Amasiya, mangal ngi Zoˀas, buy Zuda, a ɓul di i vi mukuruˀ nga zlum naŋ angi zuma buyo. Zeroboˀam a zum buy a Samari vi kukur mufaɗ ngaŋ purla.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nder nduuɓu laamu Amasiya ɓii Yo'as laamiiɗo Yahuuda sappo e njowaɓu, Yerobo'am ɓii Yo'as laamani Isra'iila haa Samariya. O laami duuɓi cappanɗe nayi e go'o.
Fulfulde_DC: Nder nduuɓu laamu Amasiya ɓii Yo'as laamiiɗo Yahuuda sappo e njowaɓu, Yerobo'am ɓii Yo'as laamani Isra'iila haa Samariya. O laami duuɓi cappanɗe nayi e go'o.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Amasia bem ko Jɔas ɔɔ wan Juda pɛ ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ, ɓɛɛ Jeroboam bem ko Jɔas ɔ wan *Israɛl sɛn Samarii. A̧ dee pɛ ɓu-naar-zua-kpɔk tɛ wan.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Amasia bem ko Jɔas ɔɔ wan Juda pɛ ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ, ɓɛɛ Jeroboam bem ko Jɔas ɔ wan *Israɛl sɛn Samarii. A̧ dee pɛ ɓu-naar-zua-kpɔk tɛ wan.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma mbe kwa meŋe mcɛfeghəmbe ta va ta Amasiya meghea ka Zhəwda, wəzege ta Zhowas, pa Zhɛrobowam wəzege ta Zhowas meghea ka Israyɛl kelete meghe mbe Samari, pa ŋkɛ menete va wəfaɗemsə kwetɛŋeghəmbe kameghe.
Tupurri: Nen kiñgi ma de hwal ti dwee maga Amatsiya je ni Jowasn ti wañ Juda mono, Jerobowam je ni Jowasn kal joñ wañ ti Israyel Samari. AÀ kal joñ wañ kiñgi do naa ti boñ.

Francais: Il fit ce qui est mal aux yeux de Yahweh; il ne se détourna d'aucun des péchés de Jéroboam, fils de Nabat, qui avait fait pécher Israël.
Anglais: And he did that which was evil in the sight of the  Lord : he departed not from all the sins of Jeroboam the son of Nebat, who made Israel to sin.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam li sle ma joona kir Ma-Vatɗina. Suluk ma Yerobowam goora vi Nebat lumisna, ma nam kal sum sa Israyel hayamna, nam min ja jaram goy hiɗi kaynɗi.
Bulu: A nga bo mam me ne abé e mise me Nti, a nji ke saʼale abé éziñe ya ma Yérôbôam, e mone Nébat, a nga tindi Israél na a bo.
Guiziga: Zeroboˀam a gi di i gwat malambaˀ a mihiri ngi Buymisemuŋ. Mungra ngi Zeroboˀam, mangal ngi Nebat miga, hã a hizigiɗa Israyeley ɓa a gaka na, ko Zeroboˀam a pula gi naŋ mbak le ta.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O waɗi kalluɗum yeeso Jawmiraawo, o accaay waɗugo hakkeeji ɗi Yerobo'am ɓii Nebat nastini Isra'iila'en nder maaji.
Fulfulde_DC: O waɗi kalluɗum yeeso Jawmiraawo, o accaay waɗugo hakkeeji ɗi Yerobo'am ɓii Nebat nastini Isra'iila'en nder maaji.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: A̧ dee mɔ ɗaŋ yí GASA WAN; a̧ e ɗaŋmɔ nɛ̀ Jeroboam bem ko Nɛbat dee so, kai nɛ̀ o be *Israɛl a sɛnɛ‘i kóó kpɔk duk na.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: A̧ dee mɔ ɗaŋ yí GASA WAN; a̧ e ɗaŋmɔ nɛ̀ Jeroboam bem ko Nɛbat dee so, kai nɛ̀ o be *Israɛl a sɛnɛ‘i kóó kpɔk duk na.
Kapsiki_DC: Wəsə nya keɗema kehi yamene ŋkɛ kwa kema ta Mahwətə. Zhɛrobowam wəzege ta Nebat nde tekete nda mene jaɗafa ke mbeli, pa nyagha meghe kamene jaɗafa kala ŋa ŋkɛa shɛ yipə yipə.
Tupurri: AÀ joñ diñ fen maga bay de el nen Manwur wa. AÀ men älagge po maga Jerobowam je ni Nebadn kañ jar Israyel wo joñge äe mo go boñ dra' gaa äuy.

Francais: Il rétablit les limites d'Israël depuis l'entrée d'Emath jusqu'à la mer de l'Arabah, selon la parole de Yahweh, Dieu d'Israël, qu'il avait dite par l'organe de son serviteur Jonas, le prophète, fils d'Amathi, qui était de Geth-Chépher.
Anglais: He restored the coast of Israel from the entering of Hamath unto the sea of the plain, according to the word of the  Lord  God of Israel, which he spake by the hand of his servant Jonah, the son of Amittai, the prophet, which was of Gath–hepher.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam hot tun jaara vi Israyel fokay hay vun Hamat pa, ta-ta hay niy-lumna ma hay liy ma fulla, kuɗ yoboy ma Ma-Vatɗin Lawna vi Israyel dumu vun sa ma jobta valamu Yonas goora vi Amittay, hay Gat-Hefer.
Bulu: A nga beta kôme minné mi si ya Israél, ataté anyiine Amat a kui mañ ya Araba, avale Nti, e Zambe Israél a nga kobô anyu mbo ésaé wé Yôna e mone Amitayi ya Gat-Efer.
Guiziga: Micica hiri ngi maakway ngi ruwuy Israyel na i naŋ, zle avu Lebo-Hamat tir vay muŋ naŋ, sesẽŋ a mimubuliy mumuca tir vay ruwuy naŋ. A gi le kaslsla kaɓa Mingiɓi ngi Bumbulvuŋ Buymisemuŋ, ngi Israyel mubo zleˀe ti balam Zonas, gawla naŋ mijiviɗ, mangal ngi Amitay ngir walahay Gat.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O jaɓti lesɗe ɗe Isra'iila marino fuu, diga nastirde Hamat haa woyla, haa yotti Weendu Araba haa fombina, fodde wolde nde annabi Yonas ɓii Amatay mo Gaat-Hefer wolwiri bana Jawmiraawo, Allah Isra'iila umrino mo .
Fulfulde_DC: O jaɓti lesɗe ɗe Isra'iila marino fuu, diga nastirde Hamat haa woyla, haa yotti Weendu Araba haa fombina, fodde wolde nde annabi Yonas ɓii Amatay mo Gaat-Hefer wolwiri bana Jawmiraawo, Allah Isra'iila umrino mo .
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Nɛ́ a̧ a̧ ɗafa mɔ sɛn nú *Israɛl lɛŋ woyo, ku̧u̧naŋ-a nɛ̀ Lɛbo-Hamat hɔ ká̧ gba-tɔp Araba mɛ, nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko *Israɛl tɔ̧ɔ̧ so nɛ̀ nú Jɔnas *wi-tɔ̧-wen oi nú Sɔ̧, bem ko Amitai, be Gat-Hefɛr.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Nɛ́ a̧ a̧ ɗafa mɔ sɛn nú *Israɛl lɛŋ woyo, ku̧u̧naŋ-a nɛ̀ Lɛbo-Hamat hɔ ká̧ gba-tɔp Araba mɛ, nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko *Israɛl tɔ̧ɔ̧ so nɛ̀ nú Jɔnas *wi-tɔ̧-wen oi nú Sɔ̧, bem ko Amitai, be Gat-Hefɛr.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa kelehwe ŋkwa nyi kaŋa ka Israyɛl, se te Lebo-Hamat laka bela kwa gwela hwa'a kwa Ndərəa Kemte laka bela kwa zeme. Kala nya gezete nde mɛ ŋkwa Zhonas, wəzege ta Amitay nde Gat-Hɛfɛr le ghena nya kese va Shala Mahwətə ta ka Israyɛl.
Tupurri: AÀ fer kne' hagu ma Israyeln ti ngeel äe tï¡ï¡ wer le haçaç Hamade, haçaç nduu go jag maarog ma Araba, ti jag waçaçre maga Manwuri, Baa mani Israyeln hay waçaçn go ne weejoçoç äe Jonas je ni Amittay je ndar nen waçaçre ma jag Baa gon go Gad-Hefer.

Francais: Car Yahweh vit l'affliction très amère d'Israël, où il n'y avait plus ni homme marié, ni homme libre, ni personne pour venir au secours d'Israël.
Anglais: For the  Lord  saw the affliction of Israel, that it was very bitter: for there was not any shut up, nor any left, nor any helper for Israel.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kay Ma-Vatɗina wi sa Israyella kali hay lasta ŋolda hiɗi curoɗta ta suw yamda ta sum sa gorvona hiɗi sa buti goyna kaw ka kali hayta, sa ma co gut kuɗ sa Israyella kep kaw mayɗi.
Bulu: Amu Nti a nga yen mbia ôsame a nga kui e be Israél. Olo ô nji fe bo, nge môte a ne fili, nge môt a volô Israél.
Guiziga: Asi mike na, Buymisemuŋ a pura bonoy mutuwaˀ Israyel masa angi zumabuy naŋ na le. Ti di nah na, ko beke anta mata, diimu anta, mbur ɓa ma kilo widi ngi Israyel loŋ, anta mata si.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ngam Jawmiraawo yi'i bone Isra'iila naawi masin, mawɓe e leesɓe maɓɓe fuu njinni, walaa koo moy ngam wallugo Isra'iila.
Fulfulde_DC: Ngam Jawmiraawo yi'i bone Isra'iila naawi masin, mawɓe e leesɓe maɓɓe fuu njinni, walaa koo moy ngam wallugo Isra'iila.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: GASA WAN zɔka gasa bɔnɛ nɛ̀ o be *Israɛl a̧a̧ so sɛnɛ‘i; kóó ŋma bíí kpɔk mɛ gbak *Israɛl bo so na.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: GASA WAN zɔka gasa bɔnɛ nɛ̀ o be *Israɛl a̧a̧ so sɛnɛ‘i; kóó ŋma bíí kpɔk mɛ gbak *Israɛl bo so na.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kwa nakɛ yaka nya Mahwətə, nya te meghea shɛ. Wəndə shɛ nya kenza kakemanakɛ ka Israyɛl we, ya mava ya mamza.
Tupurri: Werga Manwur hay ko mbuëgi fo maga aà mbuë fo Israyel go de äe debaycoçoçre debañ mo haç' no. AÀma jobo maga hay no boñ kay maga de hay kay Israyel hay bay boñ wa äuy tu.

Francais: Et Yahweh n'avait pas encore résolu d'effacer le nom d'Israël de dessous les cieux, mais il les délivra par la main de Jéroboam, fils de Joas.
Anglais: And the  Lord  said not that he would blot out the name of Israel from under heaven: but he saved them by the hand of Jeroboam the son of Joash.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: May Ma-Vatɗina dikam may varay kay vatsi sesi goyo hay nagatɗi, nam butsi goyo hiɗi ɓam Yerobowam goora vi Yowas.
Bulu: Nti a nji ke jô na a ye tyame jôé Israél e jôbe si. Ajô te ñhe a nga nyii be a wo Yérôbôam e mone Yôas.
Guiziga: Buymisemuŋ a ɓi: i sa susuymo slimiɗ ngi Israyele tisi ruwuyo na, a ɓi ta. Vurˀe, a sa laha taŋ tisi Zeroboˀam, mangal ngi Zoˀas.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Jawmiraawo wi'aay o nattinan asŋgol Isra'iila. Ngam maajum o hisni ɓe bee juŋngo Yerobo'am ɓii Yo'as.
Fulfulde_DC: Jawmiraawo wi'aay o nattinan asŋgol Isra'iila. Ngam maajum o hisni ɓe bee juŋngo Yerobo'am ɓii Yo'as.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ bo nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ so, wi tɛ bi nin *Israɛl yinɛ zu nù na; hegɔ, a̧ ha̧a̧ ŋgai ha̧ Jeroboam bem ko Jɔas mɛ kpasi wa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ bo nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ so, wi tɛ bi nin *Israɛl yinɛ zu nù na; hegɔ, a̧ ha̧a̧ ŋgai ha̧ Jeroboam bem ko Jɔas mɛ kpasi wa.
Kapsiki_DC: Ama kezəzəte Mahwətə kazamte hɛ bətə we. Vatse mbeleke hɛ ŋkɛ shave mbe dzeve ta Zhɛrobowam wəzege ta Zhowas.
Tupurri: Werga Manwur hay de waçaçge ga älag ëu Israyel go ti ngeel ma gesiñ la wa. AÀ kal yaçaç rage go do Jerobowam je ni Jowas no.

Francais: Le reste des actes de Jéroboam, tout ce qu'il a fait, ses exploits, comment il combattit et comment il ramena à Israël Damas et Emath qui avait appartenu à Juda, cela n'est-il pas écrit dans le livre des Chroniques des rois d'Israël?
Anglais: Now the rest of the acts of Jeroboam, and all that he did, and his might, how he warred, and how he recovered Damascus, and Hamath, which belonged to Judah, for Israel, are they not written in the book of the chronicles of the kings of Israel?
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Caw lopna vi Yerobowam ma hinina, slen ma nam lum kafna, sle ŋulo ma nam lum vun duura, nanige Damas hiɗi Hamat ay jew vi Yuda may nam hotsi hay gaŋeraŋa vi Israyel, kayni kaf ka ɗoy hay ɗerwelda vi Labar-Ma-Liyna vi muliyana vi Israyel.
Bulu: Mimboon mivoʼo Yérôbôam, mam mese a nga bo, mindañane mié, mewosane mé a nga bulane ve Israél Damas a Amat mbe be nga wôʼa Yuda melu mvus, mam mete me ne ntilan e kalate minkañete bejô bôte ya Israél.
Guiziga: Zeroboˀama, ɓi naŋ mekelemey mindirama, slra naŋhay ati gwat madiɗahay naŋ miga taŋ gar, wirwir naŋ ngi gi vurumoy gar na, i mutoho taŋ le angi ɗerewol mazilaka Ɗerewol ngi ɓi ngi slra ngi buy Zudahay. Yo hirwuy Damas ati Hamat, hirwuy Zuda mawa taŋ zleˀe gar na, i mutoho ɓi taŋ le gar angi ɗerewol nah.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Luttuɗum haala Yerobo'am e kuuɗe mum fuu e baawɗe mum, no o haɓri, o wartiri Damas e Hamat berniiji ɗi Yahuuda marno nder maral Isra'iila, ɗum winndaama nder Deftere Habaruuji Nyalaaɗe nde Laamiiɓe Isra'iila.
Fulfulde_DC: Luttuɗum haala Yerobo'am e kuuɗe mum fuu e baawɗe mum, no o haɓri, o wartiri Damas e Hamat berniiji ɗi Yahuuda marno nder maral Isra'iila, ɗum winndaama nder Deftere Habaruuji Nyalaaɗe nde Laamiiɓe Isra'iila.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Oi o tom ko Jeroboam, mɔ lɛŋ n'aa dea, o ŋgaŋamɔ kɔ̧-a̧ in o biro kɔ̧-a̧ yɔra zaŋ Kalata Nyɛrɛ ko o wannu *Israɛl. A̧ baa Damas in Hamat nɛ̀ Juda baa so piinɛ ɗoŋ ha̧ *Israɛl.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Oi o tom ko Jeroboam, mɔ lɛŋ n'aa dea, o ŋgaŋamɔ kɔ̧-a̧ in o biro kɔ̧-a̧ yɔra zaŋ Kalata Nyɛrɛ ko o wannu *Israɛl. A̧ baa Damas in Hamat nɛ̀ Juda baa so piinɛ ɗoŋ ha̧ *Israɛl.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma ghena ta Zhɛrobowam nyi ketene ne, nahe hɛ kenza kerafe rafe mbe palepa nyi nza slene ta ka meghea ka Israyɛl. Kageze pɛtɛa wəshi nyi menete ŋkɛ, ntsə geva ta ŋkɛ mbe mpa ba'a tsema tsema zhɛnave nda Damas ba'a Hamat, meleme nyi kese mbe hɛɗi meghea David ŋkɛ ke Israyɛl.
Tupurri: Te joñre Jerobowam wo no, fen maga aà joñ ne mo äuy, waçaçre blum äen jag durgi wo, ti ngeel maga aà joñ nen fer jar Israyel le ti maga aà hay wo nen do Damas wo de Hamad maga hay wo diñ ma Juda mono. Sen wo de yerge äil kefder Kronig wañre ma Israyel wo no.

Francais: Jéroboam se coucha avec ses pères, avec les rois d'Israël; et Zacharias, son fils, régna à sa place.
Anglais: And Jeroboam slept with his fathers, even with the kings of Israel; and Zachariah his son reigned in his stead.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Yerobowam miti kuɗ sumiyamu, sa muliyana vi Israyel. Zakariya goora valamu ti mulda hay baŋalamu may.
Bulu: Ane Yérôbôam a nga bômbô baa bʼésaa a bejô bôte ya Israél vôme wua. E mone wé Zakari a nga jôô éjiane jé.
Guiziga: Zeroboˀam a mucu, a dikaka angi zivi ngi dideˀ naŋ, buy Israyeley a Samari. Mangal naŋ Zakari a zuɓa li naŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nde Yerobo'am maayi, ɓe uwi mo haa Samariya baŋnge genaale laamiiɓe Isra'iila. Ɓiyiiko Zekariya laami haa pellel maako.
Fulfulde_DC: Nde Yerobo'am maayi, ɓe uwi mo haa Samariya baŋnge genaale laamiiɓe Isra'iila. Ɓiyiiko Zekariya laami haa pellel maako.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Jeroboam fea, ɓɛɛ wa gun a̧ in o dáà kɔ̧-a̧, o wannu *Israɛl. Bem kɔ̧-a̧ Zakarii ɔɔ wan oi-aa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Jeroboam fea, ɓɛɛ wa gun a̧ in o dáà kɔ̧-a̧, o wannu *Israɛl. Bem kɔ̧-a̧ Zakarii ɔɔ wan oi-aa.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kwa mte Zhɛrobowam, pa mbeli lamte ŋkɛ mbe Samari kwa kwele ta ka meghea ka Israyɛl, Zakari wəzege ta ŋkɛ nde kelete meghe te ŋkwa ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: Jerobowam kal sugi go äiñ paçaçre äe wo, äiñ wañre ma Israyel wo. Je ni äe Sakari kal joñ wañ ti ngeel äe.

Francais: IV.-- FIN DU ROYAUME D'ISRAËL.
Anglais: __Error__
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Amatsiya mulla vi Yuda
Bulu: Amatsia, njô bôte ya Yuda
Guiziga: Amasiya, buy Zuda
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Laamu Amasiya haa Yahuuda
Fulfulde_DC: Laamu Amasiya haa Yahuuda
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Amasia wannu Juda
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Amasia wannu Juda
Kapsiki_DC: Amasiya meghea ka Zhəwda
Tupurri: Amatsiya kol ti wañ Juda

Francais: La vingt-septième année de Jéroboam, roi d'Israël, régna Azarias, fils d'Amasias, roi de Juda.
Anglais: In the twenty and seventh year of Jeroboam king of Israel began Azariah son of Amaziah king of Judah to reign.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Co hay busata dok-ma' yam siɗiyata vi Yerobowam mulla vi Israyel kayni, Azariya goora vi Amatsiya, mulla vi Yuda ti mulda.
Bulu: Mbu mewôm mebaé a zamgbwale Yérôbôam, njô bôte ya Israél, a nga jôô, ñwô Azaria e mone Amatsia a nga tebe njô bôte ya Yuda.
Guiziga: Azariya, mangal ngi Amasiya micifi buy madiɗa Zuda na, naɓa Zeroboˀam, buy Israyel a ɓul di i vi mukur cuw nga tarnaˀ naŋ angi zuma buyo.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nder nduuɓu laamu Yerobo'am laamiiɗo Isra'iila noogas e njoweeɗiɗaɓu, Azariya ɓii Amasiya laami haa Yahuuda.
Fulfulde_DC: Nder nduuɓu laamu Yerobo'am laamiiɗo Isra'iila noogas e njoweeɗiɗaɓu, Azariya ɓii Amasiya laami haa Yahuuda.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Jeroboam wannu *Israɛl ɔɔ wan pɛ ɓu-yiitoo-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo, ɓɛɛ Azaria bem ko Amasia wannu Juda ɔ wan.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Jeroboam wannu *Israɛl ɔɔ wan pɛ ɓu-yiitoo-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo, ɓɛɛ Azaria bem ko Amasia wannu Juda ɔ wan.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma mbe kwa bakemsə mberefaŋeghəmbe ta va ta Zhɛrobowam mbe meghe te ghəa ka Israyɛl ne, Azariya wəzege ta Amasiya nde kelete meghe mbe Zhəwda.
Tupurri: Nen kiñgi ma de do äog ti renam maga Jerobowam ti wañ Israyel mono, Asariya je ni Amatsiyan kal joñ wañ ti Juda.

Francais: Il avait seize ans lorsqu'il devint roi, et il régna cinquante-deux ans à Jérusalem. Sa mère se nommait Jéchélia, de Jérusalem.
Anglais: Sixteen years old was he when he began to reign, and he reigned two and fifty years in Jerusalem. And his mother's name was Jecoliah of Jerusalem.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Busata valam doogo yam karkiya hay li ma nam tun hay mulda. Nam ti mulda ir busat dok-vasl yam ma' hay Yerusalem. sulum ya' Yekoliya, ti goot ta Yerusalemta.
Bulu: A nga bili mimbu awôm a misaman éyoñ a nga tebe njô bôt; a nga jôô nté mimbu mewôm metan a mibaé e Yérusalém. Nyia a mbe jôé na Yekôliahu, ngone ya Yérusalém.
Guiziga: Naŋ micifi buy madiɗa na, naɓa naŋ ti vi kuruˀ nga merkeɗe. A zum buy a Zeruzaleme vi kukur zlum ngaŋ cuw. A zilaka mumuŋ Yekoliya, zuŋ Zeruzalem.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O woodi duuɓi sappo e joweego, saa'i o laamo. O laami haa Urusaliima duuɓi cappanɗe jowi e ɗiɗi. Innde daada maako, Yekolyahu mo Urusaliima.
Fulfulde_DC: O woodi duuɓi sappo e joweego, saa'i o laamo. O laami haa Urusaliima duuɓi cappanɗe jowi e ɗiɗi. Innde daada maako, Yekolyahu mo Urusaliima.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: A̧ a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ pɛ ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk ŋgimbi n'aa ɔɔ nɛ̀ wan, ɓɛɛ a̧ ɔ wan Jerusalɛm tɛ pɛ ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-zua-yiitoo; nin nàà kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ́ Yɛkɔlia zɔŋa Jeruslaɛm.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: A̧ a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ pɛ ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk ŋgimbi n'aa ɔɔ nɛ̀ wan, ɓɛɛ a̧ ɔ wan Jerusalɛm tɛ pɛ ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-zua-yiitoo; nin nàà kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ́ Yɛkɔlia zɔŋa Jeruslaɛm.
Kapsiki_DC: Va ta ŋkɛ meŋe ŋkwaŋeghəmbe nda dzembe meghe ŋkɛ, pa ŋkɛ menete va mcɛfemsə bakeghəmbe kameghe mbe Zhɛrəzalɛm. Wəzha ta ka Zhɛrəzalɛm meghekɛ, Yekoliya sləa nta.
Tupurri: AÀ nduu ti wañ mono kiñgi äe hay hwal ti hiira'a. AÀ joñ wañ Jerusalem kiñgi do dwee ti äoge. Ëu man äe hay ga Yekolyahu ma Jerusalem.

Francais: Il fit ce qui est droit aux yeux de Yahweh, selon tout ce qu'avait fait Amasias, son père.
Anglais: And he did that which was right in the sight of the  Lord , according to all that his father Amaziah had done;
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam li sle ma ɗigera kir Ma-Vatɗina, ŋray ca ki bulum Amatsiya li'ays nala.
Bulu: A nga bo mam me ne mvaé e mise me Nti; a nga bo jam ese ane ésaa wé Amatsia.
Guiziga: Azariya a gi di i gwat mikaslsla a mihiri ngi Buymisemuŋ. A ga heˀ kaɓa ngi cine naŋ Amasiya.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O waɗi ko fottani Jawmiraawo, bana ko baaba maako Amasiya waɗno fuu.
Fulfulde_DC: O waɗi ko fottani Jawmiraawo, bana ko baaba maako Amasiya waɗno fuu.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: A̧ dee mɔ nɛ̀ de-a yí GASA WAN, kànà hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ dáà kɔ̧-a̧ Amasia dee so ga.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: A̧ dee mɔ nɛ̀ de-a yí GASA WAN, kànà hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ dáà kɔ̧-a̧ Amasia dee so ga.
Kapsiki_DC: Wəsə nya kehi yamene Azariya kwa ta Mahwətə, kala yitenyɛ Amasiya.
Tupurri: AÀ joñ fen ma de deele nen Manwur go ti ngeel wo äuy do maga pan äe Amatsiya hay joñ no lay.

Francais: Seulement les hauts lieux ne disparurent point; le peuple continuait à offrir des sacrifices et des parfums sur les hauts lieux.
Anglais: Save that the high places were not removed: the people sacrificed and burnt incense still on the high places.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: May liyn ma ini kulo ɗiŋiriŋŋa may vat goy noŋɗi; hay na'ta sumun ka li ɗifini, ŋal urdin kaw kayni kulo hay liy ma ɗiŋiriŋŋa.
Bulu: Vʼakôsa bo nalé, bito ya bikôndôʼô yôp bi nji ke vas; bôt be nga ke ôsu a ve mimvean a beôlobinda e bito ya bikôndôʼô yôp.
Guiziga: Na kwana, li miɗingir ɗingirey magam mikulihey angi taŋ na, a susuymom avra ta ɓula. Mizli a roko gam mikulihey, yo a roko wuram urdihey angi taŋ aruŋ na si.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ammaa o nattinaay nokkuuje towɗe, yimɓe tokki yahugo lii'aago kirseteeɗi dabbaaji e wulugo uurle haa maaje.
Fulfulde_DC: Ammaa o nattinaay nokkuuje towɗe, yimɓe tokki yahugo lii'aago kirseteeɗi dabbaaji e wulugo uurle haa maaje.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Mɔ kpɔk, o *kusa-fara kaɗi na, ɓɛɛ o bíí ɓɔn tɛ ɗafa sɔ̧, dɔ nɛ̀ fuu-nyama fara-gasi o géé-sɔ̧ nɔ‘i.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Mɔ kpɔk, o *kusa-fara kaɗi na, ɓɛɛ o bíí ɓɔn tɛ ɗafa sɔ̧, dɔ nɛ̀ fuu-nyama fara-gasi o géé-sɔ̧ nɔ‘i.
Kapsiki_DC: Ya tsagha shɛ ŋkɛ ne, ashɛ keŋzlamte kələŋə nyi dzeghe melɛ mbeli te we. Mba mbeli kalə dzeghe melɛ le wəshi keseɗa ba'a katere 'wərdə kwa hə hə.
Tupurri: Diñ ga ngeel sië jag ma de farge ciñn taw wo go gaè. Jarn hay wo mbaara jag joñ sië jag wo, hay wo mbaara roë feçeçre foçoçre no ti ngeel sië jag ma de farge ciñn wo ëa.

Francais: Yahweh frappa le roi, qui fut lépreux jusqu'au jour de sa mort et demeura dans une maison écartée. Joatham, fils du roi, était à la tête de la maison, jugeant le peuple du pays.
Anglais: And the  Lord  smote the king, so that he was a leper unto the day of his death, and dwelt in a several house. And Jotham the king's son was over the house, judging the people of the land.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ma-Vatɗina wat mulla, moy-kuturun vumu. Nam mus hay ziy ta goy va' kepta ta-ta hay buur ma mitta valamu. Yotam goora vi mulla ay tuni mi ma ŋolla hay ziyna, ka kitat sumun hay nagat kayn mi namu.
Bulu: Nti a nga bôme njô bôt a ôkone zam , akekui e môs a nga wu, ajô te a nga too e nda é tele étam. Yôtam, e mone njô bôt, a nga jôô mame ya nda a jôʼô fe bôte ya si.
Guiziga: Buymisemuŋ a ga buyo a ngil kukula, hã avu hin ngi muc naŋ. A cifi angi hay naŋ baˀ avu mizli. Mangal naŋ Yotam, madiɗa ngi hay buyo a wa mizli ngi si ruwuyo.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Jawmiraawo ukkani laamiiɗo saɗawre haa yotti nyalaade maayde maako. O jooɗi nder suudu yeewndu. Yotam, ɓii laamiiɗo woni kaliifaajo laamorde, kaŋko ta'anta yimɓe lesdi kiita.
Fulfulde_DC: Jawmiraawo ukkani laamiiɗo saɗawre haa yotti nyalaade maayde maako. O jooɗi nder suudu yeewndu. Yotam, ɓii laamiiɗo woni kaliifaajo laamorde, kaŋko ta'anta yimɓe lesdi kiita.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: GASA WAN pi̧i̧ zɛɛ-doko tɛ wannu Azaria hegɔ hɔ wese fio kɔ̧-a̧. A̧ ɔ so kɔ̧ ŋma tua ɛ̀nɛ́-a, ɓɛɛ bem kɔ̧-a̧ Yotam, gasa wi-pɛm-kira ɔ wan oi nú-a tɛ ŋgimbi zɛɛ kɔ̧-a̧.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: GASA WAN pi̧i̧ zɛɛ-doko tɛ wannu Azaria hegɔ hɔ wese fio kɔ̧-a̧. A̧ ɔ so kɔ̧ ŋma tua ɛ̀nɛ́-a, ɓɛɛ bem kɔ̧-a̧ Yotam, gasa wi-pɛm-kira ɔ wan oi nú-a tɛ ŋgimbi zɛɛ kɔ̧-a̧.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa Mahwətə vate zereghwe ta derena kwele kwele te meghe Azariya: mba derena shɛ te pa te mte ta ŋkɛ. Pa kanza le ŋa ŋkɛ ghɛ cakeɗa cakeɗa le mbeli. Wəzege ta ŋkɛ Yotam, wəndə kwele nya te ghəa ghɛa meghe, pa kasleke mbeli nyi te hɛɗia shɛ.
Tupurri: Manwur kal caa ci wañ go, maga joñ go de ci haçaç wur huli äe, day hay go de hayle äi tiñ maga go de see äe tawa. Yotam je ni wañn hay diñ je äe maga de kolge ti tiñ no, hay waçaç waçaçre jar ma ti sir no.

Francais: Le reste des actes d'Azarias, et tout ce qu'il a fait, cela n'est-il pas écrit dans le livre des Chroniques des rois de Juda?
Anglais: And the rest of the acts of Azariah, and all that he did, are they not written in the book of the chronicles of the kings of Judah?
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Caw lopna vi Azariya ma hinina, sle ma nam lum kafna, kayni ka ɗoy hay ɗerwelda vi Labar-Ma-Liyna vi muliyana vi Yuda.
Bulu: Mimboon mivoʼo Azaria, mam mese a nga bo, me ne ntilan e kalate minkañete bejô bôte ya Yuda.
Guiziga: Is ngi slra ngi Oziyas ati gwat naŋ miga taŋ gar na, i mutoho taŋ le angi ɗerewol mazilaka Ɗerewol ngi buy Zudahay.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Luttuɗum haala Azariya e kuuɗe mum fuu, ɗum winndaama nder Deftere Habaruuji Nyalaaɗe nde Laamiiɓe Yahuuda.
Fulfulde_DC: Luttuɗum haala Azariya e kuuɗe mum fuu, ɗum winndaama nder Deftere Habaruuji Nyalaaɗe nde Laamiiɓe Yahuuda.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Oi o tom ko Azaria, mɔ lɛŋ n'aa dea yɔra zaŋ Kalata Nyɛrɛ ko o wannu Juda.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Oi o tom ko Azaria, mɔ lɛŋ n'aa dea yɔra zaŋ Kalata Nyɛrɛ ko o wannu Juda.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma nyi ketene ghena ta Azariya ne, nahe hɛ kenza kerafe rafe mbe palepa ta wəshi nyi menete ka meghea ka Zhəwda.
Tupurri: Te joñre Asariyan wo, fen maga aà joñn mo äuy, sen wo de yerge äil kefder Kronig wañre ma Judan wo no.

Francais: Azarias se coucha avec ses pères, et on l'enterra avec ses pères dans la cité de David; et Joatham, son fils, régna à sa place. --Zacharie d'Israël.--
Anglais: So Azariah slept with his fathers; and they buried him with his fathers in the city of David: and Jotham his son reigned in his stead.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Azariya mitiya, nisi pum tam sumiyamu, hay hoyok-ziyna vi David. Goora valam Yotam ti mulda hay baŋalamu.
Bulu: Azaria a nga bômbô baa bʼésaa, a be nga jame nye baa bʼésaa e tisone David. Mone wé Yôtam a nga jôô éjiane jé.
Guiziga: Azariya a mucu, a dikaka a ciki dideˀ naŋhay angi Walahay ngi Daviti. Dar mangal naŋ Yotam a zum buy ar li naŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nde Azariya maayi, ɓe uwi mo baŋnge genaale kaakiraaɓe maako nder Berniwol Daawuda. Ɓiyiiko Yotam laami haa pellel maako .
Fulfulde_DC: Nde Azariya maayi, ɓe uwi mo baŋnge genaale kaakiraaɓe maako nder Berniwol Daawuda. Ɓiyiiko Yotam laami haa pellel maako .
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Azaria fea si ɗoŋ o dáà kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ wa gun a̧ *Ye ko David in o dáà kɔ̧-a̧. Bem kɔ̧-a̧ Yotam ɔɔ wan oi-aa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Azaria fea si ɗoŋ o dáà kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ wa gun a̧ *Ye ko David in o dáà kɔ̧-a̧. Bem kɔ̧-a̧ Yotam ɔɔ wan oi-aa.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kwa mte ŋkɛ, pa mbeli lamte ŋkɛ kwa kwele ta mbelia nci mbe meleme ta David. Yotam, wəzege ta ŋkɛ nde kelete meghe te ŋkwa ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: Asariya kal sugi go äiñ paçaçre äe wo, aà kal teege äe go äiñ paçaçre äe wo äi leege mani Dafid no. Je ni äe Jotam kal joñ wañ ti ngeel äe.

Francais: La trente-huitième année d'Azarias, roi de Juda, Zacharie, fils de Jéroboam, régna sur Israël à Samarie; son règne fut de six mois.
Anglais: In the thirty and eighth year of Azariah king of Judah did Zachariah the son of Jeroboam reign over Israel in Samaria six months.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Co hay busata dok-ɦidi yam glafandita vi Azariya mulla vi Yuda kayni, Zakariya goora vi Yerobowam ti mulda kay sa Israyella hay Samariya. Nam ti mulda ir til karkiya.
Bulu: Mbu mewôm mela a muam Azaria njô bôte ya Yuda a nga jôô, ñwô Zakari, e mone Yérôbôam, a nga tebe njô bôte ya Israél tañe ngon ésaman e Samari.
Guiziga: Zakari, mangal ngi Zeroboˀam, micifi buy madiɗa Israyel na, naɓa Azariya, buy Zuda a ɓul di i vi mizli ngir makir nga dangafaɗ naŋ angi zuma buyo. Zakari a zum buyo vi merkeɗe a Samari.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nder nduuɓu laamu Azariya, laamiiɗo Yahuuda cappanɗe tati e njoweetataɓu, Zekariya ɓii Yerobo'am laami haa Isra'iila. O laami haa Samariya lebbi joweego.
Fulfulde_DC: Nder nduuɓu laamu Azariya, laamiiɗo Yahuuda cappanɗe tati e njoweetataɓu, Zekariya ɓii Yerobo'am laami haa Isra'iila. O laami haa Samariya lebbi joweego.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Azaria ɔɔ wan Juda tɛ pɛ ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar, ɓɛɛ Zakarii bem ko Jeroboam ɔ wan *Israɛl sɛn Samarii tɛ fio-zɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Azaria ɔɔ wan Juda tɛ pɛ ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar, ɓɛɛ Zakarii bem ko Jeroboam ɔ wan *Israɛl sɛn Samarii tɛ fio-zɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma mbe va ta Azariya mahekenemsə degheseghəmbe mbe meghea ka Zhəwda, Zakari wəzege ta Zhɛrobowam ya kameghea ka Israyɛl mbe Samari. Deke ŋkwaŋe terea ŋkɛ mbe meghe.
Tupurri: Nen kiñgi ma de do swa' ti nenma' maga Asariya ti wañ Juda mono, Sakari je ni Jerobowamn kal joñ wañ ti Israyel Samari few hiira'a.

Francais: Il fit ce qui est mal aux yeux de Yahweh, comme avaient fait ses pères; il ne se détourna pas des péchés de Jéroboam, fils de Nabat, qui avait fait pécher Israël.
Anglais: And he did that which was evil in the sight of the  Lord , as his fathers had done: he departed not from the sins of Jeroboam the son of Nebat, who made Israel to sin.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam li slen ma joo'o kir Ma-Vatɗina, ki sumiyam li'ays nala; suluk ma Yerobowam goora vi Nebat kal sum sa Israyel hayna nam min ja jaram goy hiɗi namɗi.
Bulu: A nga bo mam me nʼabé e mise me Nti avale bʼésaa be nga bo; a nji saʼale mbia mimboone Yérôbôam, e mone Nébat, mmie a nga dutu Israél na a bo.
Guiziga: Zakari a gi di i gwat malambaˀ a mihiri ngi Buymisemuŋ kaɓa dideˀ naŋhay zleˀe na ya. Mungra ngi Zeroboˀam miga zleˀe, hã a hizigiɗa Israyeley ɓa a gam aya na, Zakari a pula gi naŋ mbak le ta.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O waɗi kalluɗum yeeso Jawmiraawo, bana kaakiraaɓe maako kal-kal. O accaay waɗugo hakkeeji ɗi Yerobo'am ɓii Nebat nastini Isra'iila'en nder maaji.
Fulfulde_DC: O waɗi kalluɗum yeeso Jawmiraawo, bana kaakiraaɓe maako kal-kal. O accaay waɗugo hakkeeji ɗi Yerobo'am ɓii Nebat nastini Isra'iila'en nder maaji.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Zakarii dee mɔ ɗaŋ yí GASA WAN hee o dáà kɔ̧-a̧ ga; a̧ e ɗaŋmɔ nɛ̀ Jeroboam bem ko Nɛbat dee so kai nɛ̀ o be *Israɛl a sɛnɛ‘i duk na.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Zakarii dee mɔ ɗaŋ yí GASA WAN hee o dáà kɔ̧-a̧ ga; a̧ e ɗaŋmɔ nɛ̀ Jeroboam bem ko Nɛbat dee so kai nɛ̀ o be *Israɛl a sɛnɛ‘i duk na.
Kapsiki_DC: Wəsə nya kehima kwa kema ta Mahwətə yamene ŋkɛ, kala ka shihɛnyɛ. Kesərəakɛ mene jaɗafa nyi kala ŋa Zhɛrobowam wəzege ta Nebat nya ketsəkwəame ka Israyɛl mbe mene jaɗafa ŋkɛ we.
Tupurri: AÀ kal joñ fen ma de älagge nen Manwuri, do maga paçaçre äe hay joñ wo nono. AÀ cel go ti älagge mani Jerobowam je ni Nebadn gaa, maga kañ wer jar Israyel wo joñge äe mono.

Francais: Sellum, fils de Jabès, conspira contre lui et, l'ayant frappé devant le peuple, il le mit à mort, et régna à sa place.
Anglais: And Shallum the son of Jabesh conspired against him, and smote him before the people, and slew him, and reigned in his stead.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sallum goora vi Yabek fok lawt kalamu, calam gaa vok sumuna cap cum mati; mus mul hay baŋalamu may.
Bulu: Kalum, e mone Yabés, a nga bôndé feʼe ya wôé nye, a nga bibi nye bôt be lôô, nde a nga wôé nye a jôô éjiane jé.
Guiziga: Mbur ada, a zilaka Salom, mangal ngi Yabes, a gi gidiɓi ar Zakari. A kiɗa Zakari tuwa daˀ a mihiri ngi mizli gar, a mucu. Joˀ Salom vuna a zuɓa li naŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Sallum ɓii Yaabes waɗi dabare, mbari mo yeeso ummaatoore. Nden o laami haa pellel maako.
Fulfulde_DC: Sallum ɓii Yaabes waɗi dabare, mbari mo yeeso ummaatoore. Nden o laami haa pellel maako.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Salum bem ko Yabɛs baa ɗaŋ keta zu a̧; a̧ gbɛɛ a̧ pi̧ nù nɛ̀ gbaayí o bíí, ɓɛɛ ba wan oi-aa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Salum bem ko Yabɛs baa ɗaŋ keta zu a̧; a̧ gbɛɛ a̧ pi̧ nù nɛ̀ gbaayí o bíí, ɓɛɛ ba wan oi-aa.
Kapsiki_DC: Shaləwm, wəzege ta Yabɛsh, tsate ghena yite, peslekɛ ŋkɛ te ŋwela kwa ntsə ta mbeli, pa dzete meghe te ŋkwa ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: Sallum je ni Yabesn kal mañ äaale äe, kal ma'ge äe pel jar ngaäa no, kal 'warge äe go, kal joñ wañ ti ngeel äe.

Francais: Le reste des actes de Zacharie, voici que cela est écrit dans le livre des Chroniques des rois d'Israël.
Anglais: And the rest of the acts of Zachariah, behold, they are written in the book of the chronicles of the kings of Israel.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Caw lopna vi Zakariya ma hinina, kayni ka ɗoy hay ɗerwelda vi Labar-Ma-Liyna vi Muliyana vi Israyel.
Bulu: Mimboon mivoʼo ya be Zakari mi ne ntilan e kalate minkañete bejô bôte ya Israél.
Guiziga: Zakari, ɓi ngi slra naŋ mekelemey mindirama, i mutoho taŋ le gar angi ɗerewol mazilaka Ɗerewol ngi ɓi ngi slra ngi buy Israyeley.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Luttuɗum haala Zekariya winndaama nder Deftere Habaruuji Nyalaaɗe nde Laamiiɓe Isra'iila.
Fulfulde_DC: Luttuɗum haala Zekariya winndaama nder Deftere Habaruuji Nyalaaɗe nde Laamiiɓe Isra'iila.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Oi o tom ko Zakarii yɔra zaŋ Kalata Nyɛrɛ ko o wannu *Israɛl.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Oi o tom ko Zakarii yɔra zaŋ Kalata Nyɛrɛ ko o wannu *Israɛl.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma nyi ketene ghena ta Zakari ne, nahe hɛ kenza kerafe rafe mbe palepa ta slene ta ka meghea ka Israyɛl.
Tupurri: Te joñre Sakarin wo de yerge äil kefder Kronig wañre ma Israyeln wo.

Francais: Telle était la parole de Yahweh, qu'il avait dite à Jéhu: « Tes fils jusqu'à la quatrième génération seront assis sur le trône d'Israël. » Et il en fut ainsi. --Sellum d'Israël.--
Anglais: This was the word of the  Lord  which he spake unto Jehu, saying, Thy sons shall sit on the throne of Israel unto the fourth generation. And so it came to pass.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kay na'ta hob kayni mi vun sle ma Ma-Vatɗina dum tam Yehu ala: Gurona vaŋu ta-ta tam jaf ma fiɗina, ma lak kay zlamda-mulda vi Israyel. Nam li ki kayn nala.
Bulu: Nalé a nga boban avalʼane mejô Nti a nga kobô Yehu me mbe na: Bone bôé ba ye tabe éto njôane ya Israél a kui miaé nyini! A e nga bobane nalé.
Guiziga: A gi le kaslsla kaɓa mingiɓi ngi Buymisemuŋ miɓa da Zehu zleˀe tuwa: «Dideˀ ɗikey a sa cifam i buyoy ar Israyeleye, hã avu dideˀ misin taŋ i waka.» Ɓi nah a gi le kanah gisiŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Kanjum woni wolde nde Jawmiraawo wolwanino Yeehu: “Ɓiɓɓe ma njooɗoto dow leeso laamu Isra'iila haa yidere nayaɓre.” Non ɗum waari .
Fulfulde_DC: Kanjum woni wolde nde Jawmiraawo wolwanino Yeehu: “Ɓiɓɓe ma njooɗoto dow leeso laamu Isra'iila haa yidere nayaɓre.” Non ɗum waari .
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Hegɔ wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ so ha̧ Jɛhu hee mɔ'ɔ ga hɔɔ gba̧a̧: «O bem kɔ-mɛ tɛ daŋ zu damti *Israɛl hɔ tɛ bezaŋ taar!» Ɓɛɛ mɔ de kànà hegɔ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Hegɔ wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ so ha̧ Jɛhu hee mɔ'ɔ ga hɔɔ gba̧a̧: «O bem kɔ-mɛ tɛ daŋ zu damti *Israɛl hɔ tɛ bezaŋ taar!» Ɓɛɛ mɔ de kànà hegɔ.
Kapsiki_DC: Tsetse yipəte geva ghena nya gezete nda Mahwətə ke Zhɛhə: «Ka shihɛ ŋa pa te kwa wəfaɗe ta shi ne, kamene meghe hɛ te ŋkwa ŋa hwa ka Israyɛl.»
Tupurri: Sen mokay hay de tayge de waçaçre maga Manwur hay waçaçn go ne Jehu do kay no mono. Jar ni äo wo haçaç day go ti weere äaara ma de naa wo, day lag ge wo yañ ti paale wañ ma Israyel no. Sen kal joñge do sen nono.

Francais: Sellum, fils de Jabès, devint roi la trente-neuvième année d'Ozias, roi de Juda, et il régna pendant un mois à Samarie.
Anglais: Shallum the son of Jabesh began to reign in the nine and thirtieth year of Uzziah king of Judah; and he reigned a full month in Samaria.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sallum goora vi Yabek, ti mulda hay busata dok-ɦidi yam zleeŋeta vi Oziyas mulla vi Yuda. Nam ti mulda ir til kepe hay Samariya.
Bulu: Kalum, e mone Yabés, a nga jôô mbu mewôm mela a ébulu Ozias, njô bôte ya Yuda a nga jôô. A nga jôô tañe ngone jia e Samari.
Guiziga: Salom, mangal ngi Yabese, a ci buyo naɓa Oziyas, buy Zuda, a ɓul di i vi mizli ngir ngoltir ngaŋ ngoltir naŋ angi zuma buyo. Salom a zum buyo kiya purla a Samari.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nder nduuɓu laamu Uzziya, waato Azariya laamiiɗo Yahuuda cappanɗe tati e njoweenayaɓu, Sallum ɓii Yaabes laami. O laami haa Samariya lewru tan.
Fulfulde_DC: Nder nduuɓu laamu Uzziya, waato Azariya laamiiɗo Yahuuda cappanɗe tati e njoweenayaɓu, Sallum ɓii Yaabes laami. O laami haa Samariya lewru tan.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Azaria ɔɔ wan Juda pɛ ɓu-taar-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-naar, ɓɛɛ Salum bem ko Yabɛs ɔ wan tɛ fio-zɛ kpɔk sɛn Samarii.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Azaria ɔɔ wan Juda pɛ ɓu-taar-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-naar, ɓɛɛ Salum bem ko Yabɛs ɔ wan tɛ fio-zɛ kpɔk sɛn Samarii.
Kapsiki_DC: Shaləwm wəzege ta Yabɛsh, kekelete meghea ka Israyɛl mbe va kwa mahekenemsə meslighəmbe ta Azariya kameghea ka Zhəwda. Ama deke tere kwetɛŋe menete ŋkɛ te meghe mbe Samari.
Tupurri: Sallum je ni Yabes kal joñ wañ nen kiñgi ma de do swa' ti kaawa' no, maga Osiyas ti wañ Juda mono. AÀ joñ wañn Samari few boñ.

Francais: Manahem, fils de Gadi, monta de Thersa et, étant venu à Samarie, il frappa dans Samarie Sellum, fils de Jabès, et le mit à mort; et il régna à sa place.
Anglais: For Menahem the son of Gadi went up from Tirzah, and came to Samaria, and smote Shallum the son of Jabesh in Samaria, and slew him, and reigned in his stead.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Menahem, goora vi Gadi, fokay hay Tirsa pa, nam co hay Samariya, hay Samariya nam cal Sallum, goora vi Yabek, cum goy mati; nam ti mulda hay baŋalamu may.
Bulu: Menahém e mone Gadi, a nga bet, a kôlôʼô Tirsa, nde a nga zu Samari a bibi kalum, mone Yabés e Samari. A nga wôé nye a jôô éjiane jé.
Guiziga: Mbur ada, a zilaka Manehem, mangal ngi Gadi. A so baɗ a Tirsa nga Samari. A kiɗa buy Salom, mangal ngi Yabese vagay a Samari. Joˀ naŋ vuna a zuɓa li naŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Menahem ɓii Gadi wa'i diga Tirsa, yehi haa Samariya, mbari Sallum. Nden o laami haa pellel baaba maako.
Fulfulde_DC: Menahem ɓii Gadi wa'i diga Tirsa, yehi haa Samariya, mbari Sallum. Nden o laami haa pellel baaba maako.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Mɛnahɛm bem ko Gadi daŋa kɔ‘i nɛ̀ Tirsa, ɓɛɛ hɔ Samarii. A̧ gbɛɛ Salum bem ko Yabɛs pi̧ nù hi̧i̧, ɓɛɛ ɔ wan oi-aa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Mɛnahɛm bem ko Gadi daŋa kɔ‘i nɛ̀ Tirsa, ɓɛɛ hɔ Samarii. A̧ gbɛɛ Salum bem ko Yabɛs pi̧ nù hi̧i̧, ɓɛɛ ɔ wan oi-aa.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa Menahɛm wəzege ta Gadi, se shave mbe Tirsa, kadzembe Samari, pa peslekɛ Shaləwm. Pa kelete meghe te ŋkwa ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: Manahem je ni Gadin ur le Tirtsa nduu Samari. AÀ nduu la kal 'war Sallum je ni Yabesn go Samari ni. AÀ joñ nen 'warge äe go, kal joñ wañ go ti ngeel äe.

Francais: Le reste des actes de Sellum, et la conspiration qu'il ourdit, voici que cela est écrit dans le livre des Chroniques des rois d'Israël.
Anglais: And the rest of the acts of Shallum, and his conspiracy which he made, behold, they are written in the book of the chronicles of the kings of Israel.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Caw lopna vi Sallum ma hinina, law ma nam fokomna, kayni ka ɗoy hay ɗerwelda vi Labar-Ma-Liyna vi muliyana vi Israyel.
Bulu: Mimboone mivoʼo ya be Kalum a ékôane mewôé me môt a nga bo, mam mete me ne ntilan e kalate minkañete bejô bôte ya Israél.
Guiziga: Salomo, ɓi ngi slra naŋ mekelemey mindiram ati ɓi ngi gidiɓi naŋ miga gar na, i mutoho taŋ le angi ɗerewol mazilaka Ɗerewol ngi ɓi ngi slra ngi buy Israyeley.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Luttuɗum haala Sallum e tuurtol mum ngol o waɗi, ɗum winndaama nder Deftere Habaruuji Nyalaaɗe nde Laamiiɓe Isra'iila.
Fulfulde_DC: Luttuɗum haala Sallum e tuurtol mum ngol o waɗi, ɗum winndaama nder Deftere Habaruuji Nyalaaɗe nde Laamiiɓe Isra'iila.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Oi o tom ko Salum in ɗaŋ keta n'aa baa so yɔra zaŋ Kalata Nyɛrɛ ko o wannu *Israɛl.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Oi o tom ko Salum in ɗaŋ keta n'aa baa so yɔra zaŋ Kalata Nyɛrɛ ko o wannu *Israɛl.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma nyi ketene ghena ta Shaləwm ne, nahe hɛ kenza kerafe rafe mbe palepa ta slene ta ka meghea ka Israyɛl. Pa mbeli tsate ghena yitea Zakari.
Tupurri: Te joñre Sallum no, waçaçre mañge äaale äe maga aà hay kne'n mono, sen wo de yerge äil kefder Kronig wañre ma Israyeln wo no.

Francais: Alors Manahem, étant parti de Thersa, frappa Thapsa et tous ceux qui y étaient, avec son territoire; il la frappa, parce qu'elle n'avait pas ouvert ses portes, et il fendit le ventre de toutes les femmes enceintes. --Manahem d'Israël; le tribut payé au roi d'Assyrie.--
Anglais: Then Menahem smote Tiphsah, and all that were therein, and the coasts thereof from Tirzah: because they opened not to him, therefore he smote it; and all the women therein that were with child he ripped up.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Menahem cal sum sa hay hoyok-ziyn Tifsak goy kafe, hiɗi naga ma kuɗa'na, tun caw ay hay Tirsa pa; nam cal sum sa hayna kay nisi may mal vun-galana visi goyɗi, boy sa hayna kaw nam munsi haysi goy kafe.
Bulu: Ane Menahém a nga bibi tisone Tirsa, a ba bese be nga too été, a éfuse si jé ataté Tirsa. A nga bibi tison éte amu é nji yooé mimbé mié, a nga sale mebum mese ya binga be mbe mebum.
Guiziga: Akẽh na, Manahem a zla kiɗa vu ati walahay Tifsa, a ngizla mizli ngir walahay ati ngir li ngi cikeˀeheye gar, zle a Tirsa, sesẽŋ a Tifsa. Manahem mikiɗa taŋ na, asi mizli tayna a ngumam wunakaŋ mizlingre ngi walahaya ta. Joˀ a nduzo kwacay ngi ngwas misi ti huroyo cek cek.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Menahem nyaami berniwol Tifsa, o mbari yimɓe nder berniwol e nder lesdi maagol fuu, ngam ɓe maɓɓitanaay mo dammuɗe maagol. O seeki koo reedu'en nder maagol fuu.
Fulfulde_DC: Menahem nyaami berniwol Tifsa, o mbari yimɓe nder berniwol e nder lesdi maagol fuu, ngam ɓe maɓɓitanaay mo dammuɗe maagol. O seeki koo reedu'en nder maagol fuu.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Tɛ̀ daŋa-a nɛ̀ Mɛnahɛm daŋa nɛ̀ nú Tifsa, a̧ tika zu ye Tirsa gbɛ nɛ̀ o bíí saaye'i in o bíí nɛ̀ ya zik fara'i mbɛt, wen nɛ̀ wa hu̧i̧ so nú garo ye ha̧ a̧ na. A̧ kaka zaŋ o nàá-zaŋ lɛŋ a nù.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Tɛ̀ daŋa-a nɛ̀ Mɛnahɛm daŋa nɛ̀ nú Tifsa, a̧ tika zu ye Tirsa gbɛ nɛ̀ o bíí saaye'i in o bíí nɛ̀ ya zik fara'i mbɛt, wen nɛ̀ wa hu̧i̧ so nú garo ye ha̧ a̧ na. A̧ kaka zaŋ o nàá-zaŋ lɛŋ a nù.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa Menahɛm ɗate meleme ta ka Tifsa. Kampəkawa mbeli nyi mbe ba'a kabezemte hɛɗi nyi laka ŋkwa shɛ slə mbe Tirsa pa mbe Tifsa. Ma nda ɗa melemea shɛ ŋkɛ ne, kwa ɗema mbeli kepele nda ŋkwa kedzembe meleme, perawemte hwə te mi nyi le hwə pɛtɛ.
Tupurri: Do kay nono, Manahem kal le' äi leege ma Tifsa kal id jar ma äil äen wo go äuy, kal ree sir ma ti jeñn wo go ni äuy tï¡ï¡ wer le Tirtsa ka'a, diñ wer maga äi leege sen hay men faage ne hen gaè. AÀ cerag äil naare ma de äiili wo go äuy.

Francais: La trente-neuvième année d'Azarias, roi de Juda, Manahem, fils de Gadi, devint roi sur Israël; il régna dix ans à Samarie.
Anglais: In the nine and thirtieth year of Azariah king of Judah began Menahem the son of Gadi to reign over Israel, and reigned ten years in Samaria.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay busata dok-ɦidi yam zleeŋeta vi Azariya mulla vi Yuda, Menahem goora vi Gadi ti mulda kay Israyel. Nam ti mulda hay Samariya ir busat doogo.
Bulu: Mbu mewôm mela a ébulu Azaria, njô bôte ya Yuda a nga jôô, ñwô Menahém e mone Gadi, a nga tebe njô bôt ya Israél. A nga jôô tañe mimbu awôm e Samari.
Guiziga: Azariya, buy Zuda, angi vi mizli ngir ngoltir ngaŋ ngoltir ngi zumabuy naŋ na, Manahem, mangal ngi Gadi, a ci buy Israyel a Samari. Manahem a zum buyo vi kuruˀu.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nder nduuɓu laamu Azariya laamiiɗo Yahuuda cappanɗe tati e njoweenayaɓu, Menahem ɓii Gadi laami haa Isra'iila. O laami haa Samariya duuɓi sappo.
Fulfulde_DC: Nder nduuɓu laamu Azariya laamiiɗo Yahuuda cappanɗe tati e njoweenayaɓu, Menahem ɓii Gadi laami haa Isra'iila. O laami haa Samariya duuɓi sappo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Azaria dee pɛ ɓu-taar-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-naar tɛ wan sɛn Juda, ɓɛɛ Mɛnahɛm bem ko Gadi ɔ wan zu *Israɛl; a̧ ɔɔ wan *Israɛl sɛn Samarii pɛ ɓu.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Azaria dee pɛ ɓu-taar-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-naar tɛ wan sɛn Juda, ɓɛɛ Mɛnahɛm bem ko Gadi ɔ wan zu *Israɛl; a̧ ɔɔ wan *Israɛl sɛn Samarii pɛ ɓu.
Kapsiki_DC: Mbe va kwa mahekenemsə meslighəmbe ta va ta Azariya te meghea ka Zhəwda, Menahɛm wəzege ta Gadi, ya kameghea ka Israyɛl. Va meŋe menete ŋkɛ te meghe mbe Samari.
Tupurri: Nen kiñgi ma de do swa' ti kaawa' maga Asariya ti wañ Juda mono, Manahem je ni Gadin kal joñ wañ ti Israyele. AÀ joñ wañ Samari kiñgi hwale.

Francais: Il fit ce qui est mal aux yeux de Yahweh, il ne se détourna pas, tant qu'il vécut, des péchés de Jéroboam, fils de Nabat, qui avait fait pécher Israël.
Anglais: And he did that which was evil in the sight of the  Lord : he departed not all his days from the sins of Jeroboam the son of Nebat, who made Israel to sin.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam li sle ma joo'o kir Ma-Vatɗina, hay buura vi irita valam kaf kayni, suluk ma Yerobowam goora vi Nebat kal sum sa Israyel hayamna, nam min ja jaram goy hiɗi namɗi.
Bulu: A nga bo mam me nʼabé e mise me Nti. Nté ôse a nga vee, a nji saʼale mbia mimboon Yérôbôam, e mone Nébat, a nga dutu Israél na a bo.
Guiziga: Manahem a gi di i gwat malambaˀ a mihiri ngi Buymisemuŋ. Zeroboˀam, mangal ngi Nebat a gi mungra, hã a hizigiɗa Israyeley, ɓa a gam aya. Manaheme, angi hin ngi siifa naŋ gar na, ko a pula gi mungra nah mbak le ta ya.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O waɗi kalluɗum yeeso Jawmiraawo, balɗe maako fuu o accaay waɗugo hakkeeji ɗi Yerobo'am ɓii Nebat nastini Isra'iila'en nder maaji.
Fulfulde_DC: O waɗi kalluɗum yeeso Jawmiraawo, balɗe maako fuu o accaay waɗugo hakkeeji ɗi Yerobo'am ɓii Nebat nastini Isra'iila'en nder maaji.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: A̧ dee mɔ ɗaŋ yí GASA WAN; a̧ e ɗaŋmɔ nɛ̀ Jeroboam bem ko Nɛbat dee so, kai nɛ̀ o be *Israɛl a sɛnɛ duk na.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: A̧ dee mɔ ɗaŋ yí GASA WAN; a̧ e ɗaŋmɔ nɛ̀ Jeroboam bem ko Nɛbat dee so, kai nɛ̀ o be *Israɛl a sɛnɛ duk na.
Kapsiki_DC: Mbe nza ta ŋkɛ pɛtɛ ne, wəshi nyi keɗema kehi yamene ŋkɛ kwa kema ta Mahwətə, kesərəakɛ mene jaɗafa nyi kala ŋa Zhɛrobowam wəzege ta Nebat we, nya ketsəkwəame ka Israyɛl mbe mene jaɗafa.
Tupurri: AÀ joñ fen ma de älagge nen Manwuri. Ti wur mani äen äuy tu, aà cel go see älagge maga Jerobowam je ni Nebadn hay kañ wer Israyel joñge äe mo gaè.

Francais: Phul, roi d'Assyrie, vint dans le pays, et Manahem donna à Phul mille talents d'argent pour qu'il lui portât secours, et qu'il affermît le royaume dans sa main.
Anglais: And Pul the king of Assyria came against the land: and Menahem gave Pul a thousand talents of silver, that his hand might be with him to confirm the kingdom in his hand.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Pul mulla vi Asiriya co hay nagata; Menahem vulum gurjuta ir talente* birim kepe, kay Pul ma gutumu a muɗ mulda hay ɓalam dono'o.
Bulu: Pul, njô bôte ya Asiri, a nga zu e si jé, a Menahém a nga ve Pul betalañ be argent toyini, na a volô yemete nye éto njôan e mo mé.
Guiziga: Buy Asiri mazilaka Pulo, ara zuma hirwuyo. Akẽh na, Manahem a vulaŋ ɓiri bara, tan kukur makir, ɓa Pul a zuɓaŋ haŋ, anja ɓa a cici gidaŋ gidaŋ ar zumabuy naŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Pul, laamiiɗo Assuura nasti lesdi Isra'iila, nden Menahem walli mo hokki mo cardi kilo ujine cappanɗe tati, haa laamu maako semmbiɗa.
Fulfulde_DC: Pul, laamiiɗo Assuura nasti lesdi Isra'iila, nden Menahem walli mo hokki mo cardi kilo ujine cappanɗe tati, haa laamu maako semmbiɗa.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Pul, wannu Asirii tɛɛ mɛ bi nù, ɓɛɛ Mɛnahɛm ha̧ kilo bu-mbɔi booro-ɓu-taar ha̧ a̧, wen ha̧a̧ ŋgai ha̧ a̧ zu nù‘i ha̧ wan mɛ yor er-a nɛ̀ nɔa-a.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Pul, wannu Asirii tɛɛ mɛ bi nù, ɓɛɛ Mɛnahɛm ha̧ kilo bu-mbɔi booro-ɓu-taar ha̧ a̧, wen ha̧a̧ ŋgai ha̧ a̧ zu nù‘i ha̧ wan mɛ yor er-a nɛ̀ nɔa-a.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa Pəwl, meghea ka Asiri dzembe hɛɗia Israyɛl. Pa Menahɛm ndeke nda kiləwə mze kwa ghɛmɛ 30.000 kezha kemane ŋkɛ kave nda berete ke meghea ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: Pul wañ Asiri kal nduugi go ti sir no. Manahem kal haç solay boo ne hen nen mañ klew ton do swa' ti naa, maga aà mo kay se ma hayge ti paale wañn ni, maga wañn mo hay de coäge ne se do ngiñ.

Francais: Manahem leva cet argent sur Israël, sur tous ceux qui avaient de grandes richesses, afin de le donner au roi d'Assyrie; il exigea de chacun cinquante sicles d'argent. Le roi d'Assyrie s'en retourna et ne s'arrêta pas là, dans le pays.
Anglais: And Menahem exacted the money of Israel, even of all the mighty men of wealth, of each man fifty shekels of silver, to give to the king of Assyria. So the king of Assyria turned back, and stayed not there in the land.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Menahem tar gurju na'ta kayni hay ɓam sum sa Israyel kaf sa ka hiɗi farayn hay ɓisiya, kay nam min vulum mi mulla vi Asiriya. Gigekaw nam yaw gurjut hay ɓalam ir sikel* dok-vasl dok-vasl. Ki kayn nala mulla vi Asiriya kaliya, nam min col hay nagata loɗi.
Bulu: Menahém e nga nyoñe argent ate e be ba bese ya Israél be mbe minkukum, ane be ne ve njô bôte ya Asiri môt ase besikel be argent mewôm metan. Ane njô bôte ya Asiri a nga bulan teke ñhe fe beta tabe e si ya Israél.
Guiziga: Manahem muluma dala nah na, a tiɓi di i buutu a hirnga mbur Israyel gar, a hirnga misi zlilihey gar, ɓa ngi vula da buy Asiri. Hirnga mbur gar na, suloy kukur zlum, kukur zlum. Akẽh na, buy Asiri a mi a muŋ. A cifi asi ruwuy Israyele mata.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ngam heɓugo ceede ɗe'e, Menahem umri Isra'iila'en njoɓa jomorgol. Diskuɗo fuu yoɓan ceede cardi cappanɗe jowi. Nde ɓe ndokki ceede ɗe'e haa laamiiɗo lesdi Assuura, o acci lesdi Isra'iila, o hooti lesdi maako.
Fulfulde_DC: Ngam heɓugo ceede ɗe'e, Menahem umri Isra'iila'en njoɓa jomorgol. Diskuɗo fuu yoɓan ceede cardi cappanɗe jowi. Nde ɓe ndokki ceede ɗe'e haa laamiiɗo lesdi Assuura, o acci lesdi Isra'iila, o hooti lesdi maako.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Mɛnahɛm gɔna sede pi̧ zu o wanmbɔi *Israɛl, ha̧ wa kpɔk kpɔk mɛ ha̧ kɔya bu-mbɔi ɓu-mɔɔrɔ ha̧ wannu Asirii. Wannu Asirii baa sede'i kaɗi, ɓɛɛ si ɗoŋ si tɛ kɔ‘i. A̧ ɓɔn tɛ nù‘i na.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Mɛnahɛm gɔna sede pi̧ zu o wanmbɔi *Israɛl, ha̧ wa kpɔk kpɔk mɛ ha̧ kɔya bu-mbɔi ɓu-mɔɔrɔ ha̧ wannu Asirii. Wannu Asirii baa sede'i kaɗi, ɓɛɛ si ɗoŋ si tɛ kɔ‘i. A̧ ɓɔn tɛ nù‘i na.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma nda tsenete cɛdɛ nya Menahɛm ne, jaɓeregwale yatsehete ka Israyɛl. Yayata nde mcɛlə ne, dəɓərə mcɛfemsə yaŋki ŋkɛ. Ma vəa ŋkwa nya fəave nda dəɓərəa mze kwa tɛawetɛa shɛhɛ mbeli ke meghea ka Asiri ne, pa slənyɛ te hɛɗia ka Israyɛl ba'a zhɛneghe geva kalə sha ghɛa ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: Manahem yaçë solay sen le do jar Israyel maga hay wo de horog mo äuy no, ma haçge äe ne wañ Asiri. AÀ hay yaçaçn le do wosela caw solay boo do dwee. Wañ Asiri kal yaçaç solay sen lay, kal carge go liñ jag äe kal men sirn go.

Francais: Le reste des actes de Manahem, et tout ce qu'il a fait, cela n'est-il pas écrit dans le livre des Chroniques des rois d'Israël?
Anglais: And the rest of the acts of Menahem, and all that he did, are they not written in the book of the chronicles of the kings of Israel?
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Caw lopna vi Menahem ma hinina, hiɗi sle ma nam lum kafna, kayni ka ɗoy hay ɗerwelda vi Labar-Ma-Liyna vi Muliyana vi Israyel.
Bulu: Mimboon mivoʼo Menahém, mam mese a nga bo, me ne ntilan e kalate minkañete bejô bôte ya Israél.
Guiziga: Manaheme, ɓi ngi slra naŋ mekelemey mindiram ati gwat naŋ miga taŋ gar na, i mutoho taŋ le angi ɗerewol mazilaka Ɗerewol ngi ɓi ngi slra ngi buy Israyeley.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Luttuɗum haala Menahem e kuuɗe mum fuu, ɗum winndaama nder Deftere Habaruuji Nyalaaɗe nde Laamiiɓe Isra'iila.
Fulfulde_DC: Luttuɗum haala Menahem e kuuɗe mum fuu, ɗum winndaama nder Deftere Habaruuji Nyalaaɗe nde Laamiiɓe Isra'iila.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Oi o tom ko Mɛnahɛm, mɔ lɛŋ n'aa dea, yɔra zaŋ Kalata Nyɛrɛ ko o wannu *Israɛl.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Oi o tom ko Mɛnahɛm, mɔ lɛŋ n'aa dea, yɔra zaŋ Kalata Nyɛrɛ ko o wannu *Israɛl.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma nyi ketene ghena ta Menahɛm ne, nahe hɛ kenza kerafe rafe mbe palepa ta slene ka meghea ka Israyɛl.
Tupurri: Te joñre Manahemn wo, fen maga aà joñn mo äuy sen wo de yerge äil kefder Kronig wañre ma Israyeln wo no.

Francais: Manahem se coucha avec ses pères; et Phacéia, son fils, régna à sa place. --Phacéia d'Israël.--
Anglais: And Menahem slept with his fathers; and Pekahiah his son reigned in his stead.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Menahem miti kuɗ sumiyamu, goora valam Pekakiya ti mulda hay baŋalamu may.
Bulu: Ménahém baa bʼésaa be nga bômbô vôme wua. Mone wé Pékahia a nga jôô éjiane jé.
Guiziga: Manahem a mucu, ara luuma dideˀ naŋhay ar vigiɗi. Dar mangal naŋ Pekahiya a zuɓa li naŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nde Menahem maayi, ɓiyiiko Pekahaya laami haa pellel maako.
Fulfulde_DC: Nde Menahem maayi, ɓiyiiko Pekahaya laami haa pellel maako.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Mɛnahɛm fea si ɗoŋ o dáà kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ bem kɔ̧-a̧ Pɛkaya ɔ wan oi-aa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Mɛnahɛm fea si ɗoŋ o dáà kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ bem kɔ̧-a̧ Pɛkaya ɔ wan oi-aa.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kwa mte Menahɛm ne, wəzege ta ŋkɛ Pekahiya ya kameghe te ŋkwa ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: Menahem kal sugi go äiñ paçaçre äe wo, je ni äe Pekaya kal joñ wañ ti ngeel äe.

Francais: La cinquantième année d'Azarias, roi de Juda, Phacéia, fils de Manahem, régna sur Israël à Samarie; son règne fut de deux ans.
Anglais: In the fiftieth year of Azariah king of Judah Pekahiah the son of Menahem began to reign over Israel in Samaria, and reigned two years.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Co hay busata dok-vaslta vi Azariya mulla vi Yuda kayni, Pekakiya goora vi Menahem ti mulda kay Israyel hay Samariya. Nam ti mulda ir busat ma'.
Bulu: Mbu mewôm metane Azaria, njô bôte ya Yuda a nga jôô, ñwô Pékahia, e mone Menahém a nga tebe njô bôte ya Israél e Samari. A nga jôô mimbu mibaé.
Guiziga: Azariya, buy Zuda, angi vi mizli ngir zlum naŋ angi zumabuy naŋ na, Pekahiya, mangal ngi Manahem, a ci buy Israyel a Samari, a zum buyo vi cuw.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nder nduuɓu laamu Azariya laamiiɗo Yahuuda cappanɗe njowaɓu, Pekahaya ɓii Menahem laami haa Isra'iila. O laami haa Samariya duuɓi ɗiɗi.
Fulfulde_DC: Nder nduuɓu laamu Azariya laamiiɗo Yahuuda cappanɗe njowaɓu, Pekahaya ɓii Menahem laami haa Isra'iila. O laami haa Samariya duuɓi ɗiɗi.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Azaria dee pɛ ɓu-mɔɔrɔ tɛ wan sɛn Juda, ɓɛɛ Pɛkaya bem ko Mɛnahɛm ɔ wan *Israɛl sɛn Samarii tɛ pɛ yiitoo.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Azaria dee pɛ ɓu-mɔɔrɔ tɛ wan sɛn Juda, ɓɛɛ Pɛkaya bem ko Mɛnahɛm ɔ wan *Israɛl sɛn Samarii tɛ pɛ yiitoo.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma mbe kwa mcɛfemsə va ta Azariya te meghea ka Zhəwda, Pekahiya wəzege ta Menahɛm ya kameghea ka Israyɛl mbe Samari kava bake.
Tupurri: Nen kiñgi ma de dwee maga Asariya ti wañ Juda mono, Pekaya je ni Menahem kal joñ wañ ti Israyel Samari. AÀ joñ wañ kiñgi äoge.

Francais: Il fit ce qui est mal aux yeux de Yahweh; il ne se détourna pas des péchés de Jéroboam, fils de Nabat, qui avait fait pécher Israël.
Anglais: And he did that which was evil in the sight of the  Lord : he departed not from the sins of Jeroboam the son of Nebat, who made Israel to sin.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam li slen ma joo'o kir Ma-Vatɗina; suluk ma Yerobowam goora vi Nebat kal sum sa Israyel hayamna nam min ja jaram goy hiɗi namɗi.
Bulu: A nga bo mam me nʼabé e mise me Nti, a nji ke saʼale mbia mimboon Yérôbôam, e mone Nébat, a ga dutu Israél na a bo.
Guiziga: Pekahiya a gi di i gwat malambaˀ a mihiri ngi Buymisemuŋ. Mungra, Zeroboˀam, mangal ngi Nebat miga, hã a hizigiɗa Israyeley ɓa a gam aya na, Pekahiya a pula gi naŋ mbak le ta.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O waɗi kalluɗum yeeso Jawmiraawo, o accaay waɗugo hakkeeji ɗi Yerobo'am ɓii Nebat nastini Isra'iila'en nder maaji.
Fulfulde_DC: O waɗi kalluɗum yeeso Jawmiraawo, o accaay waɗugo hakkeeji ɗi Yerobo'am ɓii Nebat nastini Isra'iila'en nder maaji.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: A̧ dee mɔ ɗaŋ yí GASA WAN; nɛ́ kpɔk kale ɗaŋmɔ nɛ̀ Jeroboam bem ko Nɛbat dee so, kai nɛ̀ o be *Israɛl a sɛnɛ‘i, a̧ a̧ dea mbɛt.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: A̧ dee mɔ ɗaŋ yí GASA WAN; nɛ́ kpɔk kale ɗaŋmɔ nɛ̀ Jeroboam bem ko Nɛbat dee so, kai nɛ̀ o be *Israɛl a sɛnɛ‘i, a̧ a̧ dea mbɛt.
Kapsiki_DC: Wəshi nyi keɗema kehite geva yamene ŋkɛ kwa kema ta Mahwətə, kesərəakɛ mene jaɗafa nya kala ŋa Zhɛrobowam, wəzege ta Nebat, nya ketsəkwəame ka Israyɛl mbe mene jaɗafa we.
Tupurri: AÀ joñ fen ma de älagge nen Manwuri. AÀ cel go se älagge maga Jerobowam je ni Nebadb hay kañ wer Israyel joñge äe mo gaè.

Francais: Phacée, fils de Romélias, son officier, conspira contre lui; il le frappa à Samarie dans la tour de la maison du roi, ainsi qu'Argob et Arié; il avait avec lui cinquante hommes d'entre les fils des Galaadites. Il fit mourir Phacéia, et régna à sa place.
Anglais: But Pekah the son of Remaliah, a captain of his, conspired against him, and smote him in Samaria, in the palace of the king's house, with Argob and Arieh, and with him fifty men of the Gileadites: and he killed him, and reigned in his room.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Peka goora vi Remaliya, soje ma ŋolla valamu fok lawt kalamu; nam calamu hay Samariya, hay ziyna ma mulda, Argob hiɗi Ariye kaw, sumun sa jar gurona vi Galaadna ka kuɗum dok-vasl. Ki kayn nala nam ci Pekakiya goyo, nam vurna baŋalamu hay mulda may.
Bulu: Péka e mone Remaliahu, mbeʼe ébene wé, a nga bôndé feʼe ja kpwé nye éto njô bôt; a nga bibi nye e Samari a too ôleme ya nda njô bôt, nalé fe Argôb a Arié; A nga bili bôt mewôm metan ya bone Begaladite. Nalé a nga wôé Pékahia a jôô éjiane jé.
Guiziga: Gawla naŋ soje madiɗa majijiraŋ gwat ngi vurum naŋhaya, a gi gidiɓi araŋ. A kiɗa Pekahiya a hay naŋ buyo angi li mbur mandil ng'ara ti tuwaˀa haɗa, jom ti jini ngi Argop ati Ariye. Yo waɗ mizli Galaˀatay ada jom ava kukur zlum. Naŋ mikiɗa Pekahiya tuwa na, joˀ naŋ a zuɓa li naŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Peka ɓii Remaliya, ɗoftoowo mo tuurtani mo bee worɓe cappanɗe njowo nder yimɓe Gile'at. O mbari mo haa Samariya nder suudu semmbiɗndu haa laamorde, kaŋko e Argoba e Ariye. Nden o laami haa pellel maako.
Fulfulde_DC: Peka ɓii Remaliya, ɗoftoowo mo tuurtani mo bee worɓe cappanɗe njowo nder yimɓe Gile'at. O mbari mo haa Samariya nder suudu semmbiɗndu haa laamorde, kaŋko e Argoba e Ariye. Nden o laami haa pellel maako.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Baka-nyaŋa kɔ̧-a̧ Pɛka, bem ko Rɛmalia baa ɗaŋ keta zu a̧. A̧ gbɛɛ Pɛkaya ká bá nɛ̀ Argɔb in Ariya sɛn Samarii fara pɛm mɔ kɔ̧ tua ko wannu. O be Galad n'aa kaia tɛnɛ gbɛ nɛ̀ Pɛkaya nɛ́ bíí ɓu-mɔɔrɔ, ɓɛɛ a̧ ɔ wan oi-aa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Baka-nyaŋa kɔ̧-a̧ Pɛka, bem ko Rɛmalia baa ɗaŋ keta zu a̧. A̧ gbɛɛ Pɛkaya ká bá nɛ̀ Argɔb in Ariya sɛn Samarii fara pɛm mɔ kɔ̧ tua ko wannu. O be Galad n'aa kaia tɛnɛ gbɛ nɛ̀ Pɛkaya nɛ́ bíí ɓu-mɔɔrɔ, ɓɛɛ a̧ ɔ wan oi-aa.
Kapsiki_DC: Kwete wəndə Pɛka sləa ŋkɛ, wəzege ta Remaliya, nya kese kawəndə kwelea ka sewajɛ kempa, tsate ghena yite. Pa se le mbeli mcɛfemsə se mbe Gala'ad, pa hɛ maghe kənə mbe kwete cɛ ki ghɛa meghe. Ma kwa peslekɛ ŋkɛ ne, pa kelete meghe te ŋkwa ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: Peka je ni Remaliyahu no, je kluu sode äe no, kal mañ äaale äe. AÀ kal 'warge äe go äil kor tiñ wañn nen äili. AÀ rgob wo de Ariye hay wo kayge äe ni de jar Galaad wo do dwee. Blam maga se 'warn go 'war mono aà kal joñ wañ go ti ngeel äe.

Francais: Le reste des actes de Phacéia, et tout ce qu'il a fait, voici que cela est écrit dans le livre des Chroniques des rois d'Israël. --Phacée d'Israël; Les Assyriens s'emparent d'une partie du pays.--
Anglais: And the rest of the acts of Pekahiah, and all that he did, behold, they are written in the book of the chronicles of the kings of Israel.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Caw lopna vi Pekakiya ma hinina, slen ma nam lum kafna, kayni ka ɗoy hay ɗerwelda vi Labar-Ma-Liyna vi gurona vi Israyel.
Bulu: Mimboone mivoʼo ya be Pékahia a mam mese a nga bo, me ne ntilan e kalate minkañete bejô bôte ya Israél.
Guiziga: Pekahiya, ɓi naŋ mekelemey mindiram ati gwat naŋ miga taŋ gar na, i mutoho taŋ le angi ɗerewol mazilaka Ɗerewol ngi ɓi ngi slra ngi buy Israyeley.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Luttuɗum haala Pekahaya e kuuɗe mum fuu, ɗum winndaama nder Deftere Habaruuji Nyalaaɗe nde Laamiiɓe Isra'iila.
Fulfulde_DC: Luttuɗum haala Pekahaya e kuuɗe mum fuu, ɗum winndaama nder Deftere Habaruuji Nyalaaɗe nde Laamiiɓe Isra'iila.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Oi o tom ko Pɛkaya in o mɔ lɛŋ n'aa dea yɔra zaŋ Kalata Nyɛrɛ ko o wannu *Israɛl.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Oi o tom ko Pɛkaya in o mɔ lɛŋ n'aa dea yɔra zaŋ Kalata Nyɛrɛ ko o wannu *Israɛl.
Kapsiki_DC: Pɛtɛa ghena ta Pekahiya nyi ketene le yɛ slene ta ŋkɛ nahe hɛ kenza kerafe rafe mbe palepa ta ka meghea ka Israyɛl.
Tupurri: Te joñre Pekaya no, de fen maga aà joñn mo äuy sen wo de yerge äil kefder Kronig wañre ma Israyeln wo no.

Francais: La cinquante-deuxième année d'Azarias, roi de Juda, Phacée, fils de Romélias, régna sur Israël à Samarie; son règne fut de vingt ans.
Anglais: In the two and fiftieth year of Azariah king of Judah Pekah the son of Remaliah began to reign over Israel in Samaria, and reigned twenty years.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay busata dok-vasl yam ma'ta vi Azariya mulda vi Yuda, Peka goora vi Remaliya ti mulda kay sa Israyella hay Samariya. Nam ti mulda ir busat dok-ma'.
Bulu: Mbu mewôm metan a baa Azaria, njô bôte ya Yuda a nga jôô, ñwô Péka e mone Remaliahu a nga tebe njô bôte ya Israél e Samari. A nga jôô mimbu mibaé.
Guiziga: Azariya, buy Zuda, angi vi mizli ngir zlum nga cuw naŋ angi zuma buyo na, Peka, mangal ngi Remaliya a ci buy Israyel a Samari, a zum buyo vi kukur cuw.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nder nduuɓu laamu Ahaziya laamiiɗo Yahuuda cappanɗe jowi e ɗiɗaɓu, Peka ɓii Remaliya laami haa Isra'iila. O laami haa Samariya duuɓi noogas.
Fulfulde_DC: Nder nduuɓu laamu Ahaziya laamiiɗo Yahuuda cappanɗe jowi e ɗiɗaɓu, Peka ɓii Remaliya laami haa Isra'iila. O laami haa Samariya duuɓi noogas.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ŋgimbi nɛ Azaria wannu Juda kpaa pɛ ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-zua-yiitoo tɛ wan kɔ‘i kaɗi, Pɛka bem ko Rɛmalia ɔɔ wan *Israɛl sɛn Samarii pɛ ɓu-yiitoo.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ŋgimbi nɛ Azaria wannu Juda kpaa pɛ ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-zua-yiitoo tɛ wan kɔ‘i kaɗi, Pɛka bem ko Rɛmalia ɔɔ wan *Israɛl sɛn Samarii pɛ ɓu-yiitoo.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma mbe va kwa mcɛfemsə bakeghəmbe ta Azariya mbe meghe mbe Zhəwda ne, Pɛka, wəzege ta Remaliya ya kameghea ka Israyɛl mbe Samari. Bakemsə va ta ŋkɛ te meghe.
Tupurri: Nen kiñgi ma de do dwee ti äog maga Asariya ti wañ Juda mono, Peka je ni Remaliyahun kal joñ wañ ti Israyel Samari.

Francais: Il fit ce qui est mal aux yeux de Yahweh, il ne se détourna pas des péchés de Jéroboam, fils de Nabat, qui avait fait pécher Israël.
Anglais: And he did that which was evil in the sight of the  Lord : he departed not from the sins of Jeroboam the son of Nebat, who made Israel to sin.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam li slen ma joo'o kir Ma-Vatɗina, suluk ma Yerobowam kal sum sa Israyel hayamna nam min ja jaram goy hiɗi nam noŋɗi.
Bulu: A nga bo mam me nʼabé e mise me Nti; a nji ke saʼale mbia mimboone ya Yérôbôam, e mone Nébat a nga dutu Israél na a bo.
Guiziga: Peka a gi di i gwat malambaˀ a mihiri ngi Buymisemuŋ. Mungra, Zeroboˀam, mangal ngi Nebat miga, hã a hizigiɗa Israyeley ɓa a gam aya na, naŋ a pula gi naŋ mbak le ta.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O waɗi kalluɗum yeeso Jawmiraawo, o accaay waɗugo hakkeeji ɗi Yerobo'am ɓii Nebat nastini Isra'iila'en nder maaji.
Fulfulde_DC: O waɗi kalluɗum yeeso Jawmiraawo, o accaay waɗugo hakkeeji ɗi Yerobo'am ɓii Nebat nastini Isra'iila'en nder maaji.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: A̧ dee mɔ ɗaŋ yí GASA WAN. Nɛ́ kpɔk ɗaŋmɔ nɛ̀ Jeroboam bem ko Nɛbat dee so, kai nɛ̀ o be *Israɛl a sɛnɛ‘i, a̧ a̧ dea mbɛt.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: A̧ dee mɔ ɗaŋ yí GASA WAN. Nɛ́ kpɔk ɗaŋmɔ nɛ̀ Jeroboam bem ko Nɛbat dee so, kai nɛ̀ o be *Israɛl a sɛnɛ‘i, a̧ a̧ dea mbɛt.
Kapsiki_DC: Wəshi nyi keɗema kehite geva yamene ŋkɛ kwa kema ta Mahwətə, kesərəakɛ mene jaɗafa nyi kala ŋa Zhɛrobowam wəzege ta Nebat, nya ketsəkwəame ka Israyɛl mbe mene jaɗafa ŋkɛ we.
Tupurri: AÀ joñ fen ma de älagge nen Manwuri. AÀ cel go see älagge maga Jerobowam je ni Nebadn kañ wer Israyel joñge äe mo gaè.
