KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: GASA WAN toma o wi-biro ko o be Kaldee, ko o be Aram, ko o be Moab in ko o be Amɔŋ si zu a̧. A̧ toma wa si zu nù Juda ha̧ wa mɛ ɗaŋ a̧ nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ nɛ̀ nú o *wi-tɔ̧-wen oi nú Sɔ̧, o wi-de-tom kɔ̧-a̧.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa Mahwətə ghwenakɛ nda ka Babilone, ka Siri nyi ketaze ŋkwa, le ka Mowab, ba'a Amon, nyi ketazemte meghea ka Zhəwda, kala nya gezete ghena nya kese va Mahwətə nde mɛ ŋkwa.
Tupurri: Do kay nono, Manwur kal laa jar Kalde wo le ne Yehoyakim ti ngaäa, jar Siri wo ngaäa, jar Mowab wo ngaäa de jar Amoñ wo ngaäa. AÀ kal laa rage le ne Juda ti, ma yee nen äe go, ti jag waçaçre maga Manwur hay waçaçn go ne weere joçoçre äe jar ndar nen waçaçre ma jag äen wo jag mono.

Francais: Ce fut uniquement sur l'ordre de Yahweh que cela arriva contre Juda, pour l'ôter de devant sa face, à cause de tous les péchés commis par Manassé,
Anglais: Surely at the commandment of the  Lord  came this upon Judah, to remove them out of his sight, for the sins of Manasseh, according to all that he did;
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Van ki kayn nala co kayn kuɗ minda vi Lawna tuta, kay nam mini kay yaw jafna vi Yuda goy vok iramu, kuɗ suluk ma Manase lum kafna.
Bulu: Jame te e nga bobane foʼo vʼamu abendé Nti, amu a nga kômbô telé Yuda fefele ya asu dé, amu abé ese Manasé a nga bo,
Guiziga: Hana a gi hĩˀĩ na vur i Buymisemuŋ muɗuva ɓi nah. A wuɗ ɓa a kiraha mizli Zudahaya kileŋ a mihiri naŋ. Asi mike na, Manase a gi mungra le wal wal haɗa.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɗum laati fodde wolde Jawmiraawo dow yimɓe Yahuuda ngam wudingo ɓe daayiiɗum bee maako, daliila hakkeeji ɗi laamiiɗo Manassa waɗi fuu,
Fulfulde_DC: Ɗum laati fodde wolde Jawmiraawo dow yimɓe Yahuuda ngam wudingo ɓe daayiiɗum bee maako, daliila hakkeeji ɗi laamiiɗo Manassa waɗi fuu,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Nɛ́ sɛn tɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen ko GASA WAN a̧ mɔ‘i hɔɔ nɛnɛ zu o be Juda, wen ká GASA WAN tɛɛ zɔk wa yí wi. Nɛ́ wen zu o ɗaŋmɔ ko Manase, o mɔ lɛŋ n'aa dea,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Nɛ́ sɛn tɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen ko GASA WAN a̧ mɔ‘i hɔɔ nɛnɛ zu o be Juda, wen ká GASA WAN tɛɛ zɔk wa yí wi. Nɛ́ wen zu o ɗaŋmɔ ko Manase, o mɔ lɛŋ n'aa dea,
Kapsiki_DC: Kwa nza ŋkɛ Mahwətə nde ve ndiremia shɛ kadzete meghea ka Zhəwda, va nya ɗema newe hɛ ŋkɛ kwa kema ta ŋkɛ. Kwa nza ŋkɛ kwele kwele menete nda fete meghe Manasɛ,
Tupurri: Sen joñ do kay no mono diñ ti jag waçaçre maga Manwur hay waçaçn go mo tawa no, maga se mo ndor Juda go pel se wer älagge maga Manase hay joñ ra mo äuy no.

Francais: et à cause du sang innocent qu'avait répandu Manassé, au point de remplir Jérusalem de sang innocent. C'est pourquoi Yahweh ne voulait point pardonner.
Anglais: And also for the innocent blood that he shed: for he filled Jerusalem with innocent blood; which the  Lord  would not pardon.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kuɗ busuw ma bay-joota ma Manase ɦokom goyo ma nam hob Yerusalem hiɗi namna. Kuɗ kayni Ma-Vatɗina min vul gida kay sulukŋa visi noŋɗi.
Bulu: a amu metyi me ne te bijô, mme Manasé a nga kuli, metyi me ne te bijô mme a nga jalé Yérusalém. Nti a nji ke kômbô jamé.
Guiziga: Yo a kiɗ mizli migam gwat tahay le haɗa, hã kiɗa hirnga a gi le haɗa ar walahay Zeruzaleme. Vurˀe, Buymisemuŋ a ngum pula ɓi nah teˀ ta.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: o mbari yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe ɓe ngoodaa aybe, o hebbini berniwol Urusaliima bee ƴiiƴam maɓɓe haa Jawmiraawo yiɗaa yaafaago fahin.
Fulfulde_DC: o mbari yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe ɓe ngoodaa aybe, o hebbini berniwol Urusaliima bee ƴiiƴam maɓɓe haa Jawmiraawo yiɗaa yaafaago fahin.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: in wen zu tɔk tɛ o bíí nɛ̀ de ŋma mɔ na n'aa gbaia so fok nɛnɛ Jerusalɛm dam fara lɛŋ, à̧ GASA WAN kɔ̧ nɛnɛ mɛ e ɗaŋmɔ ha̧ Juda na.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: in wen zu tɔk tɛ o bíí nɛ̀ de ŋma mɔ na n'aa gbaia so fok nɛnɛ Jerusalɛm dam fara lɛŋ, à̧ GASA WAN kɔ̧ nɛnɛ mɛ e ɗaŋmɔ ha̧ Juda na.
Kapsiki_DC: nahe ŋkɛ kempəmte kweci mbeli kwele kwele nyi ɗema fete ve mbe Zhɛrəzalɛm, viɗi ŋkwa nya mbe melemea shɛ va ghena ta mpə ŋkwa, vatse ɗema Mahwətə kakelemte te wənə.
Tupurri: Day diñ wer ci jar maga bay wo de ma joñmopo wa, ga Manase kaan go mono, maga aà hay baa äi leege Jerusalem go de äe mono. Manwur laa dayge fug äil go ne hen ti gaè.

Francais: Le reste des actes de Joakim, et tout ce qu'il a fait, cela n'est-il pas écrit dans le livre des Chroniques des rois de Juda?
Anglais: Now the rest of the acts of Jehoiakim, and all that he did, are they not written in the book of the chronicles of the kings of Judah?
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Caw lopna vi Yoyakim ma hinina, slen ma nam lum kafna, kayni ka ɗoy hay ɗerwelda vi Labar-Ma-Liyna vi muliyana vi Yuda.
Bulu: Mimboon mivoʼo mi Yehôyakin, a mam mese a nga bo, bi ne ntilan e kalate minkañete bejô bôte ya Yuda.
Guiziga: Zoˀakiŋe, ɓi naŋ mekelemey mindiram ati slra naŋ miga taŋ gar na, i mutoho taŋ le angi ɗerewol mazilaka «Ɗerewol ngi ɓi ngi buy Zudahay».
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Luttuɗum haala Yooyakim e kuuɗe mum fuu, ɗum winndaama nder Deftere Habaruuji Nyalaaɗe nde Laamiiɓe Yahuuda.
Fulfulde_DC: Luttuɗum haala Yooyakim e kuuɗe mum fuu, ɗum winndaama nder Deftere Habaruuji Nyalaaɗe nde Laamiiɓe Yahuuda.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Oi o tom ko Jɔakim, mɔ lɛŋ n'aa dea yɔra zaŋ Kalata nyɛrɛ ko o wannu Juda.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Oi o tom ko Jɔakim, mɔ lɛŋ n'aa dea yɔra zaŋ Kalata nyɛrɛ ko o wannu Juda.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma nyi ketene ghena ta Zhowakim ne mbe palepa ta slene ta ka meghea ka Zhəwda.
Tupurri: Te joñre Yehoyakim wo de fen maga aà joñn mo äuy, sen wo de yerge äil kefder Kronig wañre ma Judan wo no.

Francais: Joakim se coucha avec ses pères, et Joachin son fils, régna à sa place.
Anglais: So Jehoiakim slept with his fathers: and Jehoiachin his son reigned in his stead.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Yoyakim miti kuɗ sumiyamu, goora valamu Yoyakin ti mulda hay baŋalamu.
Bulu: Yehôyakin a nga bômbô baa bʼésaa vôme wua. E mone wé Yehôyakin a nga jôô éjiane jé.
Guiziga: Zoˀakiŋ a muc, ara luuma dideˀ naŋhay a ruwuyo. Akẽh na, mangal naŋ Zoˀakiŋ a zuɓa li naŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nde Yooyakim maayi, ɓiyiiko, Yooyakin laami haa pellel maako.
Fulfulde_DC: Nde Yooyakim maayi, ɓiyiiko, Yooyakin laami haa pellel maako.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Jɔakim fea si ɗoŋ o dáà kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ bem kɔ̧-a̧ Jɔakin ɔ wan oi-aa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Jɔakim fea si ɗoŋ o dáà kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ bem kɔ̧-a̧ Jɔakin ɔ wan oi-aa.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kwa mtenyɛ Zhowakim ne, wəzege ta ŋkɛ Zhowakin nde kelete meghe kwa sebe ta ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: Yehoyakim kal sugi go äiñ paçaçre äe wo. Je ni äe Yehoyakin kal joñ wañ ti ngeel äe.

Francais: Le roi d'Egypte ne sortit plus de son pays; car le roi de Babylone avait pris tout ce qui était au roi d'Egypte, depuis le torrent d'Egypte jusqu'au fleuve de l'Euphrate. --Joachin.--
Anglais: And the king of Egypt came not again any more out of his land: for the king of Babylon had taken from the river of Egypt unto the river Euphrates all that pertained to the king of Egypt.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Mul ma Egiptena may kali goy hay nagata valam pa loɗi, kay mul ma Babilonna yaw ir nagana valam kafe, tun caway hay niy-ma-riŋŋa vi Egipte pa, ta-ta hay vun niy-lumna Eufrata goŋ'.
Bulu: Njô bôte ya Ejipte a nji fe beta kui atane ya si jé, amu njô bôte ya Babilôn a nga mane nyoñe biôme bise bi mbe biôme bi njô bôte ya Ejipte, ataté asôʼô yʼEjipte a kui ôsôé Efrat.
Guiziga: Ti di nah na, buy Ezipte anta bi put le tisi ruwuy naŋ mata, asi buy madiɗa ngi Babiloŋ a zuma hirwuy Ezipte le pay pay wãˀ, zle a mizaw Ezipte, hã sesẽŋ a mizaw Efrat.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ammaa laamiiɗo Misra meetaay wurtaago lesdi muuɗum, ngam laamiiɗo Baabila nyaamno maral laamiiɗo Misra diga maayel Misra haa maayo Efratis.
Fulfulde_DC: Ammaa laamiiɗo Misra meetaay wurtaago lesdi muuɗum, ngam laamiiɗo Baabila nyaamno maral laamiiɗo Misra diga maayel Misra haa maayo Efratis.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɗoŋ ŋgimbi'i, wannu Egiptɛ gbo tɛ nù kɔ‘i ɓɔna, wen wannu Babilɔŋ baa so nù kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ, ku̧u̧naŋ-a nɛ̀ be-zer Egiptɛ hɔ tɛ nana-yí Efrat.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ɗoŋ ŋgimbi'i, wannu Egiptɛ gbo tɛ nù kɔ‘i ɓɔna, wen wannu Babilɔŋ baa so nù kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ, ku̧u̧naŋ-a nɛ̀ be-zer Egiptɛ hɔ tɛ nana-yí Efrat.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma meghea ka Ɛzhipte ne kese kashave mbe hɛɗia ŋkɛ zhɛkwa we, kwa nza ŋkɛ nahe meghea ka Babilone kefəhwe hɛɗi nyi kese mbe dzeve ta ŋkɛ ve, nya kwelɛ ghala ta ka Ɛzhipte laka bela kwa gwela ba'a laka Efrate, le hələa Babilone.
Tupurri: Wañ Ejipte hay bay le go kalge sigi äi sir äe wa so, werga wañ Babilone hay go de yaçaç ngeel maga hay diñ ma Ejipte mo äuy, tï¡ï¡ wer le jag pyew ma Ejipte ka' haçaç nduu go jag maarog ma Efrade.

Francais: Joachin avait dix-huit ans lorsqu'il devint roi, et il régna trois mois à Jérusalem. Sa mère s'appelait Nohesta, fille d'Elnathan, de Jérusalem.
Anglais: Jehoiachin was eighteen years old when he began to reign, and he reigned in Jerusalem three months. And his mother's name was Nehushta, the daughter of Elnathan of Jerusalem.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Yoyakin ka hiɗi busat doogo yam glafandi hay li ma nisi tunum mulu. Nam ti mulda ir til ɦidi hay Yerusalem. Sulum ya' Nehusta, goota vi Elnatan, ma Yerusalemna.
Bulu: Yehôyakin a nga bili mimbu awôm a muam éyoñ a nga tebe njô bôt; a nga jôô ngon éla e Yérusalém.
Guiziga: Zoˀakiŋ micifi buy madiɗa na, naɓa naŋ ti vi kuruˀ nga dangafaɗa. A zum buy a Zeruzaleme vi makir. A zilaka mumuŋ naŋ Nehuseta, zuŋ ngi Elnataŋ, mbur Zeruzalem.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yooyakin woodi duuɓi sappo e joweetati, saa'i o laamo. O laami haa Urusaliima lebbi tati. Innde daada maako, Nehusta ɓii Elnatan mo Urusaliima.
Fulfulde_DC: Yooyakin woodi duuɓi sappo e joweetati, saa'i o laamo. O laami haa Urusaliima lebbi tati. Innde daada maako, Nehusta ɓii Elnatan mo Urusaliima.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Jɔakin a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ pɛ ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar ŋgimbi n'aa ɔɔ nɛ̀ wan, ɓɛɛ a̧ ɔ wan fio-zɛ taar sɛn Jerusalɛm; nin nàà kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ́ Nɛhusta boko-bem ko Ɛlnataŋ be Jerusalɛm.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Jɔakin a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ pɛ ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar ŋgimbi n'aa ɔɔ nɛ̀ wan, ɓɛɛ a̧ ɔ wan fio-zɛ taar sɛn Jerusalɛm; nin nàà kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ́ Nɛhusta boko-bem ko Ɛlnataŋ be Jerusalɛm.
Kapsiki_DC: Zhowakin nda dzembe meghe ŋkɛ ne meŋe degheseghəmbe. Deke tere mahekene menehwe meghe ŋkɛ mbe Zhɛrəzalɛm. Nehəwsheta sləa meghekɛ, wəzha ta Ɛlnatan nde Zhɛrəzalɛm.
Tupurri: Kiñgi Yehoyakin hay hwal ti nenma'a, de maga aà nduu ti wañ mono, aà joñ wañ Jerusalem few swa'a. Ëu man äe hay ga Nehusta, may ma Elnatan ma Jerusalem.

Francais: Il fit ce qui est mal aux yeux de Yahweh, selon tout ce qu'avait fait son père.
Anglais: And he did that which was evil in the sight of the  Lord , according to all that his father had done.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam li slen ma joona kir Ma-Vatɗina, ŋray ca ki bulum nala.
Bulu: A nga bo mam me ne abé e mise me Nti, e mezene mese, aval ésaa a nga bo.
Guiziga: Zoˀakiŋ a gi di i gwat malambaˀ a mihiri ngi Buymisemuŋ, heˀ kaɓa cine naŋ zleˀe.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O waɗi kalluɗum yeeso Jawmiraawo, kal-kal bee ko kaakiraaɓe maako mbaɗno.
Fulfulde_DC: O waɗi kalluɗum yeeso Jawmiraawo, kal-kal bee ko kaakiraaɓe maako mbaɗno.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: A̧ dee mɔ ɗaŋ yí GASA WAN hee ko dáà kɔ̧-a̧ ga.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: A̧ dee mɔ ɗaŋ yí GASA WAN hee ko dáà kɔ̧-a̧ ga.
Kapsiki_DC: Wəsə nya keɗema kehi kwa kema ta Mahwətə yamene Zhowakin kala ŋa yitenyɛ.
Tupurri: AÀ joñ fen ma de älagge nen Manwur go ti ngeeln wo äuy do maga pan äe hay joñ no lay no.

Francais: En ce temps-là, les serviteurs de Nabuchodonosor, roi de Babylone, montèrent contre Jérusalem, et la ville fut assiégée.
Anglais: At that time the servants of Nebuchadnezzar king of Babylon came up against Jerusalem, and the city was besieged.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay na'ta kayni, sa sunda vi Nebukadnesar mul ma Babilonna co'o, kay dur Yerusalem, nisi ŋuy Yerusalem cusl'.
Bulu: Melu mete bebo bisaé be Nébukatnétzar, njô bôte ya Babilôn, be nga bet a wosane Yérusalém, ane be nga dili tisone bita.
Guiziga: Tin di nah na, soje Babiloŋhoy, gawla ngi Nabukodonozoroy miwaka taŋ na, a ram ɓa ara zliram kiɗa vu ati walahay Zeruzaleme, a ndahaka hirnga ngi walahay Zeruzaleme le ndah.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Saa'i maajum honooɓe Nabukodonosor laamiiɗo Baabila ngari haa Urusaliima, ɓe maɓɓi berniwol.
Fulfulde_DC: Saa'i maajum honooɓe Nabukodonosor laamiiɗo Baabila ngari haa Urusaliima, ɓe maɓɓi berniwol.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Tɛ ŋgimbi'i, o wi-biro ko Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr wannu Babilɔŋ baa zu dúk nɛ̀ Jerusalɛm; wa kɛra ye e nù,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Tɛ ŋgimbi'i, o wi-biro ko Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr wannu Babilɔŋ baa zu dúk nɛ̀ Jerusalɛm; wa kɛra ye e nù,
Kapsiki_DC: Ma mbe vəa shɛ, pa ka sewajɛa ka Babilone nyi kesleke kwete meghea ka sewajɛa meghe Nabəkodonozor, se kantishɛnyɛ mbe Zhɛrəzalɛm.
Tupurri: De ngar ngeel sen ni mono weere joçoçre Nebukanetsar wañ Babilon kal wo nduugi le Jerusalem, aà kal wo cir ti äi leegen go.

Francais: Nabuchodonosor, roi de Babylone, vint devant la ville pendant que ses serviteurs l'assiégeaient.
Anglais: And Nebuchadnezzar king of Babylon came against the city, and his servants did besiege it.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nebukadnesar mul ma Babilonna co vun hoyok-ziyna, kayni hay li ma sa sunda valamu ka ŋuy hoyok-ziyna.
Bulu: Nébukatnétzar, njô bôte ya Babilôn, a nga suane metataʼa me tison, éyoñe te bebo bisaé bé be diliʼi je bita.
Guiziga: Nabukodonozor, buy madiɗa ngi Babiloŋ a ndilo na, naɓa gawla naŋhay ara ndahaka hirnga ngi Zeruzaleme.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nabukodonosor laamiiɗo Baabila bee hoore mum wari hippi berniwol, saa'i honooɓe ɗonno taari ngol.
Fulfulde_DC: Nabukodonosor laamiiɗo Baabila bee hoore mum wari hippi berniwol, saa'i honooɓe ɗonno taari ngol.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: ɓɛɛ Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr wannu Babilɔŋ nɛ́ mɛ bi ye nɛ̀ o wi-biro kɔ̧-a̧ kpee e nù kaɗi'i.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: ɓɛɛ Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr wannu Babilɔŋ nɛ́ mɛ bi ye nɛ̀ o wi-biro kɔ̧-a̧ kpee e nù kaɗi'i.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma mba ŋkɛ kasleke ŋkwa nya tagha ne, pa Nabəkodonozor se le ghəa ŋkɛ kantishɛnyɛ tagha.
Tupurri: Nebukanetsar wañ Babilon kal nduugi jag tiñ ma äi leege no, de maga weere joçoçre äen wo de cir ti äe mono.

Francais: Alors Joachin, roi de Juda, sortit auprès du roi de Babylone, avec sa mère, ses serviteurs, ses chefs et ses eunuques, et le roi de Babylone le fit prisonnier la huitième année de son règne.
Anglais: And Jehoiachin the king of Judah went out to the king of Babylon, he, and his mother, and his servants, and his princes, and his officers: and the king of Babylon took him in the eighth year of his reign.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ki kayn nala Yoyakin mulla vi Yuda kali kat Nebukadnesar, namu hiɗi sulumu, sa sunda valamu, sa ŋulona valamu hiɗi sa patayna valam kafe. Mul ma Babilonna gum daŋgaya, kayni hay busata glafandita vi mulda valamu.
Bulu: Eyoñe te Yehôyakin, njô bôte ya Yuda, a nga ke tôbane njô bôte ya Babilôn, émien, nyia, bebo bisaé bé, bivete bié a bezimbi bé. Njô bôte ya Babilôn a nga bi nye mbôk e mbu muame ya éjôé jé.
Guiziga: Ar nah na, Zoˀakiŋ, buy Zuda ati mumuŋ naŋ, gawla naŋhay, mizli naŋhay madiɗahay ati mizli ngi si mevelehaya, a ram ng'avu buy madiɗa ngi Babiloŋ. Joˀ buy madiɗa ngi Babiloŋ a gica Zoˀakiŋe ar dangay, naɓa Zoˀakiŋ a ɓul di i vi midangafaɗ naŋ angi zuma buyo.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nden Yooyakin laamiiɗo Yahuuda, wurti berniwol, yehi haa laamiiɗo Baabila, kaŋko e daada maako e jaggiiɓe maako e mawɓe e saraaki'en maako. Laamiiɗo Baabila naŋngi ɓe. Ɗum laati nder nduuɓu laamu Nabukodonosor joweetataɓu .
Fulfulde_DC: Nden Yooyakin laamiiɗo Yahuuda, wurti berniwol, yehi haa laamiiɗo Baabila, kaŋko e daada maako e jaggiiɓe maako e mawɓe e saraaki'en maako. Laamiiɗo Baabila naŋngi ɓe. Ɗum laati nder nduuɓu laamu Nabukodonosor joweetataɓu .
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Jɔakin wannu Juda in nàà kɔ‘i, o wi-biro kɔ̧-a̧, o gasawi nú kira kɔ̧-a̧ in o bíí kɔ̧-a̧ mbɛt gboo, ɓɛɛ nɛ sitɛ wannu, ɓɛɛ a̧ kai wa nɛ̀ bara-biro. Ŋgimbi'i, Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr dee pɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar tɛ wan kaɗi.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Jɔakin wannu Juda in nàà kɔ‘i, o wi-biro kɔ̧-a̧, o gasawi nú kira kɔ̧-a̧ in o bíí kɔ̧-a̧ mbɛt gboo, ɓɛɛ nɛ sitɛ wannu, ɓɛɛ a̧ kai wa nɛ̀ bara-biro. Ŋgimbi'i, Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr dee pɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar tɛ wan kaɗi.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa meghe Zhowakin shave mbe meleme le meghekɛ ɓiyitsa, le ka jama jama ta ka sewajɛa ŋkɛ, le yɛ ka mene slene nyi jama jama ba'a mbelia ŋkɛ nyi gezleŋema ghə ŋkɛ va hɛ, pa hɛ lə sha meghea ka Babilone. Pa kesehwe hɛ kamava. Te kwa deghese ta va ta Nabəkodonozor te meghe.
Tupurri: Do kay nono, Yehoyakin wañ Juda raw kalge le go see wañ Babilone. AÀ wo de man äe, de weere joçoçre äen wo, de minisdir äen wo de jar äe ma ndar äayn wo. Wañ Babilon kal baage äe dañgay nen kiñgi ma de nenma' maga se ti wañ mono.

Francais: Il emporta de là tous les trésors de la maison de Yahweh et les trésors de la maison du roi, et il brisa tous les ustensiles d'or que Salomon, roi d'Israël, avait faits dans le temple de Yahweh, comme Yahweh l'avait annoncé.
Anglais: And he carried out thence all the treasures of the house of the  Lord , and the treasures of the king's house, and cut in pieces all the vessels of gold which Solomon king of Israel had made in the temple of the  Lord , as the  Lord  had said.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Timgil ma ka hay ziyna vi Ma-Vatɗina hiɗi timgil ma ka hay ziyna vi mulla nam yawam kafe; tasa ma ora ma Salomon mulla vi Israyel kotom kalaf hay Tempella nam yawam kafe, tasa ma kawayna ma mulla Salomon kotom kalaf hay Tempella ki Ma-Vatɗin dum nalana, nam tom goy kafe.
Bulu: A nga kuli akum ese ya nda Nti a nda njô bôt atan. A nga mane bôé biôme bise bi ne mboon a or bifuse bifus, mbie Solômon, njô bôte ya Israél, a nga bo e nda Zambe Nti, avale Nti a nga jô.
Guiziga: Zlili ngir hay ngi Bumbulvuŋ ati zlili ngi hay buyo Nabukodonozor a hila gar. Yo gazlanga ngi ɓiri tapasl tapaslay misi ar hay ngi Bumbulvuŋ, Salomoŋ, buy Israyel muvuɗa taŋ zleˀe na, a nguɓuco taŋ gar nguɓoc nguɓoc. Hana gar a gi na kaɓa Buymisemuŋ miɓa zleˀe.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nabukodonosor hooci ndesaaje haykaliiru Jawmiraawo e ndesaaje saare laamu fuu. O sampiti kuuje kaŋŋeeri ɗe Suleymaanu laamiiɗo Isra'iila waɗno nder haykaliiru Jawmiraawo ngam dewal, bana Jawmiraawo wi'no.
Fulfulde_DC: Nabukodonosor hooci ndesaaje haykaliiru Jawmiraawo e ndesaaje saare laamu fuu. O sampiti kuuje kaŋŋeeri ɗe Suleymaanu laamiiɗo Isra'iila waɗno nder haykaliiru Jawmiraawo ngam dewal, bana Jawmiraawo wi'no.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: A̧ kaia o mbɔi kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN in o wan mɛ kɔ̧ tua ko wannu nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ mɔ nɛ̀ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ so. A̧ gbina o mɔ lɛŋ nɛ̀ Salomɔŋ wannu *Israɛl dee so nɛ̀ I̧or e wen Tua ko GASA WAN a nù.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: A̧ kaia o mbɔi kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN in o wan mɛ kɔ̧ tua ko wannu nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ mɔ nɛ̀ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ so. A̧ gbina o mɔ lɛŋ nɛ̀ Salomɔŋ wannu *Israɛl dee so nɛ̀ I̧or e wen Tua ko GASA WAN a nù.
Kapsiki_DC: Kala nya gezete Mahwətə kaghate ne, pa Nabəkodonozor fəmte wəshi nyi mbe ghɛa Shala le yɛ nyi ki ghɛa meghe, pa ŋkɛ mpəmte wəshi mze kwa tere tere nyi vɛsəte meghe Salomon kezha mene slene le hɛ mbe ghɛa Shala.
Tupurri: Wañ Babilon kal hoo feçeçre ma ti ngeel lag horog ma äi tiñ mani Manwurn wo de ma äi tiñ mani wañn äuy. AÀ mbug feçeçre maga wo de joñge de boo biñni ga wañ Salomoñ hay joñ ra äi tiñ mani Manwurn mo go geëeb geëeb äuy, do maga Manwur hay waçaçn go nono.

Francais: Il emmena en captivité tout Jérusalem, tous les chefs et tous les hommes vaillants, -- dix mille captifs, -- avec tous les artisans et les forgerons; il ne resta que le peuple pauvre du pays.
Anglais: And he carried away all Jerusalem, and all the princes, and all the mighty men of valour, even ten thousand captives, and all the craftsmen and smiths: none remained, save the poorest sort of the people of the land.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sum sa ŋulona hay Yerusalemna nam kalsi gorvo kaf, tapay hiɗi sum sa jufayna pet nisi ir birim doogo, sa har guna hiɗi sa kot vun-ziyna, hin kayni si sum sa hawna tuta.
Bulu: A nga mane kee Yérusalém ase e minkôm, bivete bise a benya bôte bese, toyini awôm, a mintyetyeñe mise a belui mengôñ; bone be bôte ya si étam mbe be nga liʼi.
Guiziga: Mizli Zeruzalemey ati mizli madiɗahay gar, mizli gambarahay gar, mizli misina ɗiya gwatay ati gudihey gar, jom gar na, a gam gwat ngi mizli durmuk kuruˀu. Nabukodonozor a ja taŋ ng'a ruwuy naŋ. Sey mindiram i mizli misi murga ngi si ruwuyoy tewle.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O dahi yimɓe ummaatoore Urusaliima, mawɓe e honooɓe semmbiɗɓe fuu, limgal maɓɓe waɗi ujine sappo. O dahi boo marɓe sanaa'aaji e kila'en fuu. Walaa mo lutti sonaa laafuɓe nder yimɓe lesdi man.
Fulfulde_DC: O dahi yimɓe ummaatoore Urusaliima, mawɓe e honooɓe semmbiɗɓe fuu, limgal maɓɓe waɗi ujine sappo. O dahi boo marɓe sanaa'aaji e kila'en fuu. Walaa mo lutti sonaa laafuɓe nder yimɓe lesdi man.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: A̧ kaia o wi Jerusalɛm nɛ̀ bara-biro yaknɛ: o wi nɔ‘i nɛ́ o gasa wi saaye in o wanmbɔi, wa lɛŋ dee hee booro-ɓu ga; o kela, in o wi-dui boi-nú-tua mbɛt; kànà nɛ́ o wisan a̧ ɓɔna tɛ nù‘i ɓɛɛ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: A̧ kaia o wi Jerusalɛm nɛ̀ bara-biro yaknɛ: o wi nɔ‘i nɛ́ o gasa wi saaye in o wanmbɔi, wa lɛŋ dee hee booro-ɓu ga; o kela, in o wi-dui boi-nú-tua mbɛt; kànà nɛ́ o wisan a̧ ɓɔna tɛ nù‘i ɓɛɛ.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa fəmte mbeli nyi mbe Zhɛrəzalɛm, ka mene slene nyi jama jama, mbeli nyi nza zləvə te hɛ, pɛtɛa nci ne mbeli kaslibə 10.000, kese mbeli kaɓela nyi keɗepe feɗe wəshi le yɛ ka tsa wəshi le yɛ nyi kehi wəshi we. Deke ka titikwəa kɛfi yasərəakɛ ŋkɛ tagha.
Tupurri: AÀ kal hoo jar Jerusalem wo äuy, aà hoo minisdirn wo de jar maga wo go tinoo mo äuy, jar maga aà hoo ra hay wo ndar hwale, bay de kee jar ko kne' feçeçren wo de jar ko heer feçeçren ni wa. Kal gwa'ge diñ jar ma me' ma äi sir wo no.

Francais: Il transporta Joachin à Babylone, et il emmena captifs de Jérusalem à Babylone la mère du roi, les femmes du roi et ses eunuques, et les grands du pays.
Anglais: And he carried away Jehoiachin to Babylon, and the king's mother, and the king's wives, and his officers, and the mighty of the land, those carried he into captivity from Jerusalem to Babylon.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam kal Yoyakin hay Babilon, sum-mulla nam va'ays hay Yerusalem pa kala' gorvo hay Babilon, boyna vi mulla hiɗi sa patayna valam kaw nam yawsiya, hiɗi sa ŋulona vi nagat kafe.
Bulu: A nga kee fe Yehôyakin e Babilôn; a nga kee fe nyia njô bôt e minkôm, akôlô Yérusalém a ke e Babilôn, nalé fe binga be njô bôt a bezimbi bé, a biwôlô bi bôte ya si.
Guiziga: Nabukodonozor a ja Zoˀakiŋ, nga Babiloŋ, yo mumuŋ ngi buy ati ngwas naŋhay, mizli ngi si mevelehay gar waɗ mizli madiɗa ngi si ruwuy naŋhay gar na, a ja taŋ baɗ ti Zeruzaleme nga Babiloŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O dahi laamiiɗo Yooyakin e daada muuɗum e rewɓe muuɗum e saraaki'en muuɗum e semmbiɗɓe muuɗum diga Urusaliima e mawɓe Yahuuda  e
Fulfulde_DC: O dahi laamiiɗo Yooyakin e daada muuɗum e rewɓe muuɗum e saraaki'en muuɗum e semmbiɗɓe muuɗum diga Urusaliima e mawɓe Yahuuda  e
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: A̧ baa Jɔakin nɛ̀ bara yaknɛ si Babilɔŋ mɛ; a̧ baa nàà ko wannu, o kóò kɔ̧-a̧ in o gasa wi-biro gú nɛ̀ o be-wan mbɛt; a̧ kaia wa nɛ̀ bara-biro nɛ̀ Jerusalɛm yaknɛ si tɛ kɔ̧-a̧.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: A̧ baa Jɔakin nɛ̀ bara yaknɛ si Babilɔŋ mɛ; a̧ baa nàà ko wannu, o kóò kɔ̧-a̧ in o gasa wi-biro gú nɛ̀ o be-wan mbɛt; a̧ kaia wa nɛ̀ bara-biro nɛ̀ Jerusalɛm yaknɛ si tɛ kɔ̧-a̧.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa keleghe meghe Zhowakin kadzeme Babilone, le meghekɛ, mia ŋkɛ ba'a mbelia ŋkɛ nyi gezleŋema ghə ŋkɛ ve, le yɛ ka meghea ka Zhəwda.
Tupurri: AÀ kal baa Yehoyakin wo go Babilone. AÀ hoo man wañ wo le go de naare äen wo de jar äe ma ndar äayn wo de jar ma de eegre ma äi sirn wo äuy le Jerusalem, raw go de äaara Babilone.

Francais: De plus, tous les guerriers au nombre de sept mille, ainsi que les artisans et les forgerons au nombre de mille, tous hommes vaillants et propres à la guerre: le roi de Babylone les emmena captifs à Babylone.
Anglais: And all the men of might, even seven thousand, and craftsmen and smiths a thousand, all that were strong and apt for war, even them the king of Babylon brought captive to Babylon.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sa wi duur kaf ir birim siɗiya, sa har guna hiɗi sa kot vun-ziyna ir birim ɗaw, sum sa jufayna hiɗi sum sa wi duur kafe. Mul ma Babilonna kalsi goy gorvo'o hay Babilon.
Bulu: Bôte mewosan toyini zamgbwa, mintyetyeñ a belui mengôñ toyini. Bese be too bevevee be bôt, be too nkôman asu bita. Njô bôte ya Babilôn a nga kee be minkôm e Babilôn.
Guiziga: Migi vurumoy gwat ngi durmuk tarnaˀ ati mikiɗa hayay waɗ muvuɗa gwataya, gwat ngi durmuk pal, mizli mindilaka le ngi gi vurum gar na, a ja taŋ nga Babiloŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: mawɓe ujine njoweeɗiɗo e marɓe sanaa'aaji e kila'en ujineere, bee suusɓe, waawɓe konu fuu, laamiiɗo Baabila yahri ɓe haa Baabila.
Fulfulde_DC: mawɓe ujine njoweeɗiɗo e marɓe sanaa'aaji e kila'en ujineere, bee suusɓe, waawɓe konu fuu, laamiiɗo Baabila yahri ɓe haa Baabila.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wannu Babilɔŋ kaia o wanmbɔi lɛŋ booro-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo, o kela in o wi-dui boi-nú-tua booro, ká bá nɛ̀ o ŋga wi-biro lɛŋ nɛ̀ bara-biro yaknɛ si Babilɔŋ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wannu Babilɔŋ kaia o wanmbɔi lɛŋ booro-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo, o kela in o wi-dui boi-nú-tua booro, ká bá nɛ̀ o ŋga wi-biro lɛŋ nɛ̀ bara-biro yaknɛ si Babilɔŋ.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa fəghe mbeli nyi nza zləvə te hɛ kadzeme Babilone, 7.000 hɛ, ka ɗepe feɗe wəshi le ka ɗepe tsa wəshi ne, slibə hɛ, mbeli nyi pɛtɛ ne, mbeli tsape hɛ kezha mene wəshia ka sewajɛ.
Tupurri: Jar durgin hay wo ndar renam, jar ko kne' feçeçren wo de jar ko heer feçeçren hay wo ndare, jar maga wo diñ bogawla ga wo go de wore ma durgi mo äuy. Wañ Babilon hoo ra wo go ti dañgay Babilone.

Francais: Et le roi de Babylone établit roi, à la place de Joachin, Mathanias, son oncle, dont il changea le nom en celui de Sédécias. --Sédécias; ruine de Jérusalem.--
Anglais: And the king of Babylon made Mattaniah his father's brother king in his stead, and changed his name to Zedekiah.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Mul ma Babilonna vi Mataniya nasum Yoyakinna, nam tunum mulu hay baŋal Yoyakin, nam muɗum selem ala Sedekiyas.
Bulu: Njô bôte ya Babilôn a nga telé Matania, ésaa mongô Yehôyakin njô bôt, éjiane Yehôyakin émien, a nga tyendé jôé dé a yôlé nye na Sédékias.
Guiziga: A dirba nah na, buy madiɗa ngi Babiloŋ a cifi buy ar li ngi Zoˀakiŋ, i Matatiyas, jamba naŋ, waɗ a mbiɗaŋ slimiɗe, a zilaka Sedesiyas.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O laamini Mattaniya, bappa Yooyakin, haa pellel Yooyakin. O sannji innde maako, o inndi mo Sedekiya .
Fulfulde_DC: O laamini Mattaniya, bappa Yooyakin, haa pellel Yooyakin. O sannji innde maako, o inndi mo Sedekiya .
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wannu Babilɔŋ ee ŋma geɗek dáà ko Jɔakin nɛ̀ wan oi-aa. Nin geɗek dáà kɔ̧-a̧‘i nɛ́ Matania, ɓɛɛ a̧ gɔn mbe nin ha̧ a̧‘e Sedekias.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wannu Babilɔŋ ee ŋma geɗek dáà ko Jɔakin nɛ̀ wan oi-aa. Nin geɗek dáà kɔ̧-a̧‘i nɛ́ Matania, ɓɛɛ a̧ gɔn mbe nin ha̧ a̧‘e Sedekias.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa Nabəkodonozor veyi Mataniya kwesegwenyɛa Zhowakin kameghe ba'a zhɛremte sləa ŋkɛ kaSɛdɛkiyas.
Tupurri: Wañ Babilon kal kañ Mattaniya weel pan äen go wañ ti ngeel äe, maga aà kal coo ëu äe ga Sedesiyase.

Francais: Sédécias avait vingt et un ans lorsqu'il devint roi, et il régna onze ans à Jérusalem. Sa mère s'appelait Amital, fille de Jérémie, de Lobna.
Anglais: Zedekiah was twenty and one years old when he began to reign, and he reigned eleven years in Jerusalem. And his mother's name was Hamutal, the daughter of Jeremiah of Libnah.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sedekiyas tun hay mulda kayn busata valam asay dok-ma' yam kepe. Nam ti mulda ir busat doogo yam kepe hay Yerusalem. Sulum ya' ala Hamutal, goota vi Yeremiyas ma Libnana.
Bulu: Sédékias a nga bili mimbu mewôm mebaé a wua éyoñ a nga tebe njô bôt, a nga jôô mimbu awôm a wua e Yérusalém. Nyia a mbe jôé na Amutal, ngone Yérémi ya Libna.
Guiziga: Sedesiyas micifi buy madiɗa na, naɓa naŋ ti vi kukur cuw ngaŋ kaˀ. A zum buyo vi kuruˀ ngaŋ kaˀ a Zeruzaleme. A zilaka mumuŋ naŋ Hamutal, zuŋ ngi Irmeya, mbur Libna.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Sedekiya woodi duuɓi noogas e go'o, saa'i o laamo. O laami haa Urusaliima duuɓi sappo e go'o. Innde daada maako, Hamutal ɓii Yeremiya mo Libna .
Fulfulde_DC: Sedekiya woodi duuɓi noogas e go'o, saa'i o laamo. O laami haa Urusaliima duuɓi sappo e go'o. Innde daada maako, Hamutal ɓii Yeremiya mo Libna .
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Sedekias a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ pɛ ɓu-yiitoo-zua-kpɔk ŋgimbi n'aa ɔɔ nɛ̀ wan, ɓɛɛ a̧ ɔ wan pɛ ɓu-zua-kpɔk sɛn Jerusalɛm; nin nàà kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ́ Hamutal boko-bem ko Yirmɛya be Libna.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Sedekias a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ pɛ ɓu-yiitoo-zua-kpɔk ŋgimbi n'aa ɔɔ nɛ̀ wan, ɓɛɛ a̧ ɔ wan pɛ ɓu-zua-kpɔk sɛn Jerusalɛm; nin nàà kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ́ Hamutal boko-bem ko Yirmɛya be Libna.
Kapsiki_DC: Va ta Sɛdɛsiyas bakemsə kwetɛŋeghəmbe nda kelete meghe ŋkɛ. Va meŋe kwetɛŋeghəmbe menete ŋkɛ te meghe mbe Zhɛrəzalɛm. Nahe sləa meghekɛ kenza kaHaməwtal, wəzha ta Zhɛrɛmi nde Libna.
Tupurri: Kiñgi Sedesiyas hay do äog ti boñ, de maga aà nduu ti wañ mono, day aà joñ kiñgi ti wañ Jerusalem hwal ti boñ. Ëu man äe hay ga Hanutal may ma Jermi ma Libna.

Francais: Il fit ce qui est mal aux yeux de Yahweh, imitant tout ce qu'avait fait Joakim.
Anglais: And he did that which was evil in the sight of the  Lord , according to all that Jehoiakim had done.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam li slen ma joo'o kir Ma-Vatɗina, ŋray ca ki Yoyakim li ays nala.
Bulu: A nga bo mam me ne abé e mise me Nti e mezene mese, avale Yehôyakin a nga bo.
Guiziga: Sedesiyas a gi di i gwat malambaˀ a mihiri ngi Buymisemuŋ, heˀ kaɓa Zoˀakiŋ zleˀe.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O waɗi kalluɗum yeeso Jawmiraawo, kal-kal bana Yooyakim waɗno.
Fulfulde_DC: O waɗi kalluɗum yeeso Jawmiraawo, kal-kal bana Yooyakim waɗno.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: A̧ dee mɔ ɗaŋ yí GASA WAN hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ Jɔakin dee so ga.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: A̧ dee mɔ ɗaŋ yí GASA WAN hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ Jɔakin dee so ga.
Kapsiki_DC: Sɛdɛsiyas ne, wəsə nya kehitema geva yamene ŋkɛ kwa kema ta Mahwətə, kala nya menete Zhowakim.
Tupurri: AÀ kal joñ fen ma de älagge go ti ngeel äuy nen Manwuri, do maga pan äe Yehoyakin hay joñ nono.

Francais: Cela arriva à Jérusalem et en Juda, à cause de la colère de Yahweh, jusqu'à ce qu'il les rejette de devant sa face. Et Sédécias se révolta contre le roi de Babylone.
Anglais: For through the anger of the  Lord  it came to pass in Jerusalem and Judah, until he had cast them out from his presence, that Zedekiah rebelled against the king of Babylon.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Van kayni co'o kuɗ ɦiyda vi Ma-Vatɗina kat Yerusalem hiɗi Yuda, kay nam min noysi goyo vok iramu. May Sedekiyas fok kulo'o kat mulla vi Babilon.
Bulu: Mame mete me nga boban amu ayaa Nti e nga jimbi Yérusalém a Yuda, a kui vôme ya wua be fé be kôlô nye mis. E nga bo na, Sédékias a nga bete nlô e be njô bôte ya Babilôn.
Guiziga: Ɓi hana a gi kanah gar na, asi Buymisemuŋ miji mevel ar Zeruzalemey ati Zudahaya, hã a zliɗa taŋ kileŋ a mihiri naŋ. Dar Sedesiyas a sli himaˀ avu buy madiɗa ngi Babiloŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɗum waɗi non ngam Jawmiraawo tikkani Urusaliima e Yahuuda haa o riiwi ɓe daayiiɗum bee maako. Sedekiya boo tuurtani laamiiɗo Baabila .
Fulfulde_DC: Ɗum waɗi non ngam Jawmiraawo tikkani Urusaliima e Yahuuda haa o riiwi ɓe daayiiɗum bee maako. Sedekiya boo tuurtani laamiiɗo Baabila .
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: See GASA WAN nyima nyɛmna zu o be Juda in Jerusalɛm, ɓɛɛ a̧ fo wa yinɛ yí a̧. Duka ŋma ŋgimbi, ɓɛɛ Sedekias de ŋgazu in wannu Babilɔŋ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: See GASA WAN nyima nyɛmna zu o be Juda in Jerusalɛm, ɓɛɛ a̧ fo wa yinɛ yí a̧. Duka ŋma ŋgimbi, ɓɛɛ Sedekias de ŋgazu in wannu Babilɔŋ.
Kapsiki_DC: Mahwətə va wənəa ŋkɛ nde vate ndiremi te ka Zhɛrəzalɛm ba'a te meghea ka Zhəwda, nda se ŋkɛ kaneghamte mbelia ŋkɛ cakeɗa cakeɗa le. Pa Sɛdɛsiyas ɗema ghena ta meghe Nabəkodonozor nde Babilone.
Tupurri: Feçeçre sen joñ wo nen nduugi mo deñ diñ wer soçoçge äil maga Manwur joñ nen joñge äe ti Jerusalem wo de Juda mono, haçaç nen maga se srog ra wo go äiñ äe haçaç pel äe.

Francais: La neuvième année du règne de Sédécias, le dixième mois, le dixième jour du mois, Nabuchodonosor, roi de Babylone, vint avec toute son armée contre Jérusalem, et établit son camp devant elle; on construisit tout autour des murs d'approche.
Anglais: And it came to pass in the ninth year of his reign, in the tenth month, in the tenth day of the month, that Nebuchadnezzar king of Babylon came, he, and all his host, against Jerusalem, and pitched against it; and they built forts against it round about.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Co hay buurta doogota vi til ma doogona vi busata zleeŋeta vi mulda vi Sedekiyas kayni, Nebukadnesar mul ma Babilonna co hiɗi sojena valam kaf, nisi mok Yerusalem; nam vi guɗukŋa valam goy vok Yerusalem, ŋuy zlaɓn ta' noŋ kafe.
Bulu: Mbu ébulu ya njôane wé, e ngon awômô é too melu awôm, Nébukatnétzar, njô bôte ya Babilôn, a nga zu wosane Yérusalém baa nsamba mewosane wé ôse; a nga vule minkan Yérusalém a too nye ôsu. Be nga lôñ alem ya wosane nye mbômaʼan.
Guiziga: Nabukodonozor, buy madiɗa ngi Babiloŋ a ndilawa ti zigiduw naŋhay a Zeruzaleme. A ndahaka hirnga ngi walahaya ndah, waɗ a ndiram hayay midika hirnga taŋ ti dik gun gun walahaya. Naɓa ti di nah na, buy Sedesiyas a ɓul di i vi mungoltir naŋ angi zuma buyo angi hin mukuruˀ ngi kiya mukuruˀ naŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nder nduuɓu laamu Sedekiya njoweenayaɓu, nder lewru sappooru, nyalaade sappo maaru Nabukodonosor wardi bee jama'aare konu muuɗum, ɓe mbaɗi saŋngeere maɓɓe yeeso berniwol. Yimɓe Nabukodonosor mbaagi lesdi, haa taari berniwol ngam hippaago ngol .
Fulfulde_DC: Nder nduuɓu laamu Sedekiya njoweenayaɓu, nder lewru sappooru, nyalaade sappo maaru Nabukodonosor wardi bee jama'aare konu muuɗum, ɓe mbaɗi saŋngeere maɓɓe yeeso berniwol. Yimɓe Nabukodonosor mbaagi lesdi, haa taari berniwol ngam hippaago ngol .
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Sedekias kura zu wannu Babilɔŋ. Tɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-naar pɛ-wan ko Sedekias, tɛ ɓu fio-zɛ, tɛ ɓu ɔɔ-zɛ, Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr wannu Babilɔŋ hɔɔ ti Jerusalɛm in o wi-biro kɔ‘i lɛŋ. A̧ baa fara nú Jerusalɛm, ɓɛɛ wa mbo nù zik nɛnɛ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Sedekias kura zu wannu Babilɔŋ. Tɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-naar pɛ-wan ko Sedekias, tɛ ɓu fio-zɛ, tɛ ɓu ɔɔ-zɛ, Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr wannu Babilɔŋ hɔɔ ti Jerusalɛm in o wi-biro kɔ‘i lɛŋ. A̧ baa fara nú Jerusalɛm, ɓɛɛ wa mbo nù zik nɛnɛ.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa senyɛ le ka sewajɛa ŋkɛ kadzembe Zhɛrəzalɛm kamenete ghedəkwəa ŋkɛ pelɛke dzeyi yitea meleme. Pa ka Babilone ntəsləte meleme dzasle. Mbe kwa mesli ta va ta Sɛdɛsiyas, te kwa meŋe ta hɛ mbe kwa meŋe ta tere.
Tupurri: Nen kiñgi ma de kaawa' maga se ti wañ mono, wur naw ma de hwaln äil few ma de hwaln mono, Nebukanetsar wañ Babilon kal nduugi de sode äen wo äuy le' Jerusalem. AÀ kal kañge go ne hen pel kridi, day aè kal far ngeel lag gu ciñ ma yiñ ti äe go degarra äuy.

Francais: La ville fut assiégée jusqu'à la onzième année de Sédécias.
Anglais: And the city was besieged unto the eleventh year of king Zedekiah.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam ŋuy hoyok-ziyna ta-ta co hay busata doogo yam kepta vi mulla Sedekiyas.
Bulu: Be nga dili tisone bita a kui mbu awômô a wua ya Sédékias a nga jôô.
Guiziga: Taŋ mipam ndah hirnga ngi walahaya gun na, a zik hã angi vi mukuruˀ ngaŋ kaˀ ngi zumabuy ngi sedesiyas.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe jooɗi ton haa wargo nduuɓu laamiiɗo Sedekiya sappo e go'oowu.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe jooɗi ton haa wargo nduuɓu laamiiɗo Sedekiya sappo e go'oowu.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa kɛra ye'i duk nɛnɛ hegɔɔ hɔ tɛ ɓu-zua-kpɔk pɛ-wan ko Sedekias.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa kɛra ye'i duk nɛnɛ hegɔɔ hɔ tɛ ɓu-zua-kpɔk pɛ-wan ko Sedekias.
Kapsiki_DC: Mba tagha pa te kwa meŋe kwetɛŋeghəmbe ta va ta meghea ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: Äi leegen joñ go de cir ti haçaç nen kiñgi ma de hwal ti boñ maga Sedesiyas ti wañ mono.

Francais: Le neuvième jour du mois, comme la famine était plus grande dans la ville, et qu'il n'y avait plus de pain pour le peuple du pays,
Anglais: And on the ninth day of the fourth month the famine prevailed in the city, and there was no bread for the people of the land.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Co hay buurta zleeŋeta vi tilla kayni, mayt li dono'o hay hoyok-ziyna, fu ma sum sa hay nagat tumna mayɗi.
Bulu: Ngon é too melu ébu, zaé fe é too ngul abui e tison été, bôt tee bidi ya di,
Guiziga: Ti hin mungoltir naŋ ngi kiya mumufaɗ naŋ na, ko gwat ngi zum anta avu mizli ngir walahaya mata, asi may ara bul vu ti gidaŋ ar walahaya.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nyannde joweenayaɓre nder lewru nayaɓru, weelo saatuŋgo waɗi nder berniwol. Walaa nyaamdu ngam ummaatoore.
Fulfulde_DC: Nyannde joweenayaɓre nder lewru nayaɓru, weelo saatuŋgo waɗi nder berniwol. Walaa nyaamdu ngam ummaatoore.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Tɛ naar fio-zɛ, tɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-naar ɔɔ-zɛ, kaɓa tika, ɓɛɛ o bíí kpa mɔ mɛ nyɔŋ na.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Tɛ naar fio-zɛ, tɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-naar ɔɔ-zɛ, kaɓa tika, ɓɛɛ o bíí kpa mɔ mɛ nyɔŋ na.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa ma menete geva mbe meleme dzawe. Wəsə shɛ kazeme mbeli nyi mbe meleme we. Ma te kwa mesli ta hɛ mbe kwa wəfaɗe ta tere,
Tupurri: Koñnen hay de baa wuu de haçaç debañ day mopo hay bay ma haçge reege ne jar sir wa lay. Wur naw ma de kaawa' äil few ma de naan mono,

Francais: une brèche fut faite à la ville, et tous les gens de guerre s'enfuirent la nuit par le chemin de la porte entre les deux murs, près du jardin du roi, pendant que les Chaldéens environnaient la ville. Le roi prit le chemin de l'Araba.
Anglais: And the city was broken up, and all the men of war fled by night by the way of the gate between two walls, which is by the king's garden: (now the Chaldeans were against the city round about:) and the king went the way toward the plain.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ki kayn nala sumun co ir gulmunna; mulla pira hay henjeta, sum sa wi duura pir jaŋi hay henjeta, nisi jik hay hagata vi vun-galana, jar gulmun ma ma'na, goboy hiɗi jardeŋŋa vi mulla, kayni hay liy ma hoyok-ziyna ka ŋuyi kay sum sa Kaldeena. Sum sa mun jaŋŋa sla' ti hagata ta kal hay fulda.
Bulu: be nga tub afôla akaʼa ya tison. Ane njô bôt a nga tup a alu, a bôte mewosan bese, be nga lôt e zene ya mbé ô ne e zañe mimfine mibaé, bebé afube njô bôt, éyoñe te Bekaldééñ be bômaʼane tisone nkuk. A nga tyii e zene ya Araba.
Guiziga: Hirak ti nah na, naɓa Babiloŋhoy a pulam mifiliw le avu mohol ngi walahaya zleˀe. Duvuɗ miji na, soje Zudahay a bam tir mizlingre maru ng'ar jarne ngi buyo a kilam. Naɓa soje Babiloŋhoyo a pam le gun hirnga ngi walahay vuna ngbaŋ. Mizli mikilamaya a zuɓam jiviɗ maru nga Araba.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Kaldiya'en cumpiti mahol berniwol. Nde jemma waɗi, jama'aare konu Yahuuda fuu doggi. Koo nde Kaldiya'en ɗon taari Urusaliima, ɓe caali gal dammugal gonŋgal hakkunde mahi ɗiɗi, ɗakki jarne laamiiɗo. Nden laamiiɗo Sedekiya tokki laawol gal waadiwol Urdun .
Fulfulde_DC: Kaldiya'en cumpiti mahol berniwol. Nde jemma waɗi, jama'aare konu Yahuuda fuu doggi. Koo nde Kaldiya'en ɗon taari Urusaliima, ɓe caali gal dammugal gonŋgal hakkunde mahi ɗiɗi, ɗakki jarne laamiiɗo. Nden laamiiɗo Sedekiya tokki laawol gal waadiwol Urdun .
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Garo mbaŋa, ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ oi kɛra ye nɛ̀ o be Kaldee kɛra e nù‘i, o wi-biro lɛŋ yuu mɔ nɛ̀ nú garo nɛ̀ duk mgbara ŋgeŋ yiitoo mgbák ká̧ be fɔ ko wannu; wa baa nɛ́ yuwar si nú Jurdɛn.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Garo mbaŋa, ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ oi kɛra ye nɛ̀ o be Kaldee kɛra e nù‘i, o wi-biro lɛŋ yuu mɔ nɛ̀ nú garo nɛ̀ duk mgbara ŋgeŋ yiitoo mgbák ká̧ be fɔ ko wannu; wa baa nɛ́ yuwar si nú Jurdɛn.
Kapsiki_DC: pa ka Babilone ŋate ŋkwa te zli ɓɛhwɛ. Ma kwa se viɗi ne, pa ka sewajɛa ka Zhəwda hwɛnji. Ya tsema nza ka sewajɛa ka Babilone dzasle yitea Zhɛrəzalɛm ne, pa hɛ shavenji kwa mɛa degha nya kwelɛ sli bake. Takwa yitea ntsa ta meghe. Pa meghe Sɛdɛsiyas kelete hweŋkwa nya kedzawa laka zlərəa Araba.
Tupurri: jar Babilon kal wo ndul tu wo see kor ma de booge ti äi leege no. De maga wur wo go le'ge gesiñ mono jar durgi ma Judan kal wo dañge. De maga jar Babilon hay wo mbaara go de cir ti Jerusalem mono, aà kal wo laage wo jag tiñ ma ti holañ kor ma äog wo no, ti jeñ pay sugnee mani wañ no. Wañ Sedesiyas kal mañ faage raw ti por ma Jurdeçeç no.

Francais: Mais l'armée des Chaldéens poursuivit le roi et l'atteignit dans les plaines de Jéricho, et toute son armée se dispersa loin de lui.
Anglais: And the army of the Chaldeans pursued after the king, and overtook him in the plains of Jericho: and all his army were scattered from him.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: May sojena vi sa Kaldeena jaŋ kuɗ mulla, nisi fum hay fulda vi Yeriko, sojena valam sa kuɗumna mun goy talam jaŋi.
Bulu: Ve nkane bita Bekaldééñ ô nga tôñe njô bôt a koone nye e mbiʼili Yérikô, a nsamba mewosane wé ô nga mialan a ke nye ôyap.
Guiziga: Amma soje Babiloŋhoy a sipaka buyo ara jakaŋ is ar sozo a Zeriko. Akẽh na, soje naŋhay gar a zliɗam hirnga mber mber, a pulakaŋ ɗoɗok pal naŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ammaa jama'aaje konu Kaldiya'en taasni mo, njokki mo haa yayre kommbi Yeriko. Jama'aare konu maako fuu saŋkiti, acci mo.
Fulfulde_DC: Ammaa jama'aaje konu Kaldiya'en taasni mo, njokki mo haa yayre kommbi Yeriko. Jama'aare konu maako fuu saŋkiti, acci mo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O wi-biro Kaldee ndaka ɗoŋ wannu, ɓɛɛ wa kpa a̧ tɛ bɔkɔ-nú Jeriko. O wi-biro kɔ̧-a̧ yuu so mɔ e a̧ duk.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O wi-biro Kaldee ndaka ɗoŋ wannu, ɓɛɛ wa kpa a̧ tɛ bɔkɔ-nú Jeriko. O wi-biro kɔ̧-a̧ yuu so mɔ e a̧ duk.
Kapsiki_DC: Cape ka sewajɛa ka Babilone kakeka hɛ kakeseve te ŋwela ta Zhɛriko. Pɛtɛa ka sewajɛa ŋkɛ kewəfəyite.
Tupurri: Ama, sode jar Babilon kal wo mañ blam äe, wo wo da'ge äe äi ful ma Jeriko no, day sode äen äuy kal wo dañge wo go see äe haçaç.

Francais: Ayant saisi le roi, ils le firent monter vers le roi de Babylone à Rébla, et on prononça sur lui une sentence.
Anglais: So they took the king, and brought him up to the king of Babylon to Riblah; and they gave judgment upon him.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi vi mulla, tuɗum kulo kat mulla vi Babilon hay Ribla; nisi ka kitat kalamu.
Bulu: Ane be nga bi njô bôt a kee nye e be njô bôte ya Babilôn e Ribla a be nga tyiʼi nye ajô a ve nye melep .
Guiziga: Soje Babiloŋhoy a jaka buyo a ram di ng'avu buy madiɗa ngi Babiloŋ a Ribla, a slakaŋ kiita a diga.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Kaldiya'en naŋngi mo, ɓe njahri mo yeeso laamiiɗo Baabila haa Ribla. Ton ɓe kiiti mo.
Fulfulde_DC: Kaldiya'en naŋngi mo, ɓe njahri mo yeeso laamiiɗo Baabila haa Ribla. Ton ɓe kiiti mo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O be Kaldee baa wannu nɛnɛ ha̧ wannu Babilɔŋ sɛn Ribla mɛ, ha̧ wa mɛ gɔn kita zu a̧.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O be Kaldee baa wannu nɛnɛ ha̧ wannu Babilɔŋ sɛn Ribla mɛ, ha̧ wa mɛ gɔn kita zu a̧.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa ka Babilone keseve ŋkɛ kamava ba'a keleghe nda ŋkɛ ke meghea ka Babilone nya mbe Ribla. Pa ŋkɛ mehate ghwə ta Sɛdɛsiyas.
Tupurri: AÀ kal wo baa wañ, kal wo rawge de äe äiñ wañ Babilon Ribla, aè kal caa kiida äe.

Francais: On égorgea les fils de Sédécias sous ses yeux. Puis Nabuchodonosor creva les yeux à Sédécias et le lia avec deux chaînes d'airain; et on le mena à Babylone.
Anglais: And they slew the sons of Zedekiah before his eyes, and put out the eyes of Zedekiah, and bound him with fetters of brass, and carried him to Babylon.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi ŋat gurona vi Sedekiyas goyo hay li ma nam ka wisi hiɗi iramu; bugol kayni nisi co ir Sedekiyas goyo, nisi junum hiɗi jaɓna ma kawayna, nisi kalam kulo'o hay Babilon may.
Bulu: Be tyiʼi bobefame be Sédékias tyiñ émien a too; wôna njô bôte ya Babilôn a nga bo na be tube Sédékias mis, a nga bo fe na be kaʼa nye a minkole mi mvot a kee nye e Babilôn.
Guiziga: A slaka ˀay ngi ziri ngi Sedesiyasaya daˀ a mihiri naŋ vuna si. Akẽh ma na, buy Nabukodonozor a ɓi ɓa a nduzoko hiriheye, ɓa a juwakaŋ ti celelu zlaɓ hiri cuw, waɗ ɓa a slinam di nga Babiloŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe kirsidi ɓiɓɓe Sedekiya yeeso maako. Nden ɓe ɗoofi mo gite, ɓe kaɓɓi mo bee callalluuji njamndi mboɗeeri, ɓe njahri mo haa Baabila .
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe kirsidi ɓiɓɓe Sedekiya yeeso maako. Nden ɓe ɗoofi mo gite, ɓe kaɓɓi mo bee callalluuji njamndi mboɗeeri, ɓe njahri mo haa Baabila .
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa gɔna ger o bem ko Sedekias nɛ̀ gbaayí-a, ɓɛɛ Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr o yí Sedekias, hɛr a̧ nɛ̀ nyak-ndɛrɛ gbam ŋmaa yiitoo, ɓɛɛ mgbɔ a̧ si Babilɔŋ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa gɔna ger o bem ko Sedekias nɛ̀ gbaayí-a, ɓɛɛ Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr o yí Sedekias, hɛr a̧ nɛ̀ nyak-ndɛrɛ gbam ŋmaa yiitoo, ɓɛɛ mgbɔ a̧ si Babilɔŋ.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa mbeli peslekɛ wəzege ta Sɛdɛsiyas kwa ntsə ta yitenyɛ. Kwa sebe ta ŋkɛ, pa Nabəkodonozor ntsentsamte ntsə kwa ghə va Sɛdɛsiyas, ghweneghe ŋkɛ kadzembe Babilone kehwepe hwepe tsape tsape le zewe lɛ.
Tupurri: AÈ ngaë jar ni Sedisiyas wo go pel äe de nen äe. Blam äe wañ äe wañ Babilon kal äeer Sedesiyas go nene, aà kal ma' geyam ne hen de boo dobe, aè kal rawge de äe Babilone.

Francais: Le cinquième mois, le septième jour du mois, -- c'était la dix-neuvième année du règne de Nabuchodonosor, roi de Babylone, -- Nabuzardan, capitaine des gardes, serviteur du roi de Babylone, vint à Jérusalem.
Anglais: And in the fifth month, on the seventh day of the month, which is the nineteenth year of king Nebuchadnezzar king of Babylon, came Nebuzar–adan, captain of the guard, a servant of the king of Babylon, unto Jerusalem:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay buurta siɗiyata vi til ma vaslna, kayni ti busata ta doogo yam zleeŋeta vi mulda vi Nebukadnesar, mulla vi Babilon, Nebuzaradan, ma ŋolla vi soje sa ŋom mulla, ma sunda vi mulla, nam kal kulo'o hay Yerusalem.
Bulu: E ngone muam é too melu zamgbwa, mbu awôm a ébulu Nébukadnétzar njô bôte ya Babilôn a nga jôô, ñwô Nébuzaradañ, évete bebaʼale, mbo ésaé njô bôte ya Babilôn, a nga zu e Yérusalém.
Guiziga: Angi hin mitarnaˀ naŋ, ngi kiya muzlum naŋ, ngi vi mungoltir naŋ, ngi zumabuy ngi Nabukodonozor na, Nebuzaradaŋ, madiɗa ngi soje mijigina lihey, gawla ngi buy madiɗa ngi Babiloŋ, a co sar a Zeruzaleme.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nder nduuɓu laamu Nabukodonosor laamiiɗo Baabila sappo e njoweenayaɓu, nder nyalaade joweeɗiɗawre nder lewru jowaɓru, Nebuzaradan, hooreejo aynooɓe laamiiɗo Baabila nasti Urusaliima.
Fulfulde_DC: Nder nduuɓu laamu Nabukodonosor laamiiɗo Baabila sappo e njoweenayaɓu, nder nyalaade joweeɗiɗawre nder lewru jowaɓru, Nebuzaradan, hooreejo aynooɓe laamiiɗo Baabila nasti Urusaliima.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Zɛ yaka mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo tɛ mɔɔrɔ fio-zɛ, ɓɛɛ Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr, gasawi zu o wi-pɛm-wannu Babilɔŋ ye Jerusalɛm. Ŋgimbi'i ká Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr wannu Babilɔŋ dee pɛ ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-naar tɛ wan kaɗi.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Zɛ yaka mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo tɛ mɔɔrɔ fio-zɛ, ɓɛɛ Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr, gasawi zu o wi-pɛm-wannu Babilɔŋ ye Jerusalɛm. Ŋgimbi'i ká Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr wannu Babilɔŋ dee pɛ ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-naar tɛ wan kaɗi.
Kapsiki_DC: Mbe kwa meŋe meslighəmbe ta va ta Nabəkodonozor, meghea ka Babilone, te kwa mberefaŋe ta hɛ mbe tere kwa mcɛfe ne, pa nebəwzaradan se kadzembe Zhɛrəzalɛm. Gheŋkɛ ya kawəndə nya te ka ya ŋkwa, kawəndə kwelea ka sewajɛa meghea ka Babilone.
Tupurri: Nen naw ma de renamn äil few ma de dween mono, sen hay diñ kiñgi ma de hwal ti kaawa' maga Nebukanetsar ti wañ Babilon mono. Nebusaradan wañ ma waçaç waçaçre gardin wo no, weejoçoç wañ Babilonn kal nduugi Jerusalem.

Francais: Il brûla la maison de Yahweh, la maison du roi et toutes les maisons de Jérusalem; il livra au feu toutes les grandes maisons.
Anglais: And he burnt the house of the  Lord , and the king's house, and all the houses of Jerusalem, and every great man's house burnt he with fire.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam ŋal ziyda vi Ma-Vatɗin goyo, ŋal ziyda vi mulla goyo, nam ŋal ziy ma hay Yerusalemna goy kaf kaw, ziy ma ir ŋaana nam ŋalam goy kafe.
Bulu: A nga diʼi nda Nti, e nyô njô bôt a ma mese ya Yérusalém; a nga diʼi avale nda ése, a avale éwôlô ese nda éte é mbe nguleya bo.
Guiziga: Nebuzaradaŋ, a wura hay ngi Bumbulvuŋ, hay ngi buyo waɗ hay ngir walahay Zeruzalemeye cek. A zla a ɗuva vu da hay ngi mizli madiɗa madiɗahaya a wuram.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O wuli haykaliiru Jawmiraawo e saare laamu e cuuɗi Urusaliima e cuuɗi mawɓe fuu .
Fulfulde_DC: O wuli haykaliiru Jawmiraawo e saare laamu e cuuɗi Urusaliima e cuuɗi mawɓe fuu .
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: A̧ dɔɔ Tua ko GASA WAN, tua ko wannu in o tua sɛn Jerusalɛm lɛŋ; a̧ pi̧i̧ wee tɛ tua ko o gasawi lɛŋ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: A̧ dɔɔ Tua ko GASA WAN, tua ko wannu in o tua sɛn Jerusalɛm lɛŋ; a̧ pi̧i̧ wee tɛ tua ko o gasawi lɛŋ.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa teremte ghɛa Shala, ghɛa meghe ba'a cɛ nya wəba nya kaŋa meleme pɛtɛ, ghɛa mbelia jama pɛtɛ.
Tupurri: AÀ kal roë tiñ mani Manwurn go, roë tiñ mani wañn go, de tiñ ma Jerusalem wo äuy. Tiñ maga mo hayba eç laybla se roë ra go äuy.

Francais: Toute l'armée des Chaldéens qui était avec le capitaine des gardes démolit les murailles formant l'enceinte de Jérusalem.
Anglais: And all the army of the Chaldeans, that were with the captain of the guard, brake down the walls of Jerusalem round about.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sojena vi Kaldeen kaf sa ay tapay kuɗ ma ŋolla vi soje sa ŋom mulla, nisi ɦo gulmun ma ŋuyi tam Yerusalemna gaa kafe.
Bulu: Minkane bita Bekaldééñ mise mia wulu évete bebaʼale, mi nga tyam mimfin mia bômane Yérusalém.
Guiziga: Soje Babiloŋhoy mikisoko madiɗa ngi soje mijigina liheye, a wahaka mohol mugun hirnga ngi Zeruzaleme.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Jama'aare konu Kaldiya'en fuu e hooreejo aynooɓe ngibbini mahi taariiɗi Urusaliima.
Fulfulde_DC: Jama'aare konu Kaldiya'en fuu e hooreejo aynooɓe ngibbini mahi taariiɗi Urusaliima.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O wi-biro Kaldee lɛŋ nɛ̀ nɛ̀ɛ̀ so in gasawi kɔ‘i gbina garo nɛ̀ zika Jerusalɛm a nù.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O wi-biro Kaldee lɛŋ nɛ̀ nɛ̀ɛ̀ so in gasawi kɔ‘i gbina garo nɛ̀ zika Jerusalɛm a nù.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma ka sewajɛa ka Babilone nyi kebeghe wəndə nya te ghəa ka ya ŋkwa ne, pa hɛ ŋzlamte sli nya dzeyi yitea Zhɛrəzalɛm.
Tupurri: Sode jar Kalde maga hay wo wer gardin ni mo äuy kal wo mbug kor maga hay de äo'ge ti Jerusalem go.

Francais: Nabuzardan, capitaine des gardes, emmena captifs le reste du peuple qui était demeuré dans la ville, les transfuges qui s'étaient rendus au roi de Babylone et le reste de la multitude.
Anglais: Now the rest of the people that were left in the city, and the fugitives that fell away to the king of Babylon, with the remnant of the multitude, did Nebuzar–adan the captain of the guard carry away.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nebuzaradan ma ŋolla vi sa ŋom mulla, yaw sum sa ay hini hay hoyok-ziyn kafe nam kalsi gorvo'o, hiɗi sa vul tuwsi mi mulla vi Babilon kaw, hiɗi dir sumun ma hinin kaw.
Bulu: Nébuzaradañ, évete bebaʼale, é nga kee mebukaʼa me bôt me nga too tison minkôm, nalé fe ba be nga kañese ke éjôé njô bôte ya Babilône si, a e jama bôte mbok.
Guiziga: A dirba nah, mizli mindiram mineˀ ɗagay muroko ar walahaya, yo mizli mujumoko ng'avu buy madiɗa ngi Babiloŋ tuwa na, Nebuzaradaŋ, a ja taŋ nga Babiloŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓaawo maajum Nebuzaradan dahi luttuɓe nder berniwol e hawtanɓe laamiiɗo Baabila e ummaatoore luttunde fuu.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓaawo maajum Nebuzaradan dahi luttuɓe nder berniwol e hawtanɓe laamiiɗo Baabila e ummaatoore luttunde fuu.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr gasawi zu o wi-pɛm-wannu kaia oi bíí nɛ̀ ɓɔna yaknɛ si Babilɔŋ, in o wan nɛ̀ yuu so mɔ si ɗoŋ wannu Babilɔŋ, in oi o dɔka bíí mbɛt.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr gasawi zu o wi-pɛm-wannu kaia oi bíí nɛ̀ ɓɔna yaknɛ si Babilɔŋ, in o wan nɛ̀ yuu so mɔ si ɗoŋ wannu Babilɔŋ, in oi o dɔka bíí mbɛt.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kwa sebe ta ŋkɛ ne pa Nabəwzaradan fəte mbeli nyi mba mbe meleme kadzembe Babilone, kwele ma nyi kedzembe Babilone ke nyi ketene mbeli tagha.
Tupurri: Nebusaradan wañ gardin kal hoo jar maga hay wo de gwa'ge äi leege ni mono, jar maga hay wo go wer wañ Babilon mono, de ngaäa maga hay gwa' mono.

Francais: Le capitaine des gardes laissa comme vignerons et comme laboureurs quelques-uns des pauvres du pays.
Anglais: But the captain of the guard left of the poor of the land to be vinedressers and husbandmen.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hiɗi kayni kaf, sara sa haw co'-co' hay nagatna, Nebuzaradan hinsi kulo hay hoyok-ziyna kay nisi ma pi gulda-guldana, kay zum kaw.
Bulu: Ve évete bebaʼale é nga ve nkañesan e be bone be bôte na, be liʼi e Yuda ane bebé mefube mindik a ane besenane si.
Guiziga: Madiɗa ngi soje mijigina liheye, a pul di i mizli misi murgahay neˀ asi ruwuyo ɓa ngi huva gudubun magam di mbaazla ati guva mekelemey.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ammaa o acci laafuɓe woɗɓe nder lesdi haa ɓe laato remooɓe inabooje e gese.
Fulfulde_DC: Ammaa o acci laafuɓe woɗɓe nder lesdi haa ɓe laato remooɓe inabooje e gese.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Gasawi zu o wi-pɛm-wannu ee o ŋma gee bíí mɛ wa o fɔ-nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ in o géé fɔ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Gasawi zu o wi-pɛm-wannu ee o ŋma gee bíí mɛ wa o fɔ-nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ in o géé fɔ.
Kapsiki_DC: Ama pa sərəakɛ kwete bela ta ka titikwəa kɛfi kezha wəza rɛzɛŋe ba'a kweci wəve.
Tupurri: Ti ngeel sen ni, wañ gardin hay joñ nen men jar mapo wo me' maga aà mo gwa' wo jeë pay wo de pay tlalum wo.

Francais: Les Chaldéens brisèrent les colonnes d'airain qui étaient dans la maison de Yahweh, ainsi que les bases et la mer d'airain qui étaient dans la maison de Yahweh, et ils en emportèrent l'airain à Babylone.
Anglais: And the pillars of brass that were in the house of the  Lord , and the bases, and the brasen sea that was in the house of the  Lord , did the Chaldeans break in pieces, and carried the brass of them to Babylon.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Dolla ma kawayna ma ka hay ziyda vi Ma-Vatɗina sum sa Kaldeen kusum gaa'a, cawam ma ini gaana, ŋarak ma kawayna ma ka hay ziyda vi Ma-Vatɗina kaw nisi tom goyo, kawayna nisi kalam hay Babilon.
Bulu: Bekaldééñ be nga buʼu beta mekône me mvot me mbe e nda Nti, metin, mañ me mvot me mbe e nda Nti, a be nga kee mvot e Babilôn.
Guiziga: Ɓamtal ngi ɓiri gaza misi ar hay ngi Bumbulvuŋ, saret ati kisa madiɗa ngi ɓiri gaza, sojehey a wahaka taŋ, a jijiraka ɓiri gaza tayna gar nga Babiloŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Kaldiya'en pusi daŋraŋge njamndi mboɗeeri haa haykaliiru Jawmiraawo e jo'inirɗe e loonde njamndi mboɗeeri wonnde haa daldal haykaliiru. Ɓe njahri kuuje ɗe njamndi mboɗeeri ɗe'e haa Baabila .
Fulfulde_DC: Kaldiya'en pusi daŋraŋge njamndi mboɗeeri haa haykaliiru Jawmiraawo e jo'inirɗe e loonde njamndi mboɗeeri wonnde haa daldal haykaliiru. Ɓe njahri kuuje ɗe njamndi mboɗeeri ɗe'e haa Baabila .
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O be Kaldee gbina mbiŋ nɛ‘i dee nɛ̀ ndɛrɛ sɛn kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN, wa gbina o mɔɔ-tui-kpánà in gba-kpáná-ndɛrɛ nɛ yaa so kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN a nu, ɓɛɛ wa kai ndɛrɛ-a yaknɛ si Babilɔŋ mɛ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O be Kaldee gbina mbiŋ nɛ‘i dee nɛ̀ ndɛrɛ sɛn kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN, wa gbina o mɔɔ-tui-kpánà in gba-kpáná-ndɛrɛ nɛ yaa so kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN a nu, ɓɛɛ wa kai ndɛrɛ-a yaknɛ si Babilɔŋ mɛ.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa ka Babilone mpəmte yɛ selə mze kwa ghwə ghwə nya mɛa ghɛa Shala, tsagha wəmata gədəwə nya ɓɛhwɛ ba'a kwenə nya wəba  pelɛke yitea cɛ nyi le mze kwa ghwə ghwə. Pa hɛ keleghe mze kwa ghwə ghwəa shɛ kadzembe Babilone.
Tupurri: Jar Kalde kal wo mbug dog boo dob maga hay wo äi tiñ mani Manwurn go, kray wo no, de gesaçaçge boo dob ma kluu no, aà kal wo hoo boo dobn raw wo de äaara Babilone.

Francais: Ils prirent les pots, les pelles, les couteaux, les coupes et tous les ustensiles d'airain avec lesquels on faisait le service.
Anglais: And the pots, and the shovels, and the snuffers, and the spoons, and all the vessels of brass wherewith they ministered, took they away.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi yaw ganuna, pella, kewna, tasana hiɗi jakŋa ma kawayna ma li lop hiɗi namna kaf.
Bulu: Be nga nyoñ beminkeñe, bisobelé, atyeñ, bilaé a biôme bi mvot bise be nga bo bie ésaé.
Guiziga: A hilaka gazlanga ngi ɓiri gazahay mihĩˀĩ magam ti taŋ slra ngi mezegweleye gar: i misirgaɗay, pel ngi hila fucuhoy, sliwiɗey, kopoy.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe kooci boo kuuje ɗe njamndi mboɗeeri kuuwtinirteeɗe ngam dewal, payanɗe ngam ndoondi, ɓoftirɗe, laɓe e taasahoy .
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe kooci boo kuuje ɗe njamndi mboɗeeri kuuwtinirteeɗe ngam dewal, payanɗe ngam ndoondi, ɓoftirɗe, laɓe e taasahoy .
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa kaia o nyɛk-a-bùk, o mɔɔ-ɗu-mɔ, o paa, o mɔɔ-nɔ-mɔ in o nyɛk-ndɛrɛ nɛtɛ nɛtɛ nɛ̀ ya wen dee tom kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧ yaknɛ mbɛt.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa kaia o nyɛk-a-bùk, o mɔɔ-ɗu-mɔ, o paa, o mɔɔ-nɔ-mɔ in o nyɛk-ndɛrɛ nɛtɛ nɛtɛ nɛ̀ ya wen dee tom kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧ yaknɛ mbɛt.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa hɛ fəte wəshi mze kwa ghwə ghwə nyi mene slene ta gəsəkə mbeli mbe ghɛa Shala le hɛ: wəshi kefə pəsəɗə, yɛ pelɛ, wəshi kepesle ghwə kwa paterela, yɛ kwenə kepisə ŋkwa ba'a yɛ zlerekwe.
Tupurri: AÀ hoo tumäoole wo no, de pel wo no, de mbeg wo no, weere haçaçren wo de feçeçre maga wo de joñge de boo dob mo äuy, maga aè hay ti joñre de äaara mono.

Francais: Le capitaine des gardes, prit encore les encensoirs et les tasses, ce qui était d'or et ce qui était d'argent.
Anglais: And the firepans, and the bowls, and such things as were of gold, in gold, and of silver, in silver, the captain of the guard took away.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ma ŋolla vi sojena hot yaw ganuna hiɗi kaway-ma-cina, slen ma koti hiɗi ora, ma hiɗi dooron kaw,
Bulu: Evete bebaʼale é nga nyoñe fe bikanda bi nduan a bilaé, jôm ése é mbe or a jôm ése é mbe argent.
Guiziga: Madiɗa ngi soje mijigina lihey a hila gojogoɗ ngi wura urdihey ati taasa ngi tiɓi pumbus ngi pusloyo na zle gwat muvuɗa taŋ ti ɓiri tapasl tapasl ati misi ti ɓiri gazahay gar si.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Hooreejo aynooɓe hooci kuuje kaŋŋeeri e cardi corok bana pehe uurorɗe e taasaaje fuu.
Fulfulde_DC: Hooreejo aynooɓe hooci kuuje kaŋŋeeri e cardi corok bana pehe uurorɗe e taasaaje fuu.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Gasawi zu o wi-pɛm-wannu kaia o *dek-e-wee, o daaro wen misa̧ gaŋmɔ, o be yèè nɛ‘i dee nɛ̀ lɔr in bu-mbɔi mbɛt lɛŋ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Gasawi zu o wi-pɛm-wannu kaia o *dek-e-wee, o daaro wen misa̧ gaŋmɔ, o be yèè nɛ‘i dee nɛ̀ lɔr in bu-mbɔi mbɛt lɛŋ.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa meghea ka ya ŋkwa fəhwe kweci wəshi kwa mze kwa tere tere, kwa geleɓə, yɛ helape ketere 'wərdə, yɛ kweci wəshi kesa wəsə.
Tupurri: Wañ gardin kal hoo mo ma roë feçeçre foçoçre non wo, de kalisn wo, fen maga hay de joñge de boo biñni äuy mono, de maga hay de joñge de boo solay mo äuy no.

Francais: Quant aux deux colonnes, à la mer et aux bases que Salomon avait faites dans la maison de Yahweh, il n'y avait pas à peser l'airain de tous ces ustensiles.
Anglais: The two pillars, one sea, and the bases which Solomon had made for the house of the  Lord ; the brass of all these vessels was without weight.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: dolla ma ma'na, ŋarak ma muzna, hiɗi diram ma yori gaana, ma Salomon kotomis hay ziyda vi Ma-Vatɗina, jak namna ma kawayn kaf kayni nekka valam sa may wa'ɗi.
Bulu: Beta mekône mebaé, mañ a metin, mbie Solômon a nga bo asu nda Nti teke môt a nga yem adite ya biôme bi mvot bite bise.
Guiziga: Ɓamtalay mucuw, kisa madiɗa ati saret Salomoŋ muvuɗa taŋ vur hay ngi Bumbulvuŋ na, dudok ngi ɓiri gaza naŋ muvuɗa taŋ ti naŋ na, ɓa a ji kilo kini na, mbur mawa gu anta.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Daŋraŋge ɗiɗi e loonde go e jo'inirɗe ɗe Suleymaanu waɗno ngam haykaliiru Jawmiraawo, njamndi mboɗeeri kuuje ɗe'e fuu, goɗɗo waawataa awnugo ɗum.
Fulfulde_DC: Daŋraŋge ɗiɗi e loonde go e jo'inirɗe ɗe Suleymaanu waɗno ngam haykaliiru Jawmiraawo, njamndi mboɗeeri kuuje ɗe'e fuu, goɗɗo waawataa awnugo ɗum.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: War ko o mbiŋ yiitoo, gba-kpáná-ndɛrɛ in o mɔɔ-tui-kpánà nɛ̀ Salomɔŋ dee so wen Tua ko GASA WAN, in o nyɛk-ndɛrɛ lɛŋ, wi nyɛm mɛ iŋ dita-a na.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: War ko o mbiŋ yiitoo, gba-kpáná-ndɛrɛ in o mɔɔ-tui-kpánà nɛ̀ Salomɔŋ dee so wen Tua ko GASA WAN, in o nyɛk-ndɛrɛ lɛŋ, wi nyɛm mɛ iŋ dita-a na.
Kapsiki_DC: Kapesle mbeli kadzeghete wəshi mze kwa ghwə ghwə nyi menete Salomon kezha ghɛa Shala we: yɛ selə nyi bake nyi, kwenə nya wəba ba'a wəmata gədəwə nya ɓɛhwɛ.
Tupurri: Dog ma äog wo no, Gesaçaçge boo dob ma kluu no, kray wo no, maga Salomoñ hay joñ ra äi tiñ mani Manwurn mono, feçeçre se ma de joñge de boo dobn wo mo deñ äuy, aè hay bay de ko poçoçre äaara wa.

Francais: La hauteur d'une colonne était de dix-huit coudées; et il y avait au-dessus un chapiteau d'airain, et la hauteur du chapiteau était de trois coudées; et il y avait tout autour du chapiteau un treillis et des grenades, le tout d'airain; il en était de même de la seconde colonne avec le treillis.
Anglais: The height of the one pillar was eighteen cubits, and the chapiter upon it was brass: and the height of the chapiter three cubits; and the wreathen work, and pomegranates upon the chapiter round about, all of brass: and like unto these had the second pillar with wreathen work.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Dol kep kayni, fiyokka valam ta kulot as ir goldoŋ doogo yam glafandi, yalam ma dilaray kulona mi kawaya, fiyokka valam ir goldoŋ ɦidi, kulo kat yalam ma dilarayn kayni, zigew ma ciliyna hiɗi sle ma moki kolo-kolona, kaf koti hiɗi kawayna; dolla ma ma'na ma hiɗi zigewn ciliy kulo kalamna ay ki kayn nala kaw.
Bulu: Beta akône wua a mbe ôyabe yôp menyiʼi me mo awôm a muam, andoʼo mvot e bete de yôp e too menyiʼi me mo mela nté ya yôp, e bili avot a bibuma bi grenad bi to andoʼo te été mbômaʼane, bise mboon a mvot; beta akône baa a mbe fe avale te, avot e too été.
Guiziga: Ɓamtalaya, purla gar na, gil naŋ nga muŋ metir ngoltir. Ɓamtal gar na, mecepek ngi ɓiri gaza tiɗeˀ a hirnga naŋ, tiɗeˀ a hirnga naŋ. Gil taŋhay nga muŋ, metir pal ti reta, pal ti reta. Yo a gaka taŋ wuya ti zuva ngi ɓiri gaza, waɗ mawuyerey gun gun, gun gun cuw taŋ. Ɓamtal mucuwoy vuna taŋ rak rak, a bam vu a bam vu si, yo zuva taŋhaya kwana, kanah ya.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Towirka daŋraŋgal gootal waɗi meetir joweenayi. Hoore njamndi mboɗeeri ɗonno dow maagal. Towirka hoore man waɗi meetir gootel bee reeta. Bamaaɗum e rummaanooje taari hoore man, ɗum fuu ɗum njamndi mboɗeeri. Bana non boo daŋraŋgal feere bee bamaaɗum maagal.
Fulfulde_DC: Towirka daŋraŋgal gootal waɗi meetir joweenayi. Hoore njamndi mboɗeeri ɗonno dow maagal. Towirka hoore man waɗi meetir gootel bee reeta. Bamaaɗum e rummaanooje taari hoore man, ɗum fuu ɗum njamndi mboɗeeri. Bana non boo daŋraŋgal feere bee bamaaɗum maagal.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Kusa kuti mbiŋ nɛ́ mɛtrɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar, nɛ̀ gan-ndui-ndɛrɛ a̧a̧ so zu a̧. Kusa gan-ndui'i nɛ́ mɛtrɛ kpɔk nɛ reeta. Fanamɔ, in o be waya kóɓò nɛ‘i dee nɛ̀ ndɛrɛ a̧a̧ so zu gan-ndui'i mbɛt. O mbiŋ yiitoo lɛŋ hee ŋmaa ga.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Kusa kuti mbiŋ nɛ́ mɛtrɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar, nɛ̀ gan-ndui-ndɛrɛ a̧a̧ so zu a̧. Kusa gan-ndui'i nɛ́ mɛtrɛ kpɔk nɛ reeta. Fanamɔ, in o be waya kóɓò nɛ‘i dee nɛ̀ ndɛrɛ a̧a̧ so zu gan-ndui'i mbɛt. O mbiŋ yiitoo lɛŋ hee ŋmaa ga.
Kapsiki_DC: Geze ta ŋkɛ ne, selə kwetɛŋe ne, mɛtre mesli biya ta ŋkɛ kadzeme ghweme. Pəkələ mze kwa gheme ya kənəa yayata selə, mɛtre ba'a kwete gasle yite biya ta ŋkɛ kadzeme ghweme, nahe ŋkɛ kenza kepesa pesa dzeyi yite le kweci wəshi kala gheleghe mze kwa gheme, kala yɛ ya ta kwakweme kweci wəshi dzeyi yitea ghəa pəkələa shɛ. Kanya kwetɛŋe hɛ seləa shɛhɛ pɛtɛ nci, kanya kwetɛŋe wəshi nyi kala gheleghe nyi te.
Tupurri: Dog boñ mokay geçeçre äe hay meder kaawa'a, wo ciñ ti äe mono dla'ge ti äe yañ de joñge de boo dob ni geçeçre äe hay meder boñ de nusi. Go ti dla'ge ti äen degarra mono, boo ma de taçaçge yeraçaçraçaç hay go de äo'ge ni, grenade hay ni lay, sen äuy hay wo de joñge de boo dobe. Dog ma de äogn hay de joñge de boo ma de taçaçge yeraçaçraçaç do ma lan wo no lay.

Francais: Le capitaine des gardes prit Saraïas, le grand-prêtre, Sophonie, prêtre de second ordre, et les trois gardiens de la porte.
Anglais: And the captain of the guard took Seraiah the chief priest, and Zephaniah the second priest, and the three keepers of the door:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ma ŋolla vi sojena vi Seraya, mul ŋol ma-ɗifinna, Sofoniya mul-ma-ɗifinna ma ma'na, hiɗi sum sa hiɗi sa ŋom vun-galana.
Bulu: Evete bebaʼale é nga nga nyoñe ntuni nnen Seraya, Sôfôni, baʼa ntuni , a bebaʼale mbé belaa.
Guiziga: Seraya, masay madiɗa ati Sefaniya, masay mislakka ngi seˀe, waɗ mijigina mizlingrey makire, madiɗa ngi soje mijigina liheye, a ja taŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nden hooreejo aynooɓe hoo'i Seraya, limanjo mawɗo e Sefaniya limanjo ɗiɗaɓo e aynooɓe dammuɗe tato.
Fulfulde_DC: Nden hooreejo aynooɓe hoo'i Seraya, limanjo mawɗo e Sefaniya limanjo ɗiɗaɓo e aynooɓe dammuɗe tato.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Gasawi zu o wi-pɛm-wannu baa wan-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Sɛraya, in Sɛfania, yiitoo wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧, in o wi-pɛm Tua ko GASA WAN taar.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Gasawi zu o wi-pɛm-wannu baa wan-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Sɛraya, in Sɛfania, yiitoo wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧, in o wi-pɛm Tua ko GASA WAN taar.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa meghea ka ya ŋkwa kesehwe wəndə kwelea ka dzeghe Shala Seraya, le sləwəfəa ŋkɛ Sefaniya, ba'a ka dzeghe Shala mahekene nyi keya ŋkwa kedzembe ghɛa Shala.
Tupurri: Wañ gardin wo kal baa je moobe ma kluu ma joñ sië jag no, Seraya, Sofoni, je sië jag maga diñ ma de äog mono, de jar gor jag tiñ ma swa' wo no.

Francais: Dans la ville, il prit un officier qui commandait aux gens de guerre, cinq hommes faisant partie du conseil privé du roi et qui furent trouvés dans la ville, le secrétaire du chef de l'armée chargé d'enrôler le peuple du pays, et soixante hommes du peuple du pays qui se trouvaient dans la ville.
Anglais: And out of the city he took an officer that was set over the men of war, and five men of them that were in the king's presence, which were found in the city, and the principal scribe of the host, which mustered the people of the land, and threescore men of the people of the land that were found in the city:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay hoyok-ziyn kayn nam vi sa ma patayn kepe, ma sum sa duura ka gaa kuɗ gaŋeraŋa valamu, sum sara vasl jar sum sa vul gatta mi mulla, sa nisi fisi kulo hay hoyok-ziyna, sa ma ɗo slena vi ma ŋolla vi sojena, ma lopna vuli hay ɓalamu kay yaw sumun hay duura, hiɗi sumun dok-karkiya jar sum sa hay nagatna sa ka kulo hay hoyok-ziyna.
Bulu: E tison, a nga bi évete bezimbi é mbe é baʼaleʼe bezimbi a bôte betan be mbe be boʼo njô bôt ésaé a mbe be nga too e tison; a nga bi fe ñyeme bekalate, évete nsamba mewosan é nga bili ésaé ya nyoñe bôt, bôte ya été mewôm mesaman be too e tison.
Guiziga: Ar walahaya kwana, a ja mbur madiɗa migi slra, yo i madiɗa ngi soje ngi ɓuhoyo ma. Waɗ a ji mizli zlum, mizli ngi si mevel ngi buyoy. A ja mbur mutoho gwat, yo i madiɗa ngi sojehey, muvulakaŋ slra ngi hila mizli ng'ar slra. Waɗ ma na, a ji asi Zudahay, ziri ngir walahay Zeruzaleme kukur merkeɗe.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nder berniwol o hoo'i gooto nder saraaki'en maako kaliifaajo honooɓe e worɓe njowo caka ɓurɓe ɓadaago bee laamiiɗo, tawaaɓe nder berniwol e binndoowo mawɗo konu, mo hoo'i yimɓe lesdi ngam jama'aare konu e worɓe cappanɗe njoweego nder yimɓe lesdi tawaaɓe nder berniwol.
Fulfulde_DC: Nder berniwol o hoo'i gooto nder saraaki'en maako kaliifaajo honooɓe e worɓe njowo caka ɓurɓe ɓadaago bee laamiiɗo, tawaaɓe nder berniwol e binndoowo mawɗo konu, mo hoo'i yimɓe lesdi ngam jama'aare konu e worɓe cappanɗe njoweego nder yimɓe lesdi tawaaɓe nder berniwol.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: A̧ baa ŋma gasawi sɛn saaye nɛ̀ duka so zu o wi-biro in o ŋma bíí mɔɔrɔ nɛ̀ duk katɛ wannu saaye'i; a̧ kaia ŋma gasa wi-yɔr-kalata ko o wi-biro nɛ̀ hok o bíí tɛ nù‘i in o bíí ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk nɛ̀ ɓɔna saaye mbɛt.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: A̧ baa ŋma gasawi sɛn saaye nɛ̀ duka so zu o wi-biro in o ŋma bíí mɔɔrɔ nɛ̀ duk katɛ wannu saaye'i; a̧ kaia ŋma gasa wi-yɔr-kalata ko o wi-biro nɛ̀ hok o bíí tɛ nù‘i in o bíí ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk nɛ̀ ɓɔna saaye mbɛt.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa keseve kwete nde mene slene nya nza ghena ta ka sewajɛ te dzeve ve perə, zhɛne mcɛfe kweci mbeli nyi ki ghɛa meghe, nde rafe palepa ta kele mbeli kadzembe sewajɛ, meghea ka sewajɛ ŋkɛ, ba'a ŋkwaŋemsə mbelia Zhəwda. Mbeli nyi pɛtɛ ne, mbe Zhɛrəzalɛm hɛ.
Tupurri: AÀ baa je kluu sode po le äi leege ni maga hay waçaç waçaçre sode wo, jar bag yañ ne wañ po wo dwee maga hay wo äi leege ni, je yerge ma wañ sode maga hay de kañge hoor jar ti sode äi sir ni mono, de jar Jude wo ni do hiira' maga hay wo de gwa'ge äi leege ni.

Francais: Les ayant pris, Nabuzardan, capitaine des gardes, les conduisit vers le roi de Babylone à Rébla.
Anglais: And Nebuzar–adan captain of the guard took these, and brought them to the king of Babylon to Riblah:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nebuzaradan ma ŋolla vi sojen yawsiya, tuɗsi kat mulla vi Babilon hay Ribla.
Bulu: Nébuzaradañ, évete bebaʼale, a nga bi be mimbôk a kee be e be njô bôte ya Babilôn e Ribla.
Guiziga: Nebuzaradaŋ, madiɗa ngi soje mijigina liheye, a ja taŋ ngi dangay, aru ti taŋ ng'avu buy madiɗa ngi Babiloŋ a Ribla.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nebuzaradan, hooreejo aynooɓe hoo'i ɓe, yahri ɓe yeeso laamiiɗo Baabila haa Ribla.
Fulfulde_DC: Nebuzaradan, hooreejo aynooɓe hoo'i ɓe, yahri ɓe yeeso laamiiɗo Baabila haa Ribla.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr, gasawi zu o wi-pɛm-wannu kaia wa nɛ̀ bara-biro tom nɛnɛ ha̧ wannu Babilɔŋ sɛn Ribla.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr, gasawi zu o wi-pɛm-wannu kaia wa nɛ̀ bara-biro tom nɛnɛ ha̧ wannu Babilɔŋ sɛn Ribla.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa Nebəwzaradan fəghe nda hɛ ke meghea ka Babilone mbe Ribla.
Tupurri: Nebusaradan wañ gardin wo, kal rawge de dañgay sen wo mo deñ äuy ne wañ Babilon Ribla.

Francais: Et le roi de Babylone les frappa et les fit mourir à Rébla, dans le pays d'Emath. Ainsi Juda fut emmené captif loin de son pays. -- Godolias, gouverneur de Juda.--
Anglais: And the king of Babylon smote them, and slew them at Riblah in the land of Hamath. So Judah was carried away out of their land.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Mul ma Babilonna calsiya, nam cisi goy mati hay Ribla, hay nagata vi Hamat.
Bulu: Ane njô bôte ya Babilôn a nga bibi a wôé be e Ribla, e si ya Amat. Avale di nde Yuda a nga ke minkôm ôyab a si jé.
Guiziga: Akẽh na, buy madiɗa ngi Babiloŋ kwana, a ɓi ɓa a kiɗaka taŋ. Dar mizli a kiɗaka taŋ, hã a micam a Ribla a diga, ar hirwuy Hamat. Naŋ ka misenna mijaka Zudahay, miram ti taŋ kileŋ avu hirwuy taŋ na.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Laamiiɗo Baabila umri ɓoccugo ɓe e mbarugo ɓe haa Ribla nder lesdi Hamat. Ton ɓe maayi. Bana nii yimɓe Yahuuda ndahira diga lesdi muuɗum'en.
Fulfulde_DC: Laamiiɗo Baabila umri ɓoccugo ɓe e mbarugo ɓe haa Ribla nder lesdi Hamat. Ton ɓe maayi. Bana nii yimɓe Yahuuda ndahira diga lesdi muuɗum'en.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ wannu Babilɔŋ gbɛ wa sɛn Ribla nú Hamat. Nɛ́ hegɔ a̧ wa kaia nɛ̀ o be Juda yak nɛnɛ nɛ̀ bara-biro nyɛi̧ nɛ̀ nù kɔ-wa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ wannu Babilɔŋ gbɛ wa sɛn Ribla nú Hamat. Nɛ́ hegɔ a̧ wa kaia nɛ̀ o be Juda yak nɛnɛ nɛ̀ bara-biro nyɛi̧ nɛ̀ nù kɔ-wa.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa meghea shɛ mpəmte hɛ te ŋkwa shɛ, te hɛɗia ka Hamat. Tsetse fəmte mbelia ka Zhəwda mbeli cakeɗa cakeɗa le hɛɗia nci.
Tupurri: Wañ Babilon kal id rage go Ribla ni, äi sir Hamade.

Francais: Quant au peuple demeuré au pays de Juda qu'y laissa Nabuchodonosor, roi de Babylone, il lui donna pour gouverneur Godolias, fils d'Ahicam, fils de Saphan.
Anglais: And as for the people that remained in the land of Judah, whom Nebuchadnezzar king of Babylon had left, even over them he made Gedaliah the son of Ahikam, the son of Shaphan, ruler.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ki kayn nala sumuna vi Yuda kali gorvo'o, goy gine hiɗi nagata visiya. Nala dir sum sa hin hay nagat Yudana Nebukadnesar mul ma Babilonna laksi gaa kuɗ gaŋeraŋa vi Gedaliya, goora vi Ahikam, goora vi Skafan.
Bulu: Mfaʼa bôt be nga liʼi e si ya Yuda, e ba Nébukatnétzar, njô bôte ya Babilôn a nga kañese na be liʼi, a nga telé Gedalia a bo ngovina wob a too e mone Ahikam, e mone Safan.
Guiziga: Amma mizli mekelemey a ndiram le angi hirwuy Zuda, i buy Nabukodonozor mupula taŋ zleˀe. Akẽh na, buy vuna a cufa taŋ buy miwi li taŋ i Gedaliya, mangal ngi Ahikam, dideˀ ngi Safaŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nabukodonosor laamiiɗo Baabila ardini Gedaliya ɓii Ahikam taaniraawo Safan dow luttuɓe haa lesdi Yahuuda.
Fulfulde_DC: Nabukodonosor laamiiɗo Baabila ardini Gedaliya ɓii Ahikam taaniraawo Safan dow luttuɓe haa lesdi Yahuuda.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ko o oi bíí nɛ̀ Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr wannu Babilɔŋ ee ɓɔn Juda, a̧ hoka nɛ Gedalias bem ko Ahikam be-koo Safaŋ mɛ duk zu wa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ko o oi bíí nɛ̀ Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr wannu Babilɔŋ ee ɓɔn Juda, a̧ hoka nɛ Gedalias bem ko Ahikam be-koo Safaŋ mɛ duk zu wa.
Kapsiki_DC: Nahe meghe Nabəkodonozor kesərəakɛ kwete bela te hɛɗia Zhəwda. Pa veyi Gedaliya kaŋgwamna nci, wəzege ta Ahikam shia Shafan.
Tupurri: Diñ do kay no so no, ga aè hoo jar Juda wo wo go haçaç see sir äaara no. Ma jar maga sen gwa' wo äi sir Juda ni mono, jar maga Nebukanetsar wañ Babilon hay haç faage ne hara ga aà mo gwa' wo ni, se raw kañ Gedaliya je ni Ahikam, je ni Safann waçaç waçaçre äaara.

Francais: Lorsque tous les chefs des troupes eurent appris, eux et leurs hommes, que le roi de Babylone avait établi Godolias pour gouverneur, ils vinrent vers Godolias à Maspha, savoir, Ismaël, fils de Nathanias, Johanan, fils de Carée, Saraïas, fils de Thanéhumeth, de Nétopha, et Jézonias, fils du Maachathien, eux et leurs hommes.
Anglais: And when all the captains of the armies, they and their men, heard that the king of Babylon had made Gedaliah governor, there came to Gedaliah to Mizpah, even Ishmael the son of Nethaniah, and Johanan the son of Kareah, and Seraiah the son of Tanhumeth the Netophathite, and Jaazaniah the son of a Maachathite, they and their men.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay li ma sa ŋulona vi vok-ma-duura kaf hum kayni, nisi hiɗi sumuna visi kaw, hay li ma nisi hum ala mul ma Babilonna tun Gedaliya Guverner kay nagata, nisi kali kat Gedaliya hay Mispa: Nisi kayni Ismayel, goora vi Netaniya, Yohanan goora vi Kareyak, Seraya goora vi Tanhumet, goora vi Netofa, hiɗi Yaazaniya goora vi sa ma Maakatiyena, nisi hiɗi sumuna visi kaw,
Bulu: Eyoñe bivete bise ya minsamba, bebien a bôte bap be nga wôʼô na njô bôte ya Babilôn a teléya Gedalia ngovina, be nga ke be Gedalia e Mispa be too na: Israél e mone Netania, Yôhanañ e mone Karéa, Seraya e mone Tanhumét ya Netôfa a Yazaniahu e mone Makatieñ. Bebien a bôte bap.
Guiziga: A dirba nah na, madiɗa ngi soje Zudahay ati mizli taŋhay a cinaka na, buy madiɗa ngi Babiloŋ a cufa Gedaliya le, i buy miwi li. Ti taŋ micinaka kanah na, taŋ jom ati mizli taŋhaya, a soko lumaka Gedaliya a Mispa. Mizli madiɗa tayna musoko na, i ti: Ismayel, mangal ngi Netaniya, Yohanaŋ, mangal ngi Kareya, Seraya, mangal ngi Tanehumet, mbur Netofa, waɗ Yazaniya, mbur Maˀaka.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nde hoore'en jama'aaje konu e yimɓe maɓɓe nani laamiiɗo Baabila ardini Gedaliya, ɓe ngari haa Gedaliya haa Mispa. Ɗum Isma'iilu ɓii Netaniya e Yohanan ɓii Kareha e Seraya ɓii Tanhumet Netofaajo e Yaajaniya ɓii Ma'akatiijo, kamɓe e yimɓe maɓɓe.
Fulfulde_DC: Nde hoore'en jama'aaje konu e yimɓe maɓɓe nani laamiiɗo Baabila ardini Gedaliya, ɓe ngari haa Gedaliya haa Mispa. Ɗum Isma'iilu ɓii Netaniya e Yohanan ɓii Kareha e Seraya ɓii Tanhumet Netofaajo e Yaajaniya ɓii Ma'akatiijo, kamɓe e yimɓe maɓɓe.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ŋgimbi nɛ o gasa wi-biro in o bíí kɔ-wa zia'e ndé, nɛ́ Gedalias a̧ wannu Babilɔŋ hoka mɛ ɔ wan wó, wa tɛɛ kpa a̧ sɛn Mispa, wa in o bíí kɔ-wa. O wi nɛ̀ tɛa'i nɛ́ Ismaɛl bem ko Mɛtania, Yohanaŋ bem ko Karea, Sɛraya bem ko Tanumɛt be Nɛtɔfa, in Yazania bem ko Maka.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ŋgimbi nɛ o gasa wi-biro in o bíí kɔ-wa zia'e ndé, nɛ́ Gedalias a̧ wannu Babilɔŋ hoka mɛ ɔ wan wó, wa tɛɛ kpa a̧ sɛn Mispa, wa in o bíí kɔ-wa. O wi nɛ̀ tɛa'i nɛ́ Ismaɛl bem ko Mɛtania, Yohanaŋ bem ko Karea, Sɛraya bem ko Tanumɛt be Nɛtɔfa, in Yazania bem ko Maka.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kwa fate ghena shɛ ka sewajɛa ka Zhəwda nyi keɗema kedzembe Babilone, ghena nya tarete Nabəkodonozor, pa hɛ lə kasləyi Gedaliya mbe Mispa. Ma mbelia jama ta ka sewajɛa shɛ ne, Ismayɛl, wəzege ta Netaniya, Yohanan, wəzege ta Karɛya, Seraya, wəzege ta Tanehəwmɛt, nde Netofa, ba'a Yazaniya nde Ma'aka.
Tupurri: De maga wañre soden wo de jar äaaran wo äuy wo wo laage ga wañ Babilon kañ Gedaliya we diñ je waçaç waçaçre jar mono, aà kal wo rawge da'ge äe Mitspa. AÀ hay diñ Ismayel je ni Netaniya no, Yohanan je ni Kareya no, Seraya je ni Tahumed ma Netofa no, wo de Yaasaniyahu mbarga ma je Maakatiyen po. AÀ kal wo nduugi de jar äaaran wo were.

Francais: Godolias leur dit avec serment, à eux et à leurs hommes: « Ne craignez rien de la part des serviteurs des Chaldéens; demeurez dans le pays, servez le roi de Babylone, et vous vous en trouverez bien. »
Anglais: And Gedaliah sware to them, and to their men, and said unto them, Fear not to be the servants of the Chaldeans: dwell in the land, and serve the king of Babylon; and it shall be well with you.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gedaliya yi va kalam voksiya, voksi nisi lay vok sumuna visi lay, nam ka disi ala: Nigi ma li nari kay sa sunda vi sa kaldeena noŋɗi, lakgi hay nagata, sungi mul ma Babilonna, nigi ɗawn ma lak sleɗe.
Bulu: Gedalia a nga kane be ngana, be a bôte bab a jô be na: Te koone jam éziñe woñ e soʼo e be bebo bisaé ya be Bekaldééñ; tabaʼan e si jenan a bo njô bôte ya Babilône bisaé wôna mia ye nyiñe mvoʼé .
Guiziga: Taŋ tuwa waɗ mizli taŋhaya, Gedaliya a ɓa t'ani ti hudum: «Anja ko ki zluwunam ti Babiloŋhoyo neˀ ta, amma, kum cifam asi ruwuyo hinam hirnga a mbuŋ buy madiɗa ngi Babiloŋ si. Kanah na, naɓa kisa ndiram ar mumul»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Gedaliya hunani ɓe wi'i: “Taa kule jaggiiɓe Kaldiya'en ɓe'e. Njooɗe nder lesdi, kuuwane laamiiɗo Baabila, nden kam on njooɗoto jam .”
Fulfulde_DC: Gedaliya hunani ɓe wi'i: “Taa kule jaggiiɓe Kaldiya'en ɓe'e. Njooɗe nder lesdi, kuuwane laamiiɗo Baabila, nden kam on njooɗoto jam .”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Gedalias kàná mɔ ti wa'e ndé, ká wa ya nɛ̀ kíì wen duka-a mgbara o wi-de-tom ko o be Kaldee na. Wa a̧ ɔ́ tɛ nù‘i, wa a̧ dé tom ha̧ wannu Babilɔŋ, ɓɛɛ wa tɛ ya nɛ̀ de-a.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Gedalias kàná mɔ ti wa'e ndé, ká wa ya nɛ̀ kíì wen duka-a mgbara o wi-de-tom ko o be Kaldee na. Wa a̧ ɔ́ tɛ nù‘i, wa a̧ dé tom ha̧ wannu Babilɔŋ, ɓɛɛ wa tɛ ya nɛ̀ de-a.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma ke Gedaliya sha hɛ pɛtɛ: «'Ya kameɗeyi ŋayɛ mba yɛ keghazlənə va yayata wəsə laka ka Babilone. Se mə kantishɛ te hɛɗi nya le nza ta ŋayɛ ba'a fa nda mə ŋa meghea ka Babilone. Katekemave ganyɛa ŋayɛ yɛ.»
Tupurri: Gedaliya kal fer waçaçre ne hara de jar äaaran wo go de haç'ge ga: Nday bay ma joñ heçeçne do jar joñre jar Kalden wo wa. Lag wee mbay äi sir no, ni nday hay wee seege wer wañ Babilone, ni ma äuyn see yañ mbe de ele.

Francais: Mais, le septième mois, Ismaël, fils de Nathanias, fils d'Elisama, de la race royale, vint accompagné de dix hommes, et ils frappèrent à mort Godolias, ainsi que les Juifs et les Chaldéens qui étaient avec lui à Maspha.
Anglais: But it came to pass in the seventh month, that Ishmael the son of Nethaniah, the son of Elishama, of the seed royal, came, and ten men with him, and smote Gedaliah, that he died, and the Jews and the Chaldeans that were with him at Mizpah.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: May hay til ma siɗiyana, Ismayel goora vi Netaniya, goora vi Elisama, ma hay jafna vi muldana, nam co'o, sumun kuɗum doogo, nisi cal Gedaliya cum goyo, sa Yudiyana hiɗi sa Kaldeena sa ay hiɗi namu hay Mispa kaw nisi calsi goy kafe.
Bulu: Ve e ngone zamgbwale, Ismaél e mone Nétania, e mone Elisama ya nda bejô bôt, a nga zu a bôte awôm, ane be nga bibi Gedalia, nde a nga wu, a Beyude a Bekaldééñ baa be be be nga too e Mispa.
Guiziga: Amma angi kiya mitarnaˀ naŋ ngi vi nah na, Ismayel, mangal ngi Netaniya, dideˀ ngi Elisama, i sukwi ngi buyoy, a soko ati mizli kuruˀ nga Mispa. Dar a kiɗaka Gedaliya tuwa vagay, waɗ mizli Zudahay ati Babiloŋhoy misi taŋ bummoˀ a Mispa vuna.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ammaa nder lewru joweeɗiɗaɓru hitaande man, Isma'iilu ɓii Netaniya ɓii Eliisama, goɗɗo danygol laamiiɗo wardi bee yimɓe sappo, ɓe mbari Gedaliya e Yahuudu'en e Kaldiya'en wonduɓe bee maako haa Mispa .
Fulfulde_DC: Ammaa nder lewru joweeɗiɗaɓru hitaande man, Isma'iilu ɓii Netaniya ɓii Eliisama, goɗɗo danygol laamiiɗo wardi bee yimɓe sappo, ɓe mbari Gedaliya e Yahuudu'en e Kaldiya'en wonduɓe bee maako haa Mispa .
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Gedalias dee fio-zɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo tɛ wan, ɓɛɛ Ismaɛl bem ko Nɛtania be-koo Ɛlisama, ŋma be-wan mbɛt kai o ŋma bíí ɓu in a̧, ɓɛɛ wa nɛ́ɛ̀ gbɛ Gedalias gú nɛ̀ o be Juda in o be Kaldee nɛ̀ dee so ye in a̧ sɛn Mispa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Gedalias dee fio-zɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo tɛ wan, ɓɛɛ Ismaɛl bem ko Nɛtania be-koo Ɛlisama, ŋma be-wan mbɛt kai o ŋma bíí ɓu in a̧, ɓɛɛ wa nɛ́ɛ̀ gbɛ Gedalias gú nɛ̀ o be Juda in o be Kaldee nɛ̀ dee so ye in a̧ sɛn Mispa.
Kapsiki_DC: Ama te kwa mberefaŋe ta tere mbe va nya, pa Ismayɛl, wəzege ta Netaniya shia Ɛlishama, nya mbe hwelefe ta meghe, se kadzembe Mispa le mbeli meŋe. Pa hɛ peslekɛ Gedaliya, pɛtɛ le ka Zhəwda nyi ki ghɛa ŋkɛ ba'a ka Babilone nyi ki
Tupurri: Nen few ma de renam nen kiñgin mono, Ismayel je ni Nataniya no, je ni Elisama no, maga hay ti ceçw wañ mono, kal nduugi de jar wer Mitspa hwale, aà kal wo 'war Gedaliya go. AÀ kal wo id jar Juda wo de Kalde maga hay wo äiñ äe ni go.
