Francais: Alors tout le peuple, depuis le plus petit jusqu'au plus grand, et les chefs des troupes, se levèrent et s'en allèrent en Egypte, parce qu'ils avaient peur des Chaldéens. --Bienveillance d'Evil-Mérodach pour Joachin.--
Anglais: And all the people, both small and great, and the captains of the armies, arose, and came to Egypt: for they were afraid of the Chaldeans.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ki kayn nala sumun kaf, tun caw tam sa gurayn pa ta-ta tam sa ŋulona, sa ŋulona vi vok-ma-duura, kaf yawaya kali hay Egipte, kay nisi ka li nari kay sa Kaldeena.
Bulu: Eyoñe te ñhe bôte bese be nga kôlô, ataté nyô a ne tyôtyoé a kui nyô a ne anen, nalé fe bivete ya minsamba, a ke Ejipte amu be nga ko Bekaldééñ woñ.
Guiziga: A dirba nah so na, sukwi ngi mizli Zudahay gar, zle avu mizlewey, sesẽŋ avu mizli madiɗahay, waɗ madiɗa ngi sojeheye gar, a slikiɗam, a ram nga Ezipte, asi ara zluwunam ti Babiloŋhoy.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nden ummaatoore e hoore'en jama'aaje konu fuu ndoggi, njehi haa lesdi Misra, ngam ɓe kuli Kaldiya'en .
Fulfulde_DC: Nden ummaatoore e hoore'en jama'aaje konu fuu ndoggi, njehi haa lesdi Misra, ngam ɓe kuli Kaldiya'en .
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Dukbíí nɛ̀ oi-aa, o ge bíí ge ndé lɛŋ, gú nɛ̀ o gasawi, o wi-duk-zu o wi-biro yuu o be Kaldee, ɓɛɛ wa yak si Egiptɛ mɛ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Dukbíí nɛ̀ oi-aa, o ge bíí ge ndé lɛŋ, gú nɛ̀ o gasawi, o wi-duk-zu o wi-biro yuu o be Kaldee, ɓɛɛ wa yak si Egiptɛ mɛ.
Kapsiki_DC: Pɛtɛa mbeli nyi mbe meleme ba'a ka jama jama ta ka sewajɛ slənji kanya kwetɛŋe kadzembe Ɛzhipte, kwa ghazlənənji hɛ va ka Babilone.
Tupurri: Do kay nono, jar ma äi sir Judan wo äuy, klee kluu, de wañre soden wo äuy, kal wo caa faage dañ wo wo go Ejipte do heçeçne maga jar Kalde day la men wo saara gaa mono.

Francais: La trente-septième année de la captivité de Joachin, roi de Juda, le douzième mois, le vingt-septième jour du mois, Evil-Mérodach, roi de Babylone, en l'année de son avènement, releva la tête de Joachin, roi de Juda, et le tira de prison.
Anglais: And it came to pass in the seven and thirtieth year of the captivity of Jehoiachin king of Judah, in the twelfth month, on the seven and twentieth day of the month, that Evil–merodach king of Babylon in the year that he began to reign did lift up the head of Jehoiachin king of Judah out of prison;
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Co hay busata dok-ɦidi yam siɗiyata ta nisi vi Yoyakin mulla vi Yuda kayni, co hay buurta dok-ma' yam siɗiyata vi til ma doogo yam ma'na, Evil-Merodak, mul ma Babilonna, hot sli yam Yoyakin mulla vi Yuda kulo'o, kayni hay busata valam ta jewta hay mulda. Nam kalamay goy hay daŋgayna.
Bulu: Mbu mewôm mela a zamgbwale ya nkeane minkôme Yehôyakin, njô bôte ya Yuda, ngon awôm a baa é too melu mewôm mebaé a zamgbwa, ñwô Evil-Mérôdak, njô bôte ya Babilôn, mbu ôsu a nga taté jôô, a nga kuli Yehôyakin, njô bôte ya Yuda nda mimbôk a duma ese.
Guiziga: Zoˀakiŋ, buy Zuda, hirak ti hin ani na, naɓa a ɓul di i vi mizli ngir makir nga tarnaˀ naŋ, ngi ji taŋ nga Babiloŋ. Angi hin mizli ngir cuw nga tarnaˀ naŋ, ngi kiya mukuruˀ nga cuw naŋ. Evil- Merodak, buy madiɗa ngi Babiloŋ, angi vi naŋ micifi buy madiɗa vuna si na, a ga mezle da Zoˀakiŋ, buy Zuda, waɗ a pulaŋ tir dangaya.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nder nduuɓu cappanɗe tati e njoweeɗiɗaɓu ɓaawo daheeki Yooyakin laamiiɗo Yahuuda diga Urusaliima, Ewil-Merodak laami haa Baabila. Nder nyalaade noogas e joweeɗiɗawre nder lewru sappo e ɗiɗaɓru hitaande man, o woonani Yooyakin, o wurtini mo diga fursina.
Fulfulde_DC: Nder nduuɓu cappanɗe tati e njoweeɗiɗaɓu ɓaawo daheeki Yooyakin laamiiɗo Yahuuda diga Urusaliima, Ewil-Merodak laami haa Baabila. Nder nyalaade noogas e joweeɗiɗawre nder lewru sappo e ɗiɗaɓru hitaande man, o woonani Yooyakin, o wurtini mo diga fursina.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Tɛ ɓu-taar-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo pɛ nɛ̀ wa baa nɛ̀ Jɔakin wannu Juda yaknɛ nɛ̀ bara-biro, tɛ ɓu-zua-yiitoo fio-zɛ tɛ ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo ɔɔ-zɛ, Mɛrodak wannu Babilɔŋ dee kó ha̧ Jɔakin wannu Juda, ká a̧ yee wan nɛ̀ mbe-a, ɓɛɛ a̧ gbo a̧ yinɛ kɔ̧ zɔɓɔ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Tɛ ɓu-taar-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo pɛ nɛ̀ wa baa nɛ̀ Jɔakin wannu Juda yaknɛ nɛ̀ bara-biro, tɛ ɓu-zua-yiitoo fio-zɛ tɛ ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo ɔɔ-zɛ, Mɛrodak wannu Babilɔŋ dee kó ha̧ Jɔakin wannu Juda, ká a̧ yee wan nɛ̀ mbe-a, ɓɛɛ a̧ gbo a̧ yinɛ kɔ̧ zɔɓɔ.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma mbe kwa mahekenemsə mberefaŋeghəmbe ta va ta Zhowakin, meghea ka Zhəwda kwa sebe ta nya keleghe ŋkɛ mbeli kadzete kwete hɛɗi ne, pa Ɛvil-Mɛrodak kelete meghe mbe Babilone. Ma te hɛ bakemsə mberefaŋeghəmbe mbe kwa meŋe bakeghəmbe ta tere mbe va shɛ ne, pa ŋkɛ menete nda zlaɓa ke Zhowakin ba'a kelakame ŋkɛ same kwa daŋgayɛ.
Tupurri: Nen kiñgi ma de do swa' ti renam maga aè wo go de baa Yehoyakin wañ Juda mono, wur naw ma de do äog ti renamn äil few ma de hwal ti äogn mono, Efil-Merodag wañ Babilone, ti maga se de ma joñkiñgi ti wañ ni boñ ëa mono, kal äo' Yehoyakin wañ Juda le go ti dañgay de togoëge.

Francais: Il lui parla avec bonté, et il mit son trône au-dessus du trône des rois qui étaient avec lui à Babylone.
Anglais: And he spake kindly to him, and set his throne above the throne of the kings that were with him in Babylon;
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam lawam hiɗi ŋaa'a, nam tun zlamda-mulda valamu kulo kay zlamda-mulda vi muliyan kaf sa ay hiɗi namu hay Babilon.
Bulu: A nga kobô nye mbamba nkobô a telé éto njôane jé ôsu ya éto njôane bejô bôt baa be be be nga too e Babilôn.
Guiziga: Evil-Merodak a ɓaŋ ti ˀay mezle, yo a vulaŋ janga ngi buyo fineˀ ngi buy mekelemey misi ati naŋ a Babiloŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O mo'ani mo, o ɓaŋgti joonde maako dow joole laamiiɓe wonduɓe bee maako haa Baabila.
Fulfulde_DC: O mo'ani mo, o ɓaŋgti joonde maako dow joole laamiiɓe wonduɓe bee maako haa Baabila.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: A̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ de wen zu a̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ ha̧ de fara ha̧ a̧ gan ko o wannu nɛ̀ a̧a̧ so kɔ̧ zɔɓɔ in a̧ sɛn Babilɔŋ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: A̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ de wen zu a̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ ha̧ de fara ha̧ a̧ gan ko o wannu nɛ̀ a̧a̧ so kɔ̧ zɔɓɔ in a̧ sɛn Babilɔŋ.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa ŋkɛ gezete nda ghena le zeɗe ba'a ndeke nda ŋkwa nya kwele kala kweci ka meghe nyi te hɛɗia Babilone.
Tupurri: AÀ kal fer waçaçre ne hen de ele, kal kañ paale wañ äen go ciñ ti paale wañ ma wañre maga hay wo see äe Babilon ni mo äuy no.

Francais: Il lui fit changer ses vêtements de prison, et Joachin mangea toujours en sa présence, tout le temps de sa vie.
Anglais: And changed his prison garments: and he did eat bread continually before him all the days of his life.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sligara valam ma daŋgayna nam fokom goy talamu, Yoyakin ti kayn dok-dok kay tablena valamu ta-ta tam mitta valamu.
Bulu: A nga bo nye na a tyendé mengômesane mimbôʼô mé a nga beʼe, a Yehôyakin a nga di éyoñ ése e vôm a nga too, nté ôse a nga vee.
Guiziga: Buy a ɓi ɓa a cukokoŋ zana naŋ ngi dangayaya avra. Joˀ Zoˀakiŋ a zumam ɗafa ndrehhe ar skiɗ misi purla ati buyo hã hin ngi siifa naŋ a ruwuyo.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe ɓorti Yooyakin limce fursina. O nyaami haa taabal laamiiɗo balɗe maako fuu.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe ɓorti Yooyakin limce fursina. O nyaami haa taabal laamiiɗo balɗe maako fuu.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Jɔakin kpɔ̧i̧a̧ o laa-bara a nù ɓɛɛ duk nyɔŋ mɔ in wannu wese lɛŋ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Jɔakin kpɔ̧i̧a̧ o laa-bara a nù ɓɛɛ duk nyɔŋ mɔ in wannu wese lɛŋ.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa ŋkɛ ndeke nda hweŋkwa ke Zhowakin kezha ɗema kaseɗe lekwesa ta ka daŋgayɛ, ntake ŋkɛ kazeme wəsə kezeme keveci keveci te tabele nya kwetɛŋe le meghea ka Babilone.
Tupurri: AÀ kal coo oçoçbe dañgay äen go ne hene, Yehoyakin hay reege tum diñ pel äe ti maga se joñ caw mo äuy.

Francais: Quant à son entretien, son entretien perpétuel, le roi y pourvut chaque jour, tout le temps de sa vie.
Anglais: And his allowance was a continual allowance given him of the king, a daily rate for every day, all the days of his life.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay buur ma nam ka irin kaf kayni mulla ka vulum sle ma tina hay buurta buurta kaf.
Bulu: Nté ôse a nga vee, baa njô bôt be nga laane minlañ.
Guiziga: Naŋ kine, Zoˀakiŋe, ar hin ngi siifa naŋ gar, hã avu muc naŋ na, buy madiɗa ngi Babiloŋ a vulaŋ gwat ɓa naŋ mangir ti naŋ le gar.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nguure maako, nguure tabitiinde, laamiiɗo hokki mo nde nyalaade nyalaade, balɗe maako fuu.
Fulfulde_DC: Nguure maako, nguure tabitiinde, laamiiɗo hokki mo nde nyalaade nyalaade, balɗe maako fuu.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wannu ha̧a̧ mɔ lɛŋ ha̧ a̧ wese kpɔk kpɔk wen duka-a kɔ̧-a̧ hɔ ŋgimbi fio kɔ̧-a̧.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wannu ha̧a̧ mɔ lɛŋ ha̧ a̧ wese kpɔk kpɔk wen duka-a kɔ̧-a̧ hɔ ŋgimbi fio kɔ̧-a̧.
Kapsiki_DC: Tsetse menete geva ŋkɛ keveci keveci pa te mte, nahe Zhowakin kekemave wəshi nyi ɗe ŋkɛ kezha tawe ghəa ŋkɛ, se va meghea ka Babilone.
Tupurri: Ndalge äaara ndalge ma tumtum no, wañ hay go de kne' sen ne hen maga saara mo ndal tum ti naw, haçaç de wur maga se joñ de äe caw mo äuy no.
